orig_text: Nationality: Japanese$NL;Age: 52$NL;$NL;In his youth, Jiro was never accepted, until he found his way into the yakuza. Yet even here, despite his loyalty and ability, he was never fully embraced and was ultimately betrayed. Following a lengthy prison term, Jiro has come to America to find his long-lost son, Kento.
tran_text: 國籍：日本$NL;年齡：52$NL;$NL;直到他投身黑社會的世界之前，年輕時的Jiro從未被任何人接受過。但就算成為極道的一份子，無論他的忠誠和能力有多高，他亦未曾被幫會完全信任，最終更被背叛出賣。經歷過長長的牢獄生涯後，Jiro來到千里之外的美國尋找他失散已久的兒子：Kento。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Jiro為你想當的角色，如果其他玩家不是他你就可以使用他。

orig_text: Listen up heisters,$NL;$NL;Every so often, one of our contacts will come to me with a special request.$NL;You know, those little "hey, if you're in the area, maybe you could...." requests. Now I'm not talking about picking up Vlad's laundry or milk and bread for The Elephant. I'm talking about extra opportunities to be thieving, robbing, shooting, get-rich heisting badasses.$NL;$NL;I've been reluctant to do this. No distractions. Focus on the job at hand, right? But after the hours you've put in I think you guys are up to it. So, I'm adding a new feature to Crime.net. The Daily, Weekly and Monthly jobs. You do a little bit more, you get a big reward. Check it out, see what's active. You know our contacts are generous to those that go the extra mile.
tran_text: 小賊們聽仔細了，$NL;$NL;幾乎每隔一段時間，就會有人跑來找我提出一些特別的要求$NL;你們懂的，就是那些"嘿，如果你們在那裏，你們可以順便......"的小小要求。我現在不是說幫Vlad撿髒衣服或是幫Elephant拿麵包、牛奶，我是在告訴你們一個賺外快、去偷、去搶，去成為大壞蛋的機會。$NL;$NL;我也是千百個不願意，大家都想專注在手邊的工作，是吧？但只要你們做了，鐵定會做的很稱職，所以我加了一個新功能到Crime.net：每日和每周任務，你們只要做一點點就可以有豐富的報酬，所以去看看它。相信你們很清楚我們的客戶對於額外的努力是很慷慨的。

orig_text: The PAYDAY: 2 Official Soundtrack is the first DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and consists of a collection of all PAYDAY 2 tracks, composed by OVERKILL's celebrated mastermind Simon Viklund. Immerse yourself into the world of PAYDAY with this PAYDAY album in high-quality MP3 and FLAC! As PAYDAY 2 grows, the official soundtrack grows with it, and new tracks are added for free.$NL;$NL;The PAYDAY 2 Official Soundtrack also includes four community made masks and patterns thanks to the Poetry Jam competition. Last but not least, it includes remix material so you can make your own PAYDAY 2-inspired music!
tran_text: The PAYDAY: 2 Official Soundtrack是PAYDAY 2的第一個DLC，由所有PAYDAY 2的音軌所構成，由OVERKILL著名的黑手--Simon Viklund所撰寫。透過這個高質素的MP3及FLAC專輯，將你浸淫在PAYDAY的世界內！當PAYDAY 2成長，此音軌亦會成長，免費加入新的音軌。$NL;$NL;PAYDAY 2的原版音軌同時包括來自Poetry Jam比賽的四個社群製作的面具及圖案。最後但不是最少，這包括了重新混合的材料，你可以製作自己的PAYDAY 2中令人振奮的音樂！

The Shadow Raid Heist is the fourth free heist update for PAYDAY 2. In the Shadow Raid heist, heisters are sneaking into a well-guarded warehouse where the Murkywater private military contractors store all the stolen, secret loot from all the conflicts they have taken part in. Since this is Murkywater territory, if you get spotted, you need to get out as fast as you can. Rumor has it that there is something of extraordinary value hidden somewhere inside the warehouse.$NL;$NL;Along with the new Shadow Raid heist comes an intimidating new mask as well as six new achievements.
tran_text: The Shadow Raid Heist是PAYDAY 2的第四個免費劫案更新。在影之襲擊中，劫匪是鬼鬼祟祟地進入Murkywater的私人軍事承包儲存所有來自他們有參與的戰爭中被盜竊、秘密贓物--充滿警衛的倉庫。由於這是Murkywater領地，如果你被發現，你必須盡快離開。傳言那裡倉庫內藏有非凡價值的贓物。$NL;$NL;伴隨影之襲擊的來臨，帶來了震懾的新面具和六個新成就。

orig_text: You earned $stage_cash; on your contract day rate.
Ethan and Hila has started to set up their gear and getting settled in on their new set. Even if they sometimes get in the way of the other heisters they need the space to express themselves.
tran_text: Ethan 跟 Hila 開始安頓好他們的裝備與新設備。他們有時候會干擾到其他搶匪們但還是得給他們一點空間去釋放他們自己。

orig_text: The Crook is a versatile criminal. The term is as old as crime itself.$NL;$NL;Truly, the crook is a jack of all trades and a master of none. He steals, lies, cheats and does any and every dishonest or illegal work necessary to get by.
tran_text: Crook $NL;騙子是犯罪的藝術​​家，存在久遠如同犯罪這詞本身。$NL;$NL;說實話，騙子甚麼都能幹，甚麼都不專精。只要他想，他偷、騙、作弊、做一切羞恥非法的工作。

orig_text: The Wolf Pack DLC is the 31st pack for PAYDAY 2, and is a stroll down memory lane, as we revive two loved maps from Payday: The Heist. In "Counterfeit" the gang heads over to the sunshine state to break up a money laundry business run by an individual named Mr. Mitchell. Does Bodhi's Pool Repair ring a bell? In "Undercover" the gang sets out to intercept a dirty deal between a taxman and some big corporation. $25,000,000 is on the line and things will get violent. Together with this comes a new pump-action grenade launcher, one melee weapon, four masks, four patterns, four materials and finally two new tracks from Simon Viklund.
tran_text: The Wolf Pack DLC 是 PAYDAY 2 的31個DLC ， 還在記憶中遊走，我們復刻了在 Payday: The Heist 的地圖，在「Counterfeit」中，老大在下午打破了 Mr. Mitchell的洗黑錢生意。 Bodhi的游泳池修理隊電話響了？在「Undercover」中，Payday幫決定打破稅務員和大公司的黑暗交易。 $25,000,000在線上而且引起暴力爭奪。連帶來了一個新的泵動式榴彈發射器、 一把近戰武器、 四個面具、 四個材質，以及來自 Simon Viklund 的兩個新音軌。

orig_text: Bain helps those who help themselves.
Access to a scaffolding used as vantage point

The Sydney Character Pack is the 9th character pack for PAYDAY 2. Heisters can now shoulder the mayhemic role of Sydney - both a punk and a punk rocker born in the rougher parts of Melbourne. She's angry as few and provides people with much needed chaos as she roams the criminal world, finally ending up in the PAYDAY gang. Sydney comes with the Anarchist Perk Deck, Sydney's Mask, the Wing Butterfly Melee Knife and the Bootleg Assault Rifle.
tran_text: Sydney 角色包是第九個 PAYDAY 2 的角色包。劫匪現在可以肩負 Sydney 的多重角色 － 在墨爾本中簡陋地方出生，同時是龐克及龐克搖滾者。她很少生氣就能為人帶來混亂就像在犯罪世界中，最終加入 PAYDAY 幫。 Sydney 帶來了無政府主義者天賦牌組， Sydney 的面具、 Wing Butterfly 小刀以後 Bootleg 突擊步槍。

The Alesso Heist DLC is the 23rd DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration with the DJ Alesso. Navigate through the Gensec arena, quiet or loud, and keep the show going while trying to crack Gensec's state of the art exhibition vaults containing loads of cash. The Alesso Heist DLC is designed together with Alesso and features his new song named PAYDAY, adrenaline filled combat and tense stealthing in the home arena of the Starbreeze Suns hockey team. It also comes with the high power and low recoil revolver Matever .357, 4 masks inspired by Alesso's shows, 4 patterns, 4 materials and 5 achievements.
tran_text: Alesso音樂會劫案DLC是我們與著名瑞典電音DJ Alesso合力製作的第23個PAYDAY 2專用DLC。這次將帶領你們進入Gensec綜藝館，大家可以靜靜參觀或是盡情炒翻天，一邊欣賞精彩的音樂會演出，一邊從Gensec新型展示金庫中嬴取豐富的紀念品。協助我們設計音樂會劫案DLC的Alesso更為大家帶來他的全新樂曲PAYDAY。讓人熱血沸騰的槍戰或是緊張刺激的潛行，都在這個Starbreeze Suns曲棍球隊的主場上映！我們更為每一位觀眾送上高火力低反動的左輪手槍Matever .357、四個Alesso主題面具、花紋、材質，以及新成就。

tran_text: 與電腦玩家玩單人遊戲，不能被其他玩家加入。

orig_text: Time to #FREEHOXTON. The Hoxton Breakout Heist is the fifth free heist update to PAYDAY 2. The Dentist got Hoxton a re-trial and you're going to get him out! A loud only heist, it includes Old Hoxton as a playable character, the "Hoxton Reborn" mask, as well as 4 new achievements. This heist was a part of update 44 and is completely free for our players.
tran_text: #釋放Hoxton的時間來臨了。The Hoxton Breakout Heist是Payday的第五個免費劫案更新。Dentist得到了Hoxton重審的機會，而且你們要求他走！只限突入的劫案，當中包括了Old Hoxton作為可使用的角色，"Hoxton Reborn"面具，四個新成就。44號更新的其中一部份，而且是對所有玩家免費。

orig_text: Complete the White Xmas, Santa's Workshop, and Stealing Xmas jobs. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 完成白色聖誕劫、聖誕工坊及聖誕大盜。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: Dallas is thinking about the good old days and he would appreciate it if you did that too.
tran_text: Dallas 正懷念著以前的好時光，如果你也這樣做Dallas將會十分感謝你。

orig_text: Complete the Golden Grin Casino heist on DEATH WISH difficulty or above, equipped with only silenced pistols.
tran_text: 在 DEATH WISH 或以上的難度，攜帶只有消音功能的手槍時完成金牙大賭場 (Golden Grin Casino) 劫案。

orig_text: Doing the Diamond heist maybe requires a finer touch. A bit of delicate finesse. A woman's touch, you might say... The Clover Character Pack DLC is 14th DLC and the third character pack for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as Clover, an Irish heister. Other than Clover herself, it includes the Burglar perk deck, Clover's mask, Clover's Shillelagh and the Queen's Wrath Rifle.
tran_text: 若要挑戰驚世鑽奇，你們可能需要一個巧奪天空之手。一點精湛的技巧。可以說是一個女人的巧手... Clover角色包是PAYDAY2的第14個DLC也是第三個人物包。玩家可以控制Clover，一個來自愛爾蘭的瘋女人。除了Clover本人，這個人物包還包括了竊賊的天賦、Clover的面具、Clover的橡木棍與女皇之怒步槍。
明尼阿波利斯警察出現率：低

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2014-04-24 09:45 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Inventory organization and renaming update$NL;$NL;Greetings, $player;. With the introduction of the sniper rifles and the golden AK.762 rifle, I wanted to give you a few new features to help you arrange and display your precious arsenal better.$NL;$NL;You can now move your weapons and masks and change their places. Select and equip an eligible item, then simply click the move-button that appears and use the place-button where you want to move it. If you select and occupied slot, you simply swap the items around.$NL;$NL;You can now also rename weapons and masks. Simply click the name of said weapon or mask and rename it to something close and personal.$NL;$NL;(Note: No one else can see your names that you have chosen.)$NL;$NL;- Bain

orig_text: The GAGE NINJA PACK is the 26th DLC for PAYDAY 2 in which Gage has returned. On his journeys in the East he was inspired by the warrior culture of ninjas and refilled his stock with weapons fit for assassins. The Kross Vertex Submachine Gun, Lebensauger .308 Sniper Rifle and the Pistol Crossbow are all developed with clandestine killing in mind. Pierce fear into the hearts of the law enforcers with the close combat of ancient martial arts including the poison coated Kunai Knife, Talons, Okinawa Octagonal Sai and the Empty Palm Kata style. Best of all is the throwable Shuriken spiked with poison that comes in packs of 10 and available to pick up as well! Four ninja inspired masks, patterns and materials together with 4 new achievements also come in this neatly packaged GAGE NINJA PACK!
tran_text: 作為Gage的回歸，Gage忍者包是PAYDAY2的第26個DLC。在他去東方的旅途中被忍者文化所影響，然後他把庫存塞滿了刺客裝備。Kross Vertex衝鋒槍，Lebensauger.308狙擊步槍和弩在腦海中演繹了各種暗殺。用塗滿毒素的苦無刺穿條子的心臟，傳統技藝的戰鬥包括手甲鉤，沖繩風格的釵以及空手道。最好的投擲物－10個塗滿毒液的六方手裏劍，還可以收回哦！4個忍者面具，紋樣材質以及4個新成就一同打包進了Gage忍者包裡！

orig_text: A well placed zip-line straight back to the safe house.
tran_text: 一個安置好的滑索直達安全屋。
所有玩家都有額外 $stamina;% 耐力。

You also gain a ##$multipro3;## base chance to get a throwable from an ammo box. The base chance is increased by ##$multipro4;## for each ammo box you pick up that does not contain a throwable. When a throwable has been found, the chance is reset to its base value.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not stack with the perk deck skill "Walk-in Closet".

orig_text: Heading into the furnace of battle requires skill, hardness and more than a little luck. Some people just have it. The Bonnie Character Pack is the fourth free characer pack for PAYDAY 2 and was unlocked by the community during the Hype Train event. It allows heisters to play as Bonnie, the Scottish bank robber who just got out of jail and wants to get back into the game. It includes the Gambler perk deck, Bonnies mask, Rivertown Glen Bottle and the Joceline O/U 12g Shotgun. The character was released during the Spring Break event and is completely free for all our players.
tran_text: 進入一個火熱的戰場需要技巧，毅力和好的運氣。有些人就是有這些好運和技術。Bonnie人物包是PAYDAY2裡第四個免費人物包，玩家只需要加入官方群組就可以解鎖了。玩家可以控制Bonnie，一個剛從監獄裡逃出來的蘇格蘭籍的銀行搶劫犯。這個人物包包括了賭博的新天賦、Bonnie面具、河岸鎮大瓶子和喬斯琳O/U 12g 霰彈槍。這個人物將會在春季假期活動加入並且是完全免費的。

tran_text: 你們不幫我我要怎麼繼續幹議員啊？去完成我給你的其中四個任務（可重疊且不限難度）。

orig_text: A doctor bag will be hidden in the restrooms
tran_text: 一包醫療包將會藏在廁所

orig_text: Heading into the furnace of battle requires skill, hardness and more than a little luck. Some people just have it.$NL;$NL;Luck is an elusive quality. The ancient Greeks believed it was the design of the Gods. It isn't. It certainly exists, but it's something you can earn. It requires preparation and forethought to get your pieces in place, and maximize your chances of a return. It's counting cards, rather than the blessing of Fortuna.$NL;$NL;The Gambler perk deck is a support deck. Anyone can help the team win, but it takes the Gambler to help the team win big.
tran_text: Gambler $NL;朝向戰場熔爐需要技巧、冷酷和一點點的運氣。有些人只是有它。$NL;$NL;運氣是一個可望而不可及的能力。古希臘人認為，這是神的設計，它不是，它肯定存在，但這種能力，你可以贏得。它需要充分的準備和深謀遠慮讓你的棋子到位，最大限度地提高一回合中的機會，它是自己贏取，而非財神的眷顧。$NL;$NL;賭徒天賦能力是一個支援能力。任何人都可以幫助團隊取得勝利，但是它需要的賭徒，可以幫助團隊取得完勝。

orig_text: A PAYDAY crew member has a job for you!$NL;Visit them in the safe house to accept their challenge.
Enemies have an additional $health;% more health and deal an additional $damage;% more damage.

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Adds ##$multibasic;## more trip mines to your inventory.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Trip mines can be converted to shaped charges, used to breach certain safes and doors.

orig_text: The world, chico, and everything in it.
tran_text: The world, chico, and everything in it.

orig_text: The Muscle is a tough guy who uses violence to send messages from his Mafia superiors. They are the backbone of any criminal organization.$NL;$NL;The muscle is called in whenever you need to rough someone up, break some legs, crush a skull or remind people who's boss.
tran_text: Muscle $NL;打手是一個使用暴力的硬漢，讓他的黑幫領導展現意志。他們是任何犯罪組織的中堅力量。$NL;$NL;肌肉作用是每當你需要有人糟糕起來，打斷一些腿，壓碎頭顱或提醒人們誰是老大。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;When you kill an enemy using a shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw, you receive a ##$multibasic;## damage bonus for ##$multibasic2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The damage bonus applies to all weapons. Skill must still be activated using a shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers, bows, crossbows or rocket launchers.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;當你使用霰彈槍或電鋸殺死一個敵人後，##$multibasic2;##秒鐘內霰彈槍或電鋸的殺傷力增加##$multibasic;##$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;當你使用霰彈槍或電鋸殺死一個敵人後，所有武器的殺傷力增加相同效果。$NL;$NL;注意：本技能對榴彈砲無效。

orig_text: You can ask a biker to be silent but you can't make him.
tran_text: 你可以要求一個機車幫的人安靜一點，但你沒辦法讓他做到。

orig_text: Jacket doesn't have high requirements for comfort. An old couch and some hardware to mix tapes with is quite enough.
tran_text: Jacket 並沒有對舒適有很高的要求。一把舊長椅及可供混聲的硬件已很足夠。

orig_text: Buy the Gage Spec Ops Pack today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Gage Spec Ops 包！

orig_text: Set join permissions for the game.
The Elephant wants to send a message to Prof. Rossy. Not only does he want the engine stolen, but he wants that brainiac to know that we know his shit. Get the right engine on the first try.
tran_text: Elephant想留個訊息給Rossy博士，他不只想要拿到引擎，還想讓那個聰明的傢伙知道其實他只是狗屁。一次就拿到對的引擎給他看。

Sharpshooter is for those who like precision. Gives you the weapons LOCOMOTIVE 12 G and M308. Your skin thickens and you get harder to kill. Your clever placement of Trip Mines makes sure you always get the last word in - with a big bang.
tran_text: 狙擊手是為了喜歡精確的人而設的。，給你 LOCOMOTIVE 12 G 及 M308 。你的皮會變厚及更難被殺，選擇詭雷能確保你進入－大爆炸。

orig_text: Nationality: North American$NL;Age: 50s$NL;$NL;Once going by the alias August Lindenhurst, he abandoned that moniker for simply "Duke" when joining the Payday gang. For the last several years, Duke has been researching patterns and rumors in the larger criminal underworld. He has an innate need, more like an obsession, to pull off one truly epic heist that will put him in the history books alongside famous robbers of the past and he thinks Bain's gang can help him accomplish that goal.
tran_text: 國籍：北美$NL;年齡： 50 以上$NL;$NL;當他加入 Payday 幫時，他放棄了他的綽號 August Lindenhurst 而只要簡單的 Duke 。接下來幾年， Duke 在更大的犯罪世界中搜索了不同的線索及傳聞。他天生有需要或者該說是固執去與過去著名的劫匪並肩完成真正傳奇劫案去，以令他被寫上歷史書上，他覺得 Bain 的團隊能夠幫他完成這目標。

orig_text: Dragan is the Butcher's confidant on a mission to the U.S. After having been a corrupt agent working in the Balkans, he's been given a fresh identity, a place with the infamous PAYDAY gang as part of a deal between the Butcher and Bain. A new life in America, the land of golden criminal opportunities. Perhaps there, things would be different. The Dragan Character Pack is the 16th DLC and the fourth character pack for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as Dragan, the Croatian heister. Other than Dragan himself, it includes the Infiltrator perk deck, Dragan's mask, Mesari's Cleaver and the Lion's Roar Rifle.
tran_text: Dragan是Butcher的心腹，他被派去美國做一項任務。在一個被收買的巴爾幹官員的幫忙下，Dragan被給予了一個新身份，並且在Bain與Butcher的交易下在惡貫滿盈的PAYDAY幫裡有一席的地位。他會在美國－這個滿是犯罪機會的國度重獲新生。也許在這裡，一切都會變得不一樣。Dragan角色包是PAYDAY的第16個DLC也是第四個角色包。玩家可以控制Dragan，一位來自克羅埃西亞的劫匪。除了Dragan角色。這個角色包包括了入侵者的天賦、Dragan面具、 Mesari's以及Lion's Roar步槍

orig_text: The John Wick Weapon Pack is the 35th pack for PAYDAY 2. The Russians struck first, but John Wick struck the final blow. To get his revenge, John had to dig up his weapons but with them he also dug up his past. Now nothing can stop him from walking his old path, littered with bodies and covered in blood. John's arsenal contains the Contractor Pistol, the Jackal Submachine Gun and the Desertfox Sniper Rifle. Also the pack includes 4 masks, 4 materials and 4 patterns as well as 4 new achievements!
tran_text: John Wick 武器包是 PAYDAY 2 的第 35 個包，是俄國人起頭，但 John Wick 也不是省油的燈。為了報仇，John 必須拿出他陳年的武器但也同時挖出了他過往的舊事。現在已經沒有人可以阻止他走上他過往的道路了，凌亂的屍體佈滿著鮮血。 John 的武器包含 Contractor 手槍、 Jackal 衝鋒槍和沙漠狐狙擊槍。裡面還包含了四個面具、四種材質和四個圖案與四項成就！

orig_text: Bodhi's love for the waves shows in the creation of his boards. The mental preparation reaches one step further for each board he completes.
tran_text: Bodhi 對浪的喜愛使他做了幾塊衝浪板。他每完成一塊，心理上的準備就完成了一步。

orig_text: Mutators let you customize your PAYDAY 2 experience by changing how certain features work or by adding unusual effects to gameplay. Some mutators have modest effects while others can drastically change the feel or the difficulty of the game.
tran_text: 突變讓你改變一些特色或增加幾個特效來自訂化你的 PAYDAY 2 遊玩經驗，有些突變更有極強的效果會令你們改變感受或難度。

orig_text: If Duke weren't a crook, he'd be a Gentleman Adventurer straight out of a 1950s movie. Well educated and read, with a powerful steady voice, he steals more for the thrill and craftsmanship of pulling off a successful heist than any need for monetary sustenance.
tran_text: 如果 Duke 不是個混帳的話，他就是個從 1950 年代電影跑出來的紳士冒險者。受到高等教育以及有強而穩重的聲音，他成功挑戰的劫所需要的技巧程度令人骨悚然，那技巧比那些靠金融業活口的人還好。

Cleaning costs after killing a civilian is reduced by ##$multipro2;##.

orig_text: Buy the Gage Sniper Pack DLC today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Gage 狙擊槍包 DLC！

orig_text: Scarface is getting himself installed next to the kitchen. He just wishes the house had a nicer staircase.
tran_text: Scarface 放置了在廚房旁邊，他只希望屋子內有較好的樓梯。

orig_text: The OVERKILL Pack is our 17th DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to use the Minigun and the Rocket Launcher weapons, the OVERKILL mask as well as a new OVERKILL Escape Van skin. There will be 3 weapon modifications for the Minigun as well as a total 10 extra achievements added. The OVERKILL Pack adds a large amount of Hype Fuel for the Hype Train event with a chance of unlocking additional content for all PAYDAY 2 owners.
tran_text: The OVERKILL Pack是PAYDAY 2的第十七個DLC。它容許劫匪使用Minigun和Rocket Launcher、OVERKILL面具、OVERKILL 廂型車皮膚。Minigun有3個武器零件，加入了10個額外成就。OVERKILL包為Hype Train活動加入了不少的燃料，增加了所有PAYDAY 2玩家解鎖更多內容的機會。

orig_text: Waiting for everyone to pick a card!
tran_text: 等待所有玩家選擇卡片！

orig_text: You have already purchased this room upgrade.
tran_text: 你已經買了這個房間升級了。
選擇你四個優先使用的角色

orig_text: I had my doubts at first, I'll admit, but Jimmy has turned out to have all the skills to excel as a heister of Crime.Net caliber. He has no limits, never turning down a contract and lives every day like it's his last. He is loyal and has proven to be an excellent addition I never thought we needed.
tran_text: 我承認我最初的確有懷疑，但 Jimmy 展現出適合 Crime.net 劫匪的高超技巧。他沒有極限，從不會放棄合約以及竭力活過每一天。他十分忠誠，而且是我從未想到的十分優秀的新人。

orig_text: Rust thinks it'd be a shame to see all that coke wasted. Quick, rush for it!
tran_text: Rust 覺得看到古柯鹼被浪費是一種恥辱。快，追上它！

orig_text: Even a cop can be turned to crime. Ask Bain. Ask Dragan.
tran_text: 就算是警察都可以加入犯罪的。問問 Bain ，問問 Dragan 。

orig_text: A new shooting range, it's time for honing skills and preparing for the next mission. Wick will not go down for lack of training.
tran_text: 一個新的射擊場，是時候展示技能及準備下次的活動了。 Wick 不會因不足練習而走下坡了。

orig_text: Buy the Gage Mod Courier DLC today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Gage Mod Courier DLC！

tran_text: 你需要選擇$missed_mods以完成個人化過程

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your drill and saw makes ##$multibasic;## less noise. Civilians and guards are less likely to hear your drill or saw and sound the alarm.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your drill and saw is silent. Civilians and guards have to see the drill or saw in order to sound the alarm.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;減少電鑽發出的聲量##$multibasic;## ，警衛要很接近電鑽範圍才能聽到它並前來察看。你和隊友會聽到電鑽發出的聲音變小了。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;靜音電鑽，平民及警衛要直接看見電鑽才能察覺它。本技能對熱能鑽同樣有效，但對Big Bank的野獸電鑽無效。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2013-08-13 00:02 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Welcome to crime.net$NL;$NL;Greetings, $player;, and welcome to Crime.net.$NL;$NL;If you are reading this, it means you have been cleared for access to the hub of our organization. Congratulations; You have taken your first step into a larger world.$NL;$NL;Let's have a look at the basic functions of Crime.net. Don't worry if it seems complex at first, everything is more or less self-explanatory.$NL;$NL;» CRIME.NET$NL;This is where you find new jobs, hook up with other crews, learn more about your contacts, and, occasionally, gamble away some of your hard earned off-shore funds.$NL;$NL;» HOSTING A CONTRACT$NL;Jobs with a timer are for you to host. Once the timer reaches zero, that contract will disappear and Crime.net will spawn another. A note on hosting: you are in charge of the contract, and you are responsible for your crew. $NL;$NL;If you drop out, the whole crew loses. Try and keep everyone alive, and make sure everyone makes it to the PAYDAY.$NL;$NL;» JOINING A CONTRACT$NL;Jobs that someone else is hosting have an icon with four men on them instead of a timer. The host's name is diplayed in blue, or green if it's a friend. You can join the crew as long as there is at least one empty slot.$NL;$NL;» DIFFICULTY$NL;Difficulty is rated from zero to four skulls. The more skulls, the harder it is. If this is your first time, pick a no-skull job. Trust me. Four skulls is what we call a Death Wish, and you shouldn't even attempt this until you are at least level 50.$NL;$NL;» REWARDS$NL;Successfully completing a contract will earn you cash and experience. Roll over a contract marker to see what the base payout is. Your final payday may be a lot bigger though; there are bonuses for risk, and you may be able to score additional funds during the heist. Remember: anything you can get your hands on is profit.$NL;$NL;The money and EXP is awarded after each day of the contract is completed. $NL;$NL;Once you've completed the entire contract, you'll also get what we call a PAYDAY: you get to draw a card to unlock a random item. This is how you score rare masks, weapon mods and other useful things. $NL;$NL;» CONTRACT LENGTH$NL;Jobs have different length. Start out doing a few 1 one day jobs before you move on to the longer heists. The EXP reward scales to your level, so there's no reason to kill yourself on a job that's too big for you at the start.$NL;$NL;$NL;THE SLIGHTLY MORE COMPLEX STUFF$NL;$NL;» PRO JOBS$NL;Some jobs have a red outline and 'PRO' label. Pro jobs give a bigger pay and more XP than normal jobs. If you fail however, you don't get to retry. Bear this in mind if you are attempting a multi-day heist.$NL;$NL;» STEALTH$NL;If you see a small ghost icon next to a contract marker, that means it's possible to complete the job without raising the alarm. Doing a job in stealth will net you an EXP bonus, which applies to any contract you take on immediately afterwards. A word of advice: If you're new to this, don't worry about stealth just yet. It  takes a tight crew with some serious skills to pull off a clean stealth job.$NL;$NL;» THE BOOST SYSTEM$NL;If you do the same job repeatedly, the EXP return will start to drop on that particular contract, and it will be boosted on others. The trick of maximising your EXP is to do a wide range of jobs. Boost is displayed with minus signs and a red glow for reduced EXP; and plus signs and an orange glow for increased EXP.$NL;$NL;» CONTRACT BROKER$NL;Once you get some cash together and start to level up, you can visit the contract broker and pick which jobs you want to do. Again, if this is your first time, just run with the offered contracts for now.$NL;$NL;TL;DR:$NL;Use Crime.net to find jobs and make money for that epic PAYDAY.$NL;$NL;This is all you need to know for now. Once you've climbed a few rungs on the criminal ladder, I'll drop you another note and talk you through some of the more complex stuff. Good luck.$NL;$NL;- Bain$NL;
tran_text: 發件人： Bain[bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人： $PLAYER;$NL;日期: 2013-08-13 00:02 (GMT+1)$NL;標題： 歡迎來到Crime.net$NL;$NL;日安， $PLAYER;，歡迎來到Crime.net。$NL;$NL;如果你正在閱讀這封郵件, 說明你已確切地加入到我們組織中心。 恭喜，你打開了新世界的大門。$NL;$NL;讓我們來看看Crime.net的基礎功能。別擔心第一次看起來很複雜，每樣東西或多或少都有它的說明。$NL;$NL;» CRIME.NET$NL;這是你找到新任務，與其他玩家組隊，了解你的合約人，以及偶爾的，可以用你的離岸帳戶賭上一會兒的地方。$NL;$NL;» 主持一個合約$NL;$NL;合約會在地圖上限時出現。一定時間後，合約會消失，而Crime.net將刷新其他的合約。當主機的忠告：你負責整個合約，同時你為你的隊友負責。$NL;$NL;一旦你放棄，整個團隊將失敗。設法讓每個人存活，確保每個人能進入結算那天。$NL;$NL;» 加入一個合約$NL;其他人建立的主機由4人圖標取代限時。主機的名字顯示為藍色，如果是好友則會是綠色。其中只要有空位，你就可以加入。$NL;$NL;» 難度$NL;難度範圍從0至4個骷髏表示。骷髏越多，難度越高。如果這是你的第一次，選擇一個無骷髏標誌的任務。相信我。我們將4顆骷髏代表的難度稱為Death Wish，在你50級之前不能嘗試這個難度。$NL;$NL;» 獎勵$NL;成功完成一個合約將給你經驗與金錢。滾動合約介紹來查看基礎獎勵。你最後的結算日或許可以獲得得更多，風險越大獎勵越豐厚，並且你可能從劫案中獲得額外金錢。記住：任何你到手的東西都算收益。$NL;$NL;金錢與經驗獎勵將在每日合約完成後獲得。$NL;$NL;一旦你完成整個合約，你將進入我們所說的結算日：你將翻開一張卡片來解鎖隨機道具。這可用來收集稀有面具，武器配件以及其他有用的東西。$NL;$NL;» 合約天數$NL;任務有不同的天數。在你選擇更長的劫案之前，就從單天的劫案開始吧。經驗獎勵與你的等級成比例， 所以沒有必要在你剛開始時把自己放入難度過高的任務裡。$NL;$NL;$NL;細小而復雜的東西$NL;$NL;» 專家級任務$NL;$NL;有些任務劃著「專家」的紅標籤。專家任務比普通任務帶來更多的收益以及經驗。如果你失敗了，你將不能重試。在參加多天任務時請牢記這一點。$NL;$NL;» 潛入$NL;如果你在合約旁看到一個小幽靈圖標，那很可能意味著可以​​不觸發警報完成任務。以潛入狀態完成任務將給予你經驗加成，將在下一個任意合約裡立即生效，一句話建議：如果你新來的玩家，先別擔心潛入。完成一個完美潛入需要一個熟悉的團隊並且某些特定技能。$NL;$NL;» 加成系統$NL;如果你反覆做同一個任務，那個任務的經驗獎勵將會降低，然後一直沒做的任務，經驗會受到加成。獲得最大經驗的技巧是做各種各樣的任務。加成顯示減號紅光字體代表減少經驗，加號橙光代表增加經驗。$NL;$NL;» 合約中介$NL;一旦你獲得現金開始升級，你可以遊覽合約中間選擇你想要的任務。再一次，如果這是你第一次，只需要選擇地圖上提供的任務。$NL;$NL;TL;DR：$NL;使用Crime.net來尋找任務並在特定結算日獲得報酬。$NL;$NL;這是你現在所需要知道的一切。某天你攀爬上了新的犯罪階梯，我會給你另一份提示告訴你別的複雜的東西。祝你好運。$NL;$NL;- Bain

orig_text: Once more, OVERKILL and Dennaton Games work together to bring you something awesome. When you buy Hotline Miami 2 Digital Special Edition, we're giving you extra PAYDAY 2 loot to go with it. The Jacket Character Pack is a part of the Hotline Miami 2: Digital Special Edition and is the fifth character pack for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as Jacket, the American Sociopath. Other than Jacket himself, it includes the Sociopath perk deck, Richard Return's mask, Carpenter's Delight hammer and Jacket's Piece.
tran_text: 再一次，OVERKILL與Dennaton遊戲合作帶給你們些很強的東西。當你購買Hotline miami 2 Digital Special Edition，我們將給予你的PAYDAY2額外的贓物。Jacket角色是Hotline miami 2 : Digital Special Edition的其中一部分並且也是PAYDAY2第五個角色包。它讓劫匪們扮演Jacket，一個來自美國的反社會人格者。除了Jacket本身，它還包含了反社會人格牌組，Richard Return's 面具，Carpenter's Delight 錘子以及 Jacket's Piece。

orig_text: Choose a specific track for each heist.
tran_text: 為每一個劫案選擇音樂。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Instead of getting downed instantly, you gain the ability to keep on fighting for ##$multibasic2;## seconds with a ##$multibasic3;## movement penalty before going down.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not trigger on fall or fire damage. $NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the duration of Swan Song by ##$multipro;## seconds. Ammunition won't be depleted while the effect is active.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;當你快倒下時，你不會立刻倒下。你可以奮鬥 ##$multibasic2;## 秒，會受到 ##$multibasic3;## 移動懲罰。$NL;$NL;註：掉落或火焰傷害不會觸發。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你不用換彈，並且延長　##$multipro;##　秒奮鬥時間。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2014-10-17 17:59 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Introducing Perk Decks$NL;$NL;Greetings, $player;. As part of the Crimefest celebrations, let me introduce you to the Perk Decks! The perk decks is a new feature that replaces the old tier bonus system in the skill trees, and adds a new way of fast and free tweaking of your build. A perk deck symbolizes a group of active and passive bonuses that are given to your character. You can pick and choose any of the perk decks and unlock them independently of your level. Only one can be active at any given time. Perk Points are converted from gained EXP points, and you'll keep gaining EXP even after hitting the level cap.$NL;$NL;To gain a perk, simply click and hold the + icon in the perk deck that you want to level up. As long as you have not fully unlocked a perk, you can remove all perk points from that perk and invest them elsewhere.$NL;$NL;Good luck and have fun!$NL;$NL;- Bain
tran_text: 發件人：Bain[Bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人：$player;$NL;日期：2014年10月17日 17=59 (GMT+1)$NL;標題：介紹天賦$NL;$NL;恭喜，$player;。作為犯罪盛宴的慶祝之一，讓我給你介紹天賦！天賦是一項新的功能取代了過去的技能樹裡的階梯獎勵系統，並且增加了一個快速免費優化你技能加點的方法。一組天賦代表一組角色獲得的主動被動加成。你可以選擇使用任何一組天賦並且解鎖使用的經驗與你的等級經驗相獨立。同一時間只有一組可以被激活。天賦點由經驗轉換而來，並且即便等級滿級依然能獲得天賦點。$NL;$NL;為了獲得一條天賦牌組，只需簡單的按住你喜歡的天賦下+這個圖標。只要你沒解鎖全一整個天賦，你可以移除所有天賦點並點到任何地方。$NL;$NL;祝你好運$NL;$NL;- Bain

orig_text: You and your crew's stamina is increased by ##$multiperk;##.$NL;$NL;Increases your shout distance by ##$multiperk2;##.$NL;$NL;When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive ##$multiperk3;## less damage from enemies.$NL;Note: Crew perks do not stack.
tran_text: 你和隊員的耐力增加 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;增加 ##$multiperk2;## 喊叫距離。$NL;$NL;當你跟敵人只有中度距離時，你受到 ##$multiperk3;## 傷害減免。$NL;注意：成員的天賦能力不能疊加。

orig_text: We're going to send a special fuck-you to the authorities. On Election Day, tag the correct truck and get out in 60 seconds.
tran_text: 我們要給當局一份你他媽的特殊問候。選舉日(Election Day)裡，60秒內標記正確卡車並逃離。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2014-02-27 17:45 (GMT)$NL;Subject: Patch notes$NL;$NL;Greetings, $player;. I've been following your progress on Crime.net and have decided to tweak things a bit. I'm patching in a "boost system" that will help you level faster by diversifying your contracts.$NL;$NL;Basically, if you finish a contract, other contracts gain an increased boost in EXP. If you repeat the same contract right away however, you will get less EXP.$NL;$NL;Thanks for using Crime.net $player; and please enjoy this new feature.$NL;$NL;- Bain
tran_text: 發件人：Bain[bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人：$player$NL;日期：2014年2月27日 17時45分 (GMT)$NL;標題：更新記錄$NL;$NL;祝福你，$player;。我看到你在Crime.net的記錄而且想改變一些東西。我正在製造名為"boost系統"的系統，當你做不同的合約時，能更易升級。$NL;$NL;基本上，當你完全一個合約時，其他合約就會有boost加成。如果你一直重覆做同一合約，你將會得到較少的經驗值。$NL;$NL;$player;感謝你使用Crime.net，希望你享受新功能。$NL;$NL;- Bain

價格： ##$basic;## $NL;就是那些凱子，負責購買任務支援的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些喜歡玩手槍，射得又快又準的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些只要給他一把手槍，他就會自己站起來的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些同伴倒地就喊起來，送隊友進監獄的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些不准同伴倒在地上偷懶的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些夢想成為神奇寶貝大師，專收服神奇寶貝的傢伙。 $NL;$NL;可以攜帶並設置醫療包，醫療包可以回復倒下次數， $NL;$NL;醫療包可使用##$multibasic;##次。

orig_text: Once going by the alias August Lindenhurst, he abandoned that moniker for simply "Duke" when joining the Payday gang. For the last several years, Duke has been researching patterns and rumors in the larger criminal underworld. He has an innate need, more like an obsession, to pull off one truly epic heist that will put him in the history books alongside famous robbers of the past and he thinks Bain's gang can help him accomplish that goal.
tran_text: 當他加入 Payday 幫時，他放棄了他的綽號 August Lindenhurst 而只要簡單的 Duke 。接下來幾年， Duke 在更大的犯罪世界中搜索了不同的線索及傳聞。他天生有需要或者該說是固執去與過去著名的劫匪並肩完成真正傳奇劫案去，以令他被寫上歷史書上，他覺得 Bain 的團隊能夠幫他完成這目標。

orig_text: Specify the maximum frame rate in frames per second. Use lower values to Decrease Overheating & Mouse Lag.
tran_text: 指定最大每秒幀數. 使用較低的值可以減少發熱和鼠標延遲.

orig_text: Celebrate the season with the third annual OVERKILL XMas heist. Last year you helped Vlad rescue his drunken brother-in-law and, more importantly, recover a shitload of coke. Well, Vlad is after the happy powder again. He's sending you into an old factory. It's decked out like Santa's workshop, complete with elves making presents. Except these presents aren't for the children. So, you need to force these guys to make presents for Vlad instead. The Santa's Workshop heist is completely free - a merry Christmas from us at OVERKILL to you!
tran_text: 慶祝第三次OVERKILL聖誕劫案。去年你幫助了 Vlad 解救他的酒鬼兄弟並且，更重要的，找回了一堆毒品。好吧，Vlad 又在尋找這些讓人快樂的粉末。他要把你送到一家舊工廠。它被裝飾成了聖誕工坊，完全由精靈製作禮物。 除了這些禮物不是給孩子的。所以，你需要逼這些傢伙為 Vlad 製作禮物。聖誕工坊劫案是完全免費的 － 是來自OVERKILL的所有成員對你們的聖誕祝福！

orig_text: Whenever a Bulldozer spawns, there is a chance that it will be a Medic Bulldozer. A Medic Bulldozer counts as both a Medic and a Bulldozer.
tran_text: 每一個 Bulldozer 出生都有機會轉變成醫療 Bulldozer 。醫療 Bulldozer 同時被當是醫療兵及 Bulldozer 。

tran_text: 小心我把好東西都拿回來。去完成我給你的其中四個任務(可重疊且不限難度)。

orig_text: Did you ever wonder how Gage gets his products on the market? Well, here's your chance to find out! The Gage Mod Courier is the fifth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. Gage wants you to help him collect incoming gun mod shipments in the form of small packages scattered all over D.C. All you gotta do is find them and pick them up. In return, you'll get a share; not of the profits but the products!$NL;$NL;Add 10 achievements that are hooked to the Gage jobs and you're on your way to become the best criminal courier there is.
tran_text: 你有沒有好奇過Gage是怎樣從市場上拿到他的產品嗎？好吧，機會來了！Gage速遞任務是Payday 2第5個DLC。Gage想要你們幫助他在不同特區收集散落從各處航運來的武器速遞小包裹。所有你要做的就是找到並撿起它們。作為回報，你會得到一些分享；不是利潤而是產品！$NL;$NL;增加了10個與Gage速遞任務的成就並且你在成為最好的劫匪的路上繼續前進。

tran_text: 干擾傳出靜音警報。 延誤武裝警察第一到達的反應20秒。

The Crew Chief commands a crew of soldiers and reports directly to a boss or an underboss.$NL;$NL;When the crime syndicate needs to have someone dealt with, the Crew Chief and his soldiers make sure it's done.
tran_text: Crew Chief $NL;扛壩子，又稱軍師，是一個有組織的犯罪集團的一個分支的負責人。扛壩子命令的士兵和成員直接向老闆或二當家報告。$NL;$NL;當黑社會性質組織罪需要有一個人處理事務，扛壩子和他的士兵，能確保完成它。

You do ##$multiperk;## more damage. Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.$NL;$NL;Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by ##$multiperk2;##.

orig_text: Clover grew up in a rough house in a rough part of town. Her ancestors were fighters in every generation, and she is fiercely dedicated to her Irish heritage. She wears the clovers for luck, as well as a way to say "I'm Irish, and I'm proud".
tran_text: Clover從困苦的環境中長大。她的祖先代代都是戰士，而且她致力於保留愛爾蘭的傳統。她戴上幸運草祈求幸運，就像是跟他人說「我是愛爾蘭人我驕傲」。

orig_text: You currently can not find any stealth games as you do not own a silenced weapon. Please attach a silencer to any weapon to join stealth only games.
tran_text: 由於你沒有消音裝備，所以你目前不能搜索到任何潛入劫案，請將消音器接上任何武器以加入只限潛入劫案。

orig_text: VIEW MORE STATS ON YOUR STEAM STATISTICS PAGE.
tran_text: 在你的 STEAM 統計資料頁面查看更多統計資料。

orig_text: Visit Steam now to unlock the Bomb Heists DLC, including two all-new heists, a pistol, three weapon mods, four masks and more! Purchase The Bomb Heists DLC now!
tran_text: 現在遊覽 Steam 以解鎖Bomb Heists DLC ，包括兩個新劫案、一把手槍、三個武器附掛、四個面具及更多！現在購買 Bomb Heists DLC ！

orig_text: In the Shadow Raid heist, steal all the Samurai Armour before grabbing or securing any other loot, playing on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度，在影之襲擊中奪得其他任何贓物前，先偷走整套武士裝甲。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own the PAYDAY 2: A Merry Payday Christmas Soundtrack on Steam

orig_text: Increase or decrease the brightness of your display.
Visit Steam now to add Dragan to the PAYDAY gang, including his mask and weapons of choice! Purchase the DRAGAN CHARACTER PACK DLC now!
tran_text: 現在遊覽 Steam 以加 Dragan 到 PAYDAY 幫，包括他的面具、武器！現在購買  DRAGAN CHARACTER PACK DLC ！

orig_text: PAYDAY 2 - Ultimate Edition now available on Steam!
tran_text: PAYDAY 2 - Ultimate Edition 現已在 Steam 上推出！
解鎖窗戶允許進入天花板。

orig_text: Assault is for those who like massive fire power. Gives you the weapons MARK 11, CROSSKILL .45 and BRENNER 21. You love it when a plan comes together, so you bring extra cable ties to the party. When the going gets rough you bring out the mother of all munitions - the ammo bag.
tran_text: 突擊兵是為了喜歡開火的人而設的，給你武器 MARK 11 、 CROSSKILL .45 及 BRENNER 21 。當有計劃時，你會喜歡它，所以你帶額外的綁繩來派對。當你用光彈藥－彈藥包。

orig_text: Jacket wants you to go party downtown.
Solve the riddle found on day 6 of the Locke & Load Event website.
tran_text: 在 Locke & Load 第六天網頁中解開迷語。

orig_text: Dominate an enemy and kill them using a melee weapon, $max_progress; times.
tran_text: 壓制敵人後，再用近戰裝備宰了他。重覆 $max_progress; 次。

orig_text: The Kingpin is the boss, an autocrat whose every whim must be obeyed. But you gotta get the money first. Then when you get the money, you get the power. Remember, the only thing in this world that gives orders... is balls.
tran_text: Kingpin $NL;毒梟是頭目，一個所有人都要尊敬的獨裁者，但你需要先拿到錢。當你得到錢，就得到力量。記住，這世界中能下命令的 ... 是膽量。

orig_text: Anisotropic filtering increases the crispness of textures at the cost of performance.
tran_text: 反向異性過濾可增加貼圖品質，但效能會因此降低。

orig_text: A more comfortable space with a small TV set. Dallas is starting to feel that this may yet become a worthy HQ for the PAYDAY gang.
tran_text: 在小電視下，這裡變舒服了。 Dallas 開始覺得這裡是 PAYDAY 幫的總部。

orig_text: You do ##$multiperk;## more damage. Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.$NL;$NL;Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by ##$multiperk2;##.
tran_text: 你的傷害增加 ##$multiperk;## 。不適用於近戰武器傷害$NL;$NL;你與醫療包的互動速度增加 ##$multiperk2;## 。

orig_text: The water tanks will be twice as large, allowing longer operation between refills.
tran_text: 鑽機老母的水箱會是正常情況下的兩倍大，可以工作更久的時間。

orig_text: You need to spend $points; more point to unlock tier $tier;
tran_text: 你需要再使用$points;點以解鎖第$tier;欄

orig_text: Adds a contour around throwable pickups
tran_text: 在投擲物周圍增加輪廓
開啟 Xbox 幫助及支援

orig_text: In the Shadow Raid job, secure 16 bags of random loot and all 4 pieces of$NL;the samurai armor.
tran_text: 在影之襲擊(Shadow Raid)任務中獲得16包贓物和4包$NL;武士盔甲。

orig_text: Show Gen-Sec just how basic their security really is. Answer 4 pagers, yourself, within 90 seconds.
tran_text: 讓Gen-Sec看看他們的保全有多弱，在90秒內回覆4支無線電。

orig_text: Send a message to the cops that we fight for our territory. Don't let a single cop set foot on the bridge before you escape.
tran_text: 警告所有條子，在撤離前不要讓任何一個條子過橋。

orig_text: Everyone likes trains. And you like robbing trains too. You cleared one out in the woods once, remember?
tran_text: 所有人都喜歡火車，你都喜歡搶劫火車。你在森林中處理過一輛，還記得嗎？

orig_text: "Hey, it's gonna be just like in that zombie movie... except without all the carnage and blood."
tran_text: 嘿，這將很像僵屍電影 ... 除了大屠殺及血腥。

orig_text: Although Jacket is the last one to brag - he doesn't speak at all - his achievements in the criminal underworld are widely known. Allegedly, he once wiped out the entire Russian mafia in Miami all on his own. His background in the military and his unflinching attitude towards over-the-top violence has made him an excellent hitman - or "messenger" as some like to call it. For unknown reasons he remains completely mute.
tran_text: Jacket從不吹牛-雖然他根本不說話-他的成就在黑社會裡廣為流傳。傳言，他單槍匹馬殺死了邁阿密所有俄羅斯黑幫。有著軍隊服役的背景並且對極端暴力有著執著的信念，這使他成為完美殺手－或者「死亡信使」之類的稱呼。因為不明原因他完全失語。

orig_text: Buy the full version of PAYDAY 2 today!
tran_text: 現在購買劫薪日2完整版！

orig_text: Due to significant changes to the Crime Spree game mode, any ongoing Crime Spree has been cleared.
tran_text: 由於犯罪狂歡有重大改變，任何現在的進度都會被清除。

orig_text: Continue Without Starting a Crime Spree
tran_text: 在不開始犯罪狂歡的情況下繼續

orig_text: Secure the loot on the BFD and escape through the Vegas night sky. NOTE: Van will wait for you outside the delivery area until things go loud.
tran_text: 通過鑽機老母，在維加斯夜幕下運送贓物。注意：潛入的時候仍然會是通過貨車撤離。

orig_text: On day 3 of the Firestarter job, find the rare hockey poster of the OVERKILL hockey team.
tran_text: 在縱火者(Firestarter)第三天中，找到稀有的OVERKILL曲棍球隊海報。

orig_text: A sandsteel Katana really sharpens the look of this room.
tran_text: 砂鐵造的武士刀突顯了這房間的外觀。

orig_text: Kill 100 enemies using heister placed Sentry Guns.
Buy the Yakuza Character Pack DLC today!
tran_text: 立即購買Yakuza Character Pack DLC！

tran_text: 你有足夠硬幣以升級房間！

tran_text: 每一個重裝 SWAT 出生都有機會轉變成 ZEAL 重裝 SWAT 狙擊手。

tran_text: 容許透過Steam中繼服務器連接，關閉時可減少較慢的連接，只有在必要時才開啟。

tran_text: 在偷天換日(Framing Frame)任務第三天，$NL;進行B計畫時，別讓執法單位關掉電源。

tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你攜帶的醫療包增加至 ##$multibasic;## 個。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;醫療包的使用次數增加##$multipro;## 次。

tran_text: 只有主機可以解鎖輔助條件

orig_text: Houston knows that when you have a pile of diamonds, you'll never owe anyone money again.
tran_text: Houston 知道當你有一大堆鑽石時，你將不再欠任何人錢。

orig_text: Damaging an enemy now heals ##$multiperk;## life points every ##$multiperk2;## seconds for ##$multiperk3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk4;## more health.
tran_text: 傷害一個敵人時，每 ##$multiperk2;## 秒回復 ##$multiperk;## 點血量，持續 ##$multiperk3;## 秒。$NL;$NL;你獲得 ##$multiperk4;## 額外血量。

orig_text: The Elephant has a lot riding on the Framing Frame job. Leave no room for error. Trade nine paintings.
tran_text: Elephant對偷天換日(Framing Frame)這個任務期待很高。不要犯錯。交易九幅畫。

orig_text: On day 2 of the Hotline Miami job, reach the Commisar's saferoom before he can destroy any bags of cocaine, on the MAYHEM difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在 MAYHEM 或以上難度的熱線邁阿密 (Hotline Miami) 第二天中，在政委倒掉任何古柯鹼前到達他的安全房。

orig_text: Kill 25 shields using weapons of your choice.
tran_text: 用任何武器擊殺20隻盾兵

orig_text: Hard difficulty is for the real hardcore players. $NL;Available heists:$NL;$NL;FIRST WORLD BANK$NL;HEAT STREET$NL;GREEN BRIDGE$NL;PANIC ROOM$NL;SLAUGHTERHOUSE$NL;DIAMOND HEIST$NL;COUNTERFEIT$NL;UNDERCOVER$NL;NO MERCY$NL;
tran_text: Hard 難度是給真正的困難玩家。 $NL;可用劫案：$NL;$NL;世界第一銀行 (FIRST WORLD BANK)$NL;熱火街頭 (HEAT STREET)$NL;格林大橋 (GREEN BRIDGE)$NL;戰慄空間 (PANIC ROOM)$NL;屠宰場 (SLAUGHTERHOUSE)$NL;鑽石劫掠 (DIAMOND HEIST)$NL;偽鈔風雲 (COUNTERFEIT)$NL;骯髒交易 (UNDERCOVER)$NL;慈愛醫院 (NO MERCY)$NL;

orig_text: The $weapon; has been assembled, and can now be purchased into any empty secondary weapon slot in your inventory.
tran_text: $weapon; 已被組裝，可以於物品庫中購買到任何空的次要武器欄。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can now hip-fire with your Shotguns while sprinting.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your rate of fire is increased by ##$multipro;## while firing from the hip with single shot Shotguns. Shotguns with magazines have their magazine sizes increased by ##$multipro2;## shells.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;跑步時可以用霰彈槍盲射。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;單發式霰彈槍的盲射射速增加##$multipro;##，有彈匣的霰彈槍，裝彈量增加 ##$multipro2;## 。

orig_text: A limo will smash through security. Get out masked and armed. There will be C4 in the limo.
tran_text: 林肯會直接撞進去。 C4直接放置在車後面。

orig_text: Allows helicopter to stay in air longer
tran_text: 讓直昇機可以在空中待更久

orig_text: Players are granted an extra throwable for every $value1; kills.
tran_text: 每殺死 $value1; 個敵人就能獲得額外的投擲物。

orig_text: An insider stashes a backpack with a thermite rig in the selected location. Thermite isn't as fast as the Beast drill, but it's easier to deploy and it never ever jams.
tran_text: 一個內應在選擇地點藏了一箱鋁熱劑。鋁熱劑沒野獸鑽機快，但放置容易並且不會壞。
查看你在遊戲中的統計資料。

orig_text: This is an Aldstone's Heritage Event item!
tran_text: 這是 Aldstone 遺產活動的物品！

orig_text: Search only for lobbies that are running mutators
tran_text: 只搜索激活了突變的大廳

orig_text: Houston wants all the paintings. For interior decoration, you know.
tran_text: Houston 想要所有畫作。用來裝飾房間，你懂的。

orig_text: Cloakers executing a successful charge now cuffs the player instead of downing them.
tran_text: Cloakers 成功踢倒玩家時由倒下變成被銬住。

orig_text: If an artist workspace doesn't feel complete, the work in it never will too. The fanciest mask creation studio in Washington right here.
tran_text: 如果藝術家的工作間感到未完美，那工作都一樣。華盛頓中最花樣的面具創造工坊就在這裡。

orig_text: You've been through so much together. Guess it's one of those love/hate relationships.
tran_text: 你們已經一起完成了很多次，這應該是其中一個又愛又恨的關係。

orig_text: COST: ##$basic;##$NL;The Mastermind is a manipulative leader who excels in situational control.$NL;$NL;Spending the first point in the Mastermind skill tree unlocks the ability to place the doctor bag deployable. The doctor bag can be used to regain health.$NL;$NL;The doctor bag has ##$multibasic;## charges in its basic state.
tran_text: 價格： ##$basic;## $NL;就是那些凱子，負責購買任務支援的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些喜歡玩手槍，射得又快又準的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些只要給他一把手槍，他就會自己站起來的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些同伴倒地就喊起來，送隊友進監獄的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些不准同伴倒在地上偷懶的傢伙。 $NL;就是那些夢想成為神奇寶貝大師，專收服神奇寶貝的傢伙。 $NL;$NL;可以攜帶並設置醫療包，醫療包可以回復倒下次數， $NL;$NL;醫療包可使用##$multibasic;##次。

orig_text: The Butcher wants to see a weapon masterclass. Kill at least 50 enemies and attain a hit accuracy of 101% or above with any shotgun.
tran_text: Butcher想看一些大師級的武器，拿隨便一把霰彈槍至少殺個50人，準度還要超過 101% 喔。

orig_text: Preplanning allows you to learn more about the target and gives you the tools to plan out your perfect heist.$NL;$NL;If you are planning to do a stealth job, focus on surveillance, easier access, and bypassing security. If you plan on going loud, plant supplies at strategic points, and choose fast approaches and exits.$NL;$NL;Preplanning is paid for with cash and favors; however, you can only call so many favors before you raise suspicions and the feds start looking for you. Choose wisely: some plans call for a lot of favors, while others only take a single phone call.$NL;$NL;Expensive, complex operations like safe cracking and escape plans require a vote. In a tie, the host has a casting vote. The host can also override all decisions on placements (but he can't force you to pay for anything you don't agree with).
tran_text: 事前規劃可以讓你獲得更多關於任務目標的訊息，而且提供你工具來策劃你的完美劫案。$NL;$NL;如果你打算潛行，那麼專注於處理監控設備，較容易且安靜的進入方法，或是略過一些周邊警備。如果你打算打一場硬仗，在重要地點放置一些補給，並且選擇一些快速突破點、逃脫點。$NL;$NL;在事前規劃內，你必須付錢，還有人情； 但是， 為了避免聯邦調查局開始懷疑你，因此可使用的人情是有限制的。好好地選擇；有一些規畫將會花費許多的人情，但其他的規畫可能只需要簡單地打一通電話即可使用。$NL;$NL;像是突入方法、逃脫計畫這類昂貴且複雜的規劃則需要投票。如果有複數規劃的票數相同，那麼遊戲主機將有決定的權利。遊戲主機也可以直接強制選擇他想要的事前規劃。（但你不必付錢在你不同意但主機想要選擇的計畫上。）

orig_text: COST: ##$basic;##$NL;The Technician is an expert in the practical application of criminal science, enjoying anything that goes BOOM!$NL;$NL;Spending the first point in the Technician skill tree unlocks the ability to place the trip mine deployable. The trip mine can be used to blow things up, like people and safes.$NL;$NL;##$multibasic;## trip mines are added to your inventory.
tran_text: 價格：##$basic;##$NL;就是那些防彈衣超厚，子彈都打不穿的傢伙。$NL;就是那些拿C4，見門就拆的傢伙。$NL;就是那些拿C4，馬上就用完的傢伙。$NL;就是那些職業病，看到東西就想鑽的傢伙。$NL;就是那些負責開門修電鑽，為隊伍默默付出的傢伙。$NL;就是那些拿槍塔，幫隊伍消耗彈藥的傢伙。$NL;$NL;技師在犯罪科學上是一個專家，十分享受任何東西的BOOM！$NL;$NL;在技師技能樹使用第一點能解鎖放置詭雷的能力，可以炸到人和夾萬。$NL;$NL;可以攜帶##$multibasic;##枚詭雷。

orig_text: Bonnie wants more money. You know she'll spend it.
tran_text: Bonnie 想要更多錢。你知道她會用的。

orig_text: No money awarded. You need to escape first.
tran_text: 還不能領錢，你得先逃脫。

orig_text: Buy the Humble Mask Pack 5 to unlock
tran_text: 購買 Humble 面具包 5 以解鎖

orig_text: Enemies will spawn with more health than normal, making them easier or harder to kill.
tran_text: 敵人生成時血量比正常多，令他們可能更易或更難被殺死。

orig_text: OVERKILL's The Walking Dead: The Lucille Baseball Bat
tran_text: OVERKILL's The Walking Dead: The Lucille Baseball Bat

orig_text: Bodhi is the 7th character pack for PAYDAY 2. He is known as one of the greatest legends in the criminal underworld, being the founding father of the Ex-Presidents gang. His recent feats of strength in Mumbai and Austria got Bain's attention, granting him an invitation to the PAYDAY gang. With Bodhi comes the  Platypus sniper rifle, a utility knife, 2 masks and the Ex-President perk deck. We at OVERKILL are very excited by introducing Bodhi as a member of the PAYDAY gang.
tran_text: Bodhi 是PAYDAY2第7個角色包。Bodhi 是犯罪界的傳奇之一，但鮮有人知面具下的容貌。前總統團的創始人，Bodhi 因為他善於極限運動以及膽大妄為在地下組織間馳名。他最近在孟買和奧地利的壯舉獲得了 Bain 的關注，邀請他加入PAYDAY 團。隨著 Bodhi  而來的 Platypus 狙擊步槍，一把美工刀，2個面具和前總統天賦牌組。我們在OVERKILL的全體員工激動的向你們介紹PAYDAY團新成員  Bodhi。

tran_text: 現在購買Gage 突擊包 DLC！

orig_text: You own $inv_count; of $count; of available mods for this weapon.
tran_text: 你擁有這武器 $count; 個可用配件中的 $inv_count; 個配件。

orig_text: You and your crew will gain ##$multiperk;## max health and ##$multiperk2;## stamina for each hostage up to ##$multiperk3;## times.$NL;$NL;You and your crew will gain ##$multiperk4;## damage reduction for having one or more hostages.$NL;$NL;Note: Crew perks do not stack.$NL;$NL;Deck Completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by ##$multiperk5;##.
tran_text: 每綁住一名人質，你和你的成員增加 ##$multiperk;## 最大血量和 ##$multiperk2;## 耐力，最多加成 ##$multiperk3;## 次。$NL;$NL;當有人質時，你和你的成員獲得 ##$multiperk4;## 傷害減免。$NL;$NL;注意：成員的天賦能力不能疊加。$NL;$NL;牌組完成獎勵：你可以在PAYDAY獲得更高品質物品的機率增加 ##$multiperk5;##。

orig_text: Each enemy the tagged unit kills will now reduce your perk deck item cooldown timer by ##$multiperk;## seconds until you are no longer paired.$NL;$NL;Deck Completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by ##$multiperk2;##.
tran_text: 任何一個敵人被你標記的隊友殺死將會減少 ##$multiperk;## 秒冷卻，直到你們不再是搭檔。牌組完成獎勵：你可以在PAYDAY獲得更高品質物品的機率增加 ##$multiperk2;## 。
碼頭大門控制室 - 左側

orig_text: BASIC:##$basic;##$NL;Increases the time before you start getting detected by ##$multibasic3;## while in casing mode. You can also mark enemies while in casing mode.$NL;$NL;ACE:##$pro;##$NL;You can pick up items while in casing mode. You also gain ##$multipro;## more value to items and cash that you pick up.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;踩點模式時，開始轉暴露度之前的時間增加 ##$multibasic3;## 。且能不戴面具鍵標記警衛和監視器。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你可以在踩點模式撿起物品，你拾取的小型贓物價值增加 ##$multipro;## 。

orig_text: You grant ##$multiperk2;## damage reduction for players in your group. This bonus is doubled for you when you are under ##$multiperk3;## health.
tran_text: 你和隊友獲得 ##$multiperk2;## 傷害減免，當你血量低於 ##$multiperk3;## 時效果加倍。

orig_text: It's not often we get a singular nemesis to overcome, so when we do, it could almost be thought of as a blessing.
tran_text: 我們遇到一個復仇者並不常見，所以當我們遇到時，那基本上一定是被祝福。

orig_text: You will be able to choose one of the following rewards
tran_text: 你將可以選擇一個以下的獎勵

orig_text: All firearms have a chance to spread panic among your enemies. $NL;$NL;Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
tran_text: 所有槍械都有機會使敵人恐慌。$NL;$NL;恐慌會使敵人陷入無法控制的恐懼。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Allows you to turn the trip mines on or off.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Upgrades your trip mines with a sensor mode, highlighting enemies that walk past. During stealth, the trip mines will highlight guards and special enemies for you and your crew.$NL;$NL;If stealth is not an option, the trip mines will highlight special enemies for you and your crew.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;可以按互動鍵開關詭雷的引信。不論自己或隊友設置的詭雷都可以控制。關掉後只能用其他方式來手動引爆。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;能將詭雷升級為發射藍色雷射的感應器模式（取代上述的關閉功能）。當有警衛和特殊敵人經過時不會引爆，改為發出警報聲並會標記出來。沒有此技能的隊友所設置的詭雷，你無法將之改成感應器。$NL;請注意感應器不會對一般人和普通警察有反應。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your armor is increased by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The armor recovery rate of you and your crew is increased by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你的防彈衣裝甲值增加##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你和隊友的防彈衣的回復間隔時間快##$multipro;##。

orig_text: Vlad's niece is celebrating her sweet sixteenth. The DJ she wanted isn't willing to play at her party. Change his mind by going to the Nightclub, tying him and bringing him to the van.
tran_text: Vlad的侄女要慶祝她十六歲的生日，但她點名的DJ並不想在她的宴會演奏。你們可以去夜總會狂歡(NightClub)讓他改變心意，只需要把他綁到廂型車上就可以了。

orig_text: A fee will be deducted from your offshore account when you buy this contract.$NL;$NL;Offshore cost: $contract_fee;
tran_text: 當你購買合約時，會有一筆費用從海外帳戶扣除。$NL;扣除海外帳戶：$contract_fee;
宛如舊日 (Just Like the Old Days)
在 $hours; 小時 $minutes; 分鐘 $seconds; 秒後到期

orig_text: A better workbench and more tools have been acquired. Same old insane ideas, though. This could go somewhere.
tran_text: 更好的工作台及有更多的工具，雖然依舊是那瘋狂的想法，但應該能做到點東西。

orig_text: Kick a player from current game. The player will be banned from joining this session.
tran_text: 將指定玩家踢出當前遊戲。該玩家將不能再加入這個房間。
只使用手槍殺死100個敵人。

orig_text: The guest list will be already uploaded to a memory stick and left in the IT room.
tran_text: 客人名單已上傳至一根隨身碟並留在了IT房。

orig_text: On day 2 of the Rat job, bring additional meth bags to the trade, but steal your payment instead.
tran_text: 在鼠輩(Rats)第二天，交易多餘的贓物，拿到額外的錢，再把貨搶回來。

orig_text: Read and learn. Then dance, dance, dance. Just don't trip, and mind the mines.
tran_text: 從閱讀中學習。然後跳舞，跳舞，跳舞。只是不是踏進陷阱及小心詭雷。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;If you do not lose any armor or health for ##$multibasic;## seconds, you gain ##$multibasic2;## critical hit chance for ##$multibasic3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The critical hit chance duration is increased to ##$multipro;## seconds.$NL;$NL;Taking any damage will cancel the effect.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你##$multibasic;##秒內沒有失去護甲和生命，你獲得##$multibasic3;##秒##$multibasic2;##爆擊率。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;爆擊率持續時間增加至##$multipro;##秒。$NL;$NL;受傷取消效果。

orig_text: Damage absorption from Hysteria Stacks on you is increased by ##$multiperk;##.$NL;$NL;Deck Completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by ##$multiperk2;##.
tran_text: 「歇斯底里症」的傷害吸收提高 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;牌組完成獎勵：你可以在PAYDAY獲得更高品質物品的機率增加 ##$multiperk2;## 。

orig_text: Jiro's corner, where he likes to relax and meditate between heists.
tran_text: Jiro 的角落，他在劫案前後用來放鬆及沉思的地方。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own the PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack on Steam
tran_text: 如果你在 STEAM 上擁有 the PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack 即可解鎖

orig_text: Buy the Gage Sniper Pack DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買 Gage Sniper Pack DLC 來解鎖！

orig_text: Complete 6 heists in the Crime Spree. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 在犯罪狂歡完成 6 個劫案。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;The power and range of your intimidation is increased by ##$multibasic2;## $NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You can now have ##$multipro2;## converted enemies at the same time.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你的威嚇力和範圍增加 ##$multibasic2;## 。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你可以同時擁有 ##$multipro2;## 名被說服敵人。

orig_text: Buy a doctor bag dead drop
tran_text: 在指定地點放置一個醫療包

orig_text: Buy The Alesso Heist DLC today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Alesso 劫案 DLC ！

orig_text: Complete the Shadow Raid on OVERKILL or above using only AMCAR Rifle, Chimano 88 Pistol, the Two-piece Suit and no skills.
tran_text: 僅使用AMCAR步槍、Chimano 88手槍和西裝，並且以無任何技能的方式完成OVERKILL或以上難度的影之襲擊。

orig_text: A Merry Payday Christmas Soundtrack is the fourth DLC pack and the second soundtrack to be released for PAYDAY 2. Pete Gold makes a return as "Ye Olde Hoxton" to sing us into the Holiday season. However, many questions remain unanswered - where has he been? Why isn't he a part of the PAYDAY gang anymore? Will he be back? No one knows.$NL;$NL;Oh, did we say that you get three new Santa masks and extra copies of the soundtrack to give away? It's true! Happy Holidays from us at OVERKILL!
tran_text: Payday聖誕音軌是PAYDAY 2第四個DLC並且是第二個音軌專輯。Pete Gold在這假日的季節以"喲,Old Hoxton"的姿態回歸唱歌給我們聽。實際上，解答了不多問題－比如他在哪裡？為甚麼他不再是PAYDAY幫的一員？他會回來嗎？沒人知道。$NL;$NL;對了，我們又說你會得到三個新聖誕老人面具以及三份音軌的副本？是真的！Overkill祝大家節日快樂！

orig_text: The Charlie Santa Heist is the first annual OVERKILL Xmas heist for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do a classic bank job - robbing the GO Bank, based on a map from Counterstrike: Global Offensive, in the outskirts of Washington D.C.$NL;$NL;This heist is completely free for our players and also introduces a free weapon sight and - of course - a Santa mask for the community. Is there a better Xmas present? We don't think so. Merry Xmas from us at OVERKILL!
tran_text: 聖誕老人劫案是Overkill為第一個PAYDAY2年度策劃的聖誕節劫案，玩家可以去做一個經典的銀行劫案－搶劫全武銀行，這個地圖沿用了Counter Strike:Global Offensive的一個地圖，坐落於華盛頓郊區。$NL;$NL;這個劫案是完全免費的，玩家還會獲得新的武器瞄準鏡－當然－加入Steam上Payday 2群组的玩家會有聖誕老人面具。還會有比這更好的聖誕禮物嗎？我們並不這樣認為。Overkill祝大家聖誕快樂！

orig_text: Chains' room where he tinkers with the gang's weapons and his own pet projects.
tran_text: Chains 的房間被他用來修補伙伴的武器及他自己個人的工程。

orig_text: Protect the safe house from the assault wave.
tran_text: 保護安全屋以避免突擊破壞。

orig_text: $count; modifiers have been added to the crime spree
tran_text: $count; 個修改被加到犯罪狂歡

orig_text: Micho will make sure the garage door won't close when things go loud. Secure the loot in the back of a van parked at near the delivery area.
tran_text: Micho將確保警報響後，車庫門不會鎖上。通過運送站附近的貨車來放置贓物並撤離。

orig_text: On day 2 of the Election Day job, steal all of the extra loot in the storage bins.
tran_text: 在選舉日(Election Day)第二天偷走在倉庫中所有的額外贓物。
CRIME.NET: 警告_覆寫-U -M$NL;用戶: root@cybersecurity.murkywater.org$NL;播放_錄音"L15t3N_uP_p4yd4Y_G4NG.m4u" -L -ENC(0)

orig_text: Turn vsync on or off. Vsync reduces tearing but caps framerate to the refresh rate of your screen.
tran_text: 開啟或關閉垂直同步。垂直同步可以減少畫面撕裂但會鎖定幀率與你的顯示器刷新率一致。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your drilling and sawing efficiency is increased by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Further increases your drilling and sawing efficiency by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;電鑽開啟門及夾萬的時間少##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;電鑽開啟門及夾萬的時間再少##$multipro;##。$NL;注意：本技能對普通熱能鑽有效，但其餘的特殊電鑽則無效。

orig_text: An additional entry point from the roof
tran_text: 解鎖屋頂上額外的進入點

orig_text: Reports have come in that the crime rate is at its lowest point this decade. Lets do something about that, finish 6 jobs on any difficulty.
tran_text: 報告指出犯罪率在最近十年創新低。為了這個報告做點事，在任何難度完成6個任務。

orig_text: Better tools, more beer. Rust is an easy man to please if you do it right.
tran_text: 更好的工具，更多的啤酒。如果你做得對， Rust 很易就高興。

orig_text: Bodhi is known as one of the greatest legends in the world of crime, but few know the man behind the mask. As the founding father of the Ex-Presidents gang, Bodhi's renowned in the criminal underworld for his extreme athleticism and daring heists. His recent feats of strength in Mumbai and Austria got Bain's attention, granting him an invitation to the PAYDAY gang.
tran_text: Bodhi 是犯罪界的傳奇之一，但鮮有人知面具下的容貌。前總統團的創始人，Bodhi 因為他善於極限運動以及膽大妄為在地下組織間馳名。他最近在孟買和奧地利的壯舉獲得了 Bain 的關注，邀請他加入PAYDAY團。
業精於勤荒於嬉 (Because of Training)

orig_text: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by ##$multibasic;##. All your weapons have a ##$multibasic2;## chance to pierce enemy armor.
tran_text: 你可以在PAYDAY獲得更高品質物品的機率增加 ##$multibasic;## 。所有你的武器有 ##$multibasic2;## 機率刺穿敵人護甲。

orig_text: You had to swat some wheels to get this beauty.
tran_text: 你需要拿到一些環來使它更美。

orig_text: $winners; members of the crew made it out, earning each of you an additional $crew_cash;.
tran_text: 成員中的$winners;人成功逃脫，得到額外的錢$crew_cash;。

orig_text: Aldstone asked us to locate an old gas mask used back in WW2, it recently was bought by a wealthy collector. Steal it from him before he leaves the country.
tran_text: Aldstone 叫我們找一個二戰舊式防毒面具，最近被富商收購了，在他離開這國家前偷出來。

orig_text: OVERKILL difficulty is for the insane hardcore players. $NL;Available heists:$NL;$NL;FIRST WORLD BANK$NL;HEAT STREET$NL;GREEN BRIDGE$NL;PANIC ROOM$NL;SLAUGHTERHOUSE$NL;DIAMOND HEIST$NL;COUNTERFEIT$NL;UNDERCOVER$NL;NO MERCY$NL;
tran_text: OVERKILL 難度是給瘋狂困難玩家的。 $NL;可用劫案：$NL;$NL;世界第一銀行 (FIRST WORLD BANK)$NL;熱火街頭 (HEAT STREET)$NL;格林大橋 (GREEN BRIDGE)$NL;戰慄空間 (PANIC ROOM)$NL;屠宰場 (SLAUGHTERHOUSE)$NL;鑽石劫掠 (DIAMOND HEIST)$NL;偽鈔風雲 (COUNTERFEIT)$NL;骯髒交易 (UNDERCOVER)$NL;慈愛醫院 (NO MERCY)$NL;

orig_text: BASIC:##$basic;##$NL;Increases your reload speed with SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Any killing headshot will increase your reload speed by ##$multipro;## for ##$multipro2;## seconds. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;衝鋒槍、突擊步槍和狙擊槍填彈時間快 ##$multibasic;## 。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;爆頭擊殺任一名敵人將會減少你##$multipro;##%的裝填時間，時間維持##$multipro2;##秒。只有單發射擊的衝鋒槍、突擊步槍與狙擊槍能觸發此效果。

orig_text: Cloakers will drop a smokebomb when they kick a player.
tran_text: Cloaker 踢到玩家時將投下煙霧彈。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own Big Bank DLC or PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack
Jacket has found something that you might like, but to get it, you will have to jump through a couple of hoops.
tran_text: Jacket 找到你可能喜歡的東西，但要拿到它，你需要完成某些挑戰。

orig_text: In the Art Gallery job, steal all marked paintings and leave in stealth without killing anybody. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 在藝廊中潛行並不殺死任何一人下偷走所有被標記的畫。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: Dragan may be a former cop, but he's a former Croatian cop, which means his methods make the MPDC look like timid babysitters. He was brought to America and accepted into the PAYDAY gang as a favor to The Butcher. While there were some early suspicions regarding his true loyalties, his ability and commitment are indisputable.
tran_text: Dragan或許曾經是個警察，但他是克羅地亞的警察，意味著他的行為讓地方警署焦頭爛額。作為屠夫的親信他被帶去美國並同意加入PAYDAY幫。當然早些時候他的忠誠受人質疑，但他的能力和承諾是無可爭辯的。

orig_text: Complete the Watchdogs job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above, with the Clone Army - Shields mutator active. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 難度下完成啟用了複製人部隊－盾兵的看門狗。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your melee attacks against non-special enemies do ##$multibasic;## more damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your melee attacks against special enemies do ##$multipro;## more damage.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你對普通警察及敵人的近戰傷害增加##$multibasic;##$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你對特殊警察的近戰傷害增加##$multipro;##

orig_text: Aldstone has found a collector with a WW2 beret, and he's willing to trade it for something equally rare and valuable.
tran_text: Aldstone 找到有二戰貝雷帽的收藏家，他希望用相同稀有及相同價值的物品來交易。

orig_text: Complete the Big Bank job securing all loot and using the default escape plan.
tran_text: 在大銀行 (Big Bank) ，使用預設逃脫，確保所有贓物通關。

orig_text: Turn Alienware LightFX on or off, make sure your Alienware Command Center drivers are up to date.
tran_text: 開啟或關閉Alienware LightFX，請確保你的Alienware Command Center驅動程式是最新的。

orig_text: Your armor recovery rate is increased by ##$multiperk;##.$NL;$NL;When your armor gets depleted you will be immune to health damage for ##$multiperk2;## seconds. This cannot occur more often than once every ##$multiperk3;## seconds.
tran_text: 你的護甲回復速率增加 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;當你的護甲被耗盡後你免疫傷害 ##$multiperk2;## 秒，冷卻時間 ##$multiperk3;## 秒。

orig_text: I've had my eyes on the OVERKILL MC operation for quite some time now, and I knew my way in would be through the man called "Rust". Together with the Elephant we offered Rust a deal he couldn't turn down, and in return, he proved his new loyalty to Crime.Net by killing off his former friends. And just to seal the deal, we're going to help him retrieve something he cares deeply about. Win-win all around.
tran_text: 我盯上在 OVERKILL 電單車幫會的生意好一段時間了，亦知道如果要插手其中，我需要一名關鍵人物「Rust」。我跟 Elephant 聯手向 Rust 提出了一個他不可能拒絕的交易，他亦已殺掉了他的舊友人來向 Payday 幫表忠。要完成這筆交易，我們將會協助他去取回他一直掛念的重要物事。是筆雙嬴的交易。

orig_text: Find the war documents in safety deposit boxes.
tran_text: 在安全的保險箱內找戰爭文件。
再傷害我多點 (Hurt Me More)

orig_text: Players can damage each other with normal weapons.
tran_text: 玩家能用一般的武器傷害到別人。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your steadiness is increased by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the armor of all ballistic vests by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你的穩定度增加##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;防彈背心的裝甲值增加##$multipro;##。

orig_text: Compresses network data before sending which reduces the network load, but makes the game slightly heavier.
tran_text: 在發送數據前壓縮數據包以減少網絡讀取，但會導致遊戲運行緩慢。
明尼阿波利斯警察出現率：高

orig_text: The Sociopath is known to be one of the most effective type of criminals. Where he is effective, he is also difficult to deal with, which is why larger organizations avoid him.$NL;$NL;Bold, disinhibitted and mean, the Sociopath excels in the most violent of jobs. Unable to feel guilt for the crimes he commits, he is a dangerous enemy.
tran_text: Sociopath $NL;反社會人格的瘋子是已知的高暴力罪犯之一，其一他具有強攻擊性，其二他有社交障礙，所以這就是為什麼大型組織見他繞道而過的原因。$NL;$NL;顯而易見總而言之，瘋子擅長最暴力的工作。對他自身犯下的罪行毫無愧疚，作為敵人他是最可怕的。

orig_text: Some way that experiences are best when shared, even in the case of performance-enhancing aerosol dispencers! For that special heister you like, this is something to bond over while you're looting bank vaults and taking care of business.

orig_text: You are an unbreakable wall of resolve and calm. Discipline of the mind helps the Stoic overcome situations that would make others fall crying into shaking heaps. Combinations of breathing and physical reaction-control learned from buddhist monks will let you keep going long enough to finish the job, no matter what the enemy throws at you.
tran_text: Stoic$NL;你是堅毅且沉穩的一道堅固牆。斯多葛主義在紀律輔助之下令你能夠支撐下那些會讓其他人欲哭無淚的情況。在修行時在和尚身上學會控制呼吸及身體反應機能，不論敵人對你如何攻擊你都能讓你持續戰鬥直到完成任務。

This character pack was a part of update 44 and is completely free for our players.

orig_text: The B-Sides Soundtrack is a music DLC from OVERKILL's celebrated composer Simon Viklund with 14 songs that's appeared in trailers and websites announcing PAYDAY content! Just like PAYDAY 2: The Official Soundtrack DLC, the B-Sides Soundtrack will be continually updated as more music is made and not only from trailers and websites, but from other content surrounding PAYDAY too.$NL;$NL;As a bonus, Simon has also added a ringtone for his song "I Will Give You My All" at the request of fans worldwide!
tran_text: 背景原聲帶是來自OVERKILL的一個著名音樂製作人Simon Viklund所作的14首出現在預告片和網站上宣布PAYDAY內容的音樂DLC！就如同Payday 2：官方原聲帶DLC，背景原聲帶將會持續升級增加不只是來自預告片和網站上才有的音樂，還有其他圍繞PAYDAY的內容。$NL;$NL;作為獎勵，在世界範圍內所有粉絲的要求下Simon還增加了一個「I Will Give You My All」 這首歌曲的手機鈴聲！

orig_text: The Diamond Heist DLC is the 13th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds the fourth heist from the new contact known as the Dentist. It's time to shine for the PAYDAY gang with the most exciting heist yet - the Diamond heist. You've heard the legend of the Diamond. A meteorite that was found by Genghis Khan. Carried at the head of his armies. Owned by murderous Kings, and tragic Queens. It may sound like a campfire ghost-story. Curses, legends... Madness, death. Together with the Diamond job, you also get four new masks based on figures of old along with their materials and patterns. 7 new achievements have also been added to make things even more interesting.
tran_text: The Diamond Heist DLC是Payday 2的第十三個DLC，以及是新的合約人--Dentist的第四個劫案。這是Payday幫與最刺激的劫案--驚世鑽奇一起發光發亮了。你一定有聽說過這鑽石的傳說。被鐵木真發現的隕星，帶有他軍隊的頭。曾被不同的人擁有，被刺殺的國王，悲劇的皇后。這聽起來好像營火會上說的鬼故事。詛咒、傳奇、瘋狂、死亡。一起就是驚世鑽奇，你會得到四個基於以前擁有者的新面具、材料、圖案。同時亦增加了七個成就將事件變得更有趣。

orig_text: The Yakuza are one of the most feared crime syndicates in the world. Ruled by the ninkyo and lead by the Oyabun, the Yakuza are known for their strict code of conduct, organized nature and the tattoos that cover their entire bodies.$NL;$NL;An outcast and a dropout from society, the Yakuza knows how it is to fend for himself. While he appears gentle, he is not to be taken lightly.
tran_text: Yakuza $NL;極道是世界上最具威懾力的犯罪集團之一。仁俠是其信條，家族是其組織。極道馳名於嚴格的戒律，黑社會性質以及成員覆滿全身的刺青$NL;$NL;流浪者，被社會遺棄之人，在極道懂得了給養自身。當他的行徑開始得體，就代表他不再是個被小瞧的人物。

orig_text: PAYDAY is two years old! Happy birthday! But what did it mean? Starting on the 18th of October, we at OVERKILL wanted to celebrate 2 years of heists with you guys. Building up to that event we did many announcements. Here are three big ones: we announced the PAYDAY birthday competition, we released the Russian "Mark" the bear mask attainable if you join the Official PAYDAY 2 group on Steam and we introduced the Offshore Payday among many other things!$NL;$NL;If you missed out on the celebrations - don't worry! PAYDAY turns three in 2014.
tran_text: Payday 2歲啦！生日快樂！不過這代表什麼？從10月18日開始，我們OVERKILL的員工希望與你們一起慶祝二週年。開啟了我們已通告多遍的活動。這兒有三大活動：我們曾宣布過的PAYDAY生日競賽，我們新增了俄羅斯「馬克」 熊面具只要你加入steam PAYDAY 2 官方社區就能使用，同時我們帶來了Payday離岸賭場！$NL;$NL;如果你錯過慶典－沒關係！PAYDAY在2014還會有三週年活動。

orig_text: The Gage Assault Pack DLC is the tenth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an arsenal of assault weapons to the PAYDAY gang - when plan A is not an option.$NL;$NL;Three assault rifles, four new melee weapons, the return of the GL40 grenade launcher and a host of mods will make sure to entertain you for a long time to come. Four new super villain masks are yours along with patterns and materials to personalize them further. To spice things up, a concealment feature is introduced for melee weapons. 10 new achievements have made their way into the game to test your mettle.
tran_text: Gage突擊槍包是PAYDAY 2第10個DLC並且為PAYDAY幫的軍火庫增加了新的突擊步槍 - 當A計劃不是個選項.$NL;$NL;3把突擊步槍，4個新近戰武器，GL40榴彈發射器的回歸以及一堆配件足夠你延長遊戲體驗。4個新的惡棍面具現在是你的了，包括了用於塗裝的更多圖案和材質。加點香料，近戰武器加入了隱匿值。10個新成就加入遊戲來考驗你的極限。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Crew members you revive take ##$multibasic3;## less damage for ##$multibasic2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The damage reduction is increased by an additional ##$multipro2;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;隊友在被你救起的##$multibasic2;##秒內，減少##$multibasic3;##所受到的傷害。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;上述效能增加##$multipro2;##。

orig_text: An associate marks where the keys to the doors inside the vault is located.
tran_text: 一位助手標記了金庫內柵欄門的鑰匙位置。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by ##$multibasic2;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by an additional ##$multipro3;## and they also have a ##$multipro4;## increased ammo capacity.
tran_text: 基礎: ##$basic;##$NL;$NL;雙槍的穩定懲罰減少##$multibasic2;##。$NL;$NL;精通: ##$pro;##$NL;雙持武器的後座力懲罰再減少 ##$multipro3;##，並且增加 ##$multipro4;## 的備用彈藥量。

orig_text: The Ghost approach. Hack the vault elevators to block anyone from entering, then climb down through the shaft with the loot and sneak out via the sub-level car lot where the getaway van is parked.
tran_text: 幽靈的辦法。破解金庫電梯從而阻止任何人進入，然後通過與贓物一同爬下軸，經過該層的車很多，其中停泊一輛逃跑用的貨車然後溜出去。

orig_text: This is a Gage Ninja Pack item!
tran_text: 這是一件Gage Ninja Pack的物品！

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;In casing mode, you can mark guards, cameras and your concealment is increased by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You are ##$multipro;## less likely to be targeted when you are close to your crew members.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;在未戴上面具時，你可以標記守衛和監視器，你的隱匿度增加##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你和你的隊友在一起時，你會減少##$multipro;##的機會不會被當成目標。

orig_text: Visit Steam now to get weapons from Chivalry: Medieval Warfare in PAYDAY 2! Purchase the Gage Chivalry Pack DLC now!
tran_text: 現在遊覽Steam在PAYDAY2裡獲得「騎士：中世紀戰爭」(Chivalry: Medieval Warfare)這款遊戲的武器！立即購買Gage騎士包！

orig_text: $name; cheated by using invalid crew loadout.
tran_text: $name; 違法使用無效的隊伍裝備。

orig_text: Police hiding behind a movable wall when you're trying to shoot at them is just so unsporting.
tran_text: 警察藏在可移動的牆後同時你們想射中他們是多麼不公平。

orig_text: Visit Steam now to acquire Wolf's personal stash of guns, gear and heists!$NL;$NL;Purchase the WOLF PACK DLC to host two epic new heists, free for all to join. Also included: the Technician skill tree, which includes three awesome new weapons, a crew bonus, new player upgrades, the deployable Sentry Gun equipment, and a raised level cap.
tran_text: 現在遊覽 Steam 以得到 Wolf 的個人槍、配件、劫案藏品！$NL;$NL;購買 WOLF PACK DLC 以主持兩個傳奇新劫案，所有人都能加入。同時包括：技師技能樹，有三把新武器、隊伍獎勵、新的玩家升級、可放置式步哨槍及提升了的聲望上限。

orig_text: Better facilities and a much nicer lounge. This is beginning to look really good.
tran_text: 更好的設備及更好的大廳，這開始看起來很好了。

orig_text: Someone liked this sandwich so much that they locked in a safe to protect it. It must be really good.
tran_text: 有人喜歡這三文治喜歡到鎖它到保險箱內，它一定很美味。

orig_text: Buy the Biker Character Pack today!
tran_text: 今天購買 Biker 角色包！

orig_text: Complete any heist with the Friendly Fire mutator active, without hurting another player, and on the DEATH WISH difficulty or above. This trophy requires four players in the heist.
tran_text: 在開啟了友軍傷害 (Friendly Fire) 的變異模式下，四人在場並在 DEATH WISH 或以上的難度，完成任何劫案而沒有傷害到任何一個玩家。

orig_text: Spawn bulldozers in gallery - for your enjoyment
tran_text: 在畫廊生成 bulldozer －讓你玩玩

orig_text: A Custom Milled Barrel for the Deagle Pistol.
tran_text: 一個 Deagle 手槍的自定義碾磨槍管。

orig_text: The lower your health, the more movement speed you gain. When your health is below ##$multiperk;##, you will gain up to ##$multiperk2;## movement speed.
tran_text: 當你的血量越少，你的移動速度變快。$NL;當你的血量低於 ##$multiperk;## ，你的移動速度增加 ##$multiperk2;## 。

orig_text: Turn fullscreen on or off. Fullscreen display optimizes performance. Windowed displays allows for multitasking.
tran_text: 開啟或關閉全螢幕模式。全螢幕顯示會優化性能。窗口顯示允許進行多任務。

orig_text: "So, last night I had this dream about a skeleton in a Santa suit. But when he took it off, it wasn't a skeleton, but a King Cloaker. No idea how that's supposed to work. Dreams are some wierd-ass shit."
tran_text: 所以 ... 在昨晚我夢到一個聖誕骷髏。可是當他起飛時，他不是骷髏而是變成了巨大的 Cloaker 王。完全不知道這是三小。夢有時候還真的他媽很扯啊。

orig_text: Two additional Bulldozers are allowed into the level.
tran_text: 在關卡中容許額外兩個 Bulldozer 。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your sentry guns gain ##$multipro;## increased health.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;減少放置步哨塔所需彈藥至##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你的步哨塔增加##$multipro;##血量。

orig_text: A Custom Reinforced Frame for the Judge Shotgun.
tran_text: 一個 Judge 霰彈槍的自定義加強框架。

orig_text: You have earned a ##stealth bonus##:$NL;+$bonus;% XP for your next contract.
tran_text: 你得到##潛行獎勵##$NL;在下一個合約中加$bonus;%經驗值。

orig_text: Turns the HUD on or off.
In the GO Bank job, have the plane pick up all bags of cash with the skyhook.
tran_text: 在全武銀行(GO BANK)裡，讓飛機用空中吊索載走所有的贓物。
罵 / 互動 「按下」或停止 AI 「按住」

orig_text: Wolf wants you to show that you can be a real blademaster.
tran_text: Wolf 想要你證明你可以當一個真正的刀片大師。

tran_text: 基礎劫案已被加入至 Crime.Net 。請問你是新來的？

tran_text: 或$NL;按下任何在 Xbox 360 控制器的按鈕

orig_text: On day 1 of the Election Day job, tag the right truck and leave within a minute of the start of the heist.
tran_text: 在選舉日(Election Day)的第一天，在搶劫開始的一分鐘內標記且追蹤到正確的卡車。

orig_text: Can't be unlocked at this time
"I can brew up a smashingly tasty pot of chili you know, but I doubt even my Five-alarm Habanero Special would be enough to match that chemical intoxocation you are so fond of dealing with.."
tran_text: 你知道我能釀造辣椒碎的，但我不肯定我的五級 Habanero 辣椒能不能比得上化學品造成的失控。

tran_text: 這是 Sydney 角色包的物品！

orig_text: Visit Steam now to get access to three all-new shotguns, ammo types and masks! Purchase the GAGE SHOTGUN PACK DLC now!

orig_text: Standing still and crouching increases your armor recovery rate by ##$multiperk;##.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk2;## crouching movement speed.$NL;$NL;Deck Completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by ##$multiperk2;##.
tran_text: 站立不動和蹲下增加你的護甲回復速率 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;你蹲下移動速度增加 ##$multiperk2;## 。$NL;$NL;牌組完成獎勵：你可以在PAYDAY獲得更高品質物品的機率增加##$multiperk2;##。

orig_text: You gain ##$multiperk;## more health.$NL;$NL;The amount of health received during the Injector effect is increased by ##$multiperk3;## while below ##$multiperk2;## health.
tran_text: 血量增加 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;當血量低於 ##$multiperk2;## 時，注射器效果而轉化的血量增加 ##$multiperk3;## 。

orig_text: Create a custom playlist with your favorite tracks.
tran_text: 創造出你喜歡的劫案音樂清單。

orig_text: Gage is feeling greedy, but is willing to reward generously. He's asking for sixteen pieces of loot from the Murkywater warehouse in Shadow Raid. Also, he wants all of the samurai armor.
tran_text: Gage開始變得貪婪， 但他給我們的報酬則很慷慨。他想在影之襲擊(Shadow Raid)中Murkywater的倉庫獲得十六件贓物，其中更包括四件武士盔甲。

orig_text: Increase or decrease the responsiveness of your horizontal aiming input.
tran_text: 增加或減少水平瞄準輸入的反應度。

tran_text: Gage想填滿他的軍火庫，當我們能做到，將給予我們很多錢。在縱火者(Firestarter)第一天，從倉庫裡偷取所有武器。

tran_text: 需要 第六感 技能來解鎖

tran_text: 在OVERKILL或以上的難度，找到並奪取所有贓物以完成 Murky 火車站 ( Murky Station ) 。

tran_text: 這是 Shadow Warrior 2 的物品！

orig_text: Assemble the Beast drill from the pieces dropped through the lightwell, and use it to chew through the vault door.
tran_text: 組裝從天窗掉落的野獸鑽機部件，並且用它來鑽開金庫。

tran_text: 現在購買 Dragan 角色包 DLC ！

tran_text: 這是 Sydney Swim 的物品！

orig_text: One does not simply board a plane, kill the hostiles, stay alive and manage to find the nine rings given to kings from all the corners of the world. But worth trying.
tran_text: 這一次並不是單純的登機，殺死敵人，保命，而還有的是在世界不同角落中尋找給予了皇帝的九枚戒指。但值得嘗試。

orig_text: This is your Safe House. It starts out a bit rough, but you can upgrade it if you have enough Continental Coins. It's also the place where you display the various trophies that you collect during your criminal exploits.$NL;$NL;You earn Continental Coins by doing heists, or by doing daily jobs for the various heisters.
A perfect garage with a perfect car in it. And a morally flawed but technically proficient mechanic.
tran_text: 完美的車庫內就有完美的車。還有道德出缺憾但技術高超的技工。

orig_text: Increase health gained from ammo packs by additional ##$multiperk;##.

orig_text: Bile's chopper will land near the Loading Dock 3B, just across the Moretta's docking point. You will still have to walk some distance to this escape point, so consider using the zip-line to speed up the process.
tran_text: Bile的直升機，將會降落在Moretta對面的3B碼頭。你還是需要步行一段距離來到這個逃脫地點，你可以考慮使用滑索來加速逃脫。

orig_text: God knows why, but someone is willing to pay big bucks for Almir's Toast. I'm not going to complain. Get into White Xmas and secure that out of there.
tran_text: 我沒有要抱怨的意思，但天曉得為什麼，有人願意用大把鈔票換取Almir的土司。到白色聖誕劫(White Xmas)去拿走它。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can now hip-fire with your weapons while sprinting.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Killing ##$multipro;## enemies with SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons set on automatic fire mode will increase your next reload speed by up to ##$multipro2;##. This bonus is reduced by ##$multipro3;## for each bullet above ##$multipro4;## in the total magazine size, down to a minimum of ##$multipro5;## reload speed increase.

orig_text: Visit Steam now to get a host of new weapon mods for the AK family and the CAR family of weapons! Purchase the Butcher AK/CAR Mod Pack now!

orig_text: Unlocks if you own The Diamond Heist DLC or PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack on Steam
tran_text: 如果你在 STEAM 上擁有 The Diamond Heist DLC 或 PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack 即可解鎖

orig_text: The weapons that tamed the west. The Western Weapon Pack is our 21st DLC for PAYDAY 2. Stare down the law with these older than old school weapons that still pack a punch. Automatic fire is for people who can't aim anyway, right? Make your bullets count with the Peacemaker .45 Revolver where six bullets is enough to see six helmets fly. For those who need a few bullets more there is the Repeater 1874 Sniper Rifle. The Plainsrider Bow if you need no bullets at all. An arrow kills and doesn't make a sound.  Unless you attach a pack of dynamite to it, which you can. The dynamite also comes as a throwable so you don't need to go through the potential hassle of having a bow. Ride off into the sunset with four new masks, patterns and achievements. Giddy up!
tran_text: 征服西部的武器！西部武器包是我們第21個為PAYDAY 2推出的DLC，讓你利用這些老而彌堅的古董武器去盡情蔑視法律。覺得自動武器是給連瞄準也不會的娘炮用的玩具？這把Peacemaker .45左輪手槍的六發子彈，足夠令六個會行會走的頭盔飛起來。擔心六發子彈不夠用？我們有Repeater 1874 狙擊槍。六發子彈也嫌多？使用Plainsrider弓箭套裝來進行無聲刺殺－－或是在箭頭縛上炸藥去大開殺戒。說到炸藥，就算沒有弓箭也能當成手榴彈一樣徒手投擲。戴上全新的四副面具、花紋和新成就，騎上馬，向著夕陽奔馳吧！

orig_text: Defines how wide the players field of view is when aiming.
tran_text: 決定瞄準時視野的寬度。

orig_text: Kill $max_progress; enemies using the Galant Rifle.
tran_text: 使用 Galant 步槍擊殺 $max_progress; 個敵人。

orig_text: In the White Xmas job, secure the rare Almir's Toast.
tran_text: 在白色聖誕劫(White Xmas)劫案裡，取得稀有的Almir吐司。

orig_text: Finish day 3 of the Framing Frame Heist in stealth, having stolen the antique bottle of wine.
tran_text: 潛行完成偷天換日第三天，偷走古董紅酒。

orig_text: Join the PAYDAY 2 community on Steam to get the items above.
tran_text: 加入在Steam上的PAYDAY 2社群以獲得以上物品 。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You revive crew members ##$multibasic;## faster. Shouting at your teammates will increase their movement speed by ##$multibasic2;## for ##$multibasic3;## seconds$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;There is a ##$multipro;## chance that you can revive crew members at a distance of ##$multipro2;## meters by shouting at them.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你救起隊友的時間快##$multibasic;##。 呼喝隊友可增加他的移動速度##$multibasic2;##，維持 ##$multibasic3;##秒。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你能在7米距離內用叫聲遙距救起隊友，成功率##$multipro;##，隔著牆壁和地板亦可。潛行時無法使用。
