tran_text: 這是 Humble 5 號面具包的物品！

orig_text: Buy the Jimmy Character Pack DLC Today!
tran_text: 今天就購買 Jimmy 角色包 DLC！

orig_text: Purchase to gain access to a vantage point
tran_text: 購買讓你進入觀察點的許可

orig_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 40s$NL;$NL;John Wick is a quiet and calm former hitman. He has a seemingly ageless physique, probably from his background as a boxer. John and Chains know each other from before as they used to be in the military together.$NL;$NL;After having gone dark, John recently resurfaced and helped Chains out of a delicate situation. In return, John told Chains he was in need of a crew. How could Chains say no to an old friend?
tran_text: 國籍: 美國 $NL;年齡：40以上 $NL;$NL;John Wick 是個沉穩的前殺手。他擁有看似不老的體魄，大概是由於他作為拳擊手的背景。他和Chains是軍中同袍，所以早就認識彼此。 $NL;$NL;在消聲匿跡許久之後，他最近又復出並幫Chains從微妙的狀態中脫身。他向Chains要求幫手作為回報，而Chains又怎麼能拒絕老朋友呢？ $NL;$NL;當你選擇John Wick做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。
完成「小刀立法」支線任務。

orig_text: The White Xmas Heist is the second annual OVERKILL Xmas heist for PAYDAY 2 and lets players help Vlad rescue his Bosnian Norwegian brother-in-law pilot who crashed his plane carrying a large transport of pure Colombian cocaine. A loud-only heist, players are to escort the drunken pilot and make sure he gets out alive while grabbing as many valuables as they can with them.$NL;$NL;This heist is completely free for our players and also introduces a free weapon and four different community made masks for community - as well as a secret special one! Also, you might recognize the pilot. ;) Merry Xmas from us at OVERKILL!
tran_text: 白色聖誕劫是Overkill為第二個Payday 2年度策劃的聖誕節劫案，玩家需要幫助Vlad救出他的表哥，一个波斯尼亞籍的挪威人。他表哥的直升機墜落了，裡面裝滿了純古柯鹼。一个純火拼的劫案，玩家需要救出喝到爛醉的飛行員並確保他的生命安全，同時收集值錢的東西，越多越好。$NL;$NL;這個任務是對所有玩家都免費開放的，只要你加入Steam上的Payday 2群組，就能獲得一個新武器和四個不同的面具，包括一個秘密禮品！也許，你會發現你認識這個飛行員。 ;) Overkill員工祝大家聖誕快樂！

orig_text: As a new arrival to the criminal elite, the first order of business is for you to get gear and fanfare befitting someone of your status.$NL;$NL;BONUSES:$NL;Your infamous base drop rate is increased from ##$base_chance;## to ##$buffed_chance;##.$NL;Experience gained is increased by ##$xpboost;##.$NL;$NL;ITEMS:$NL;$NL;
tran_text: 作為通往犯罪精英的第一步，職業守則的第一條追尋符合你身份的裝備和聲望。$NL;$NL;獎勵：$NL;你的稀有物基礎掉落率從##$base_chance;##增加到##$buffed_chance;##$NL;結算時的經驗增加##$xpboost;##$NL;對所有技能所需的現金消費減少##$cashcost;##$NL;$NL;物品：$NL;$NL;

orig_text: $cash; Money reward for you and your crew
tran_text: 你和你的團隊獲得 $cash; 的金錢加成
切換武器射擊模式至半自動 / 全自動

orig_text: Community Armor Safe 1 is now live!
tran_text: 社群防彈衣保險箱 1 已被推出！

orig_text: Nationality: Scottish$NL;Age: 43$NL;$NL;Bonnie is from Glasgow. That should be enough to strike fear into a man's heart, but Bonnie is also from 1980's Glasgow. These years, the Thatcher era, made already tough towns even harder, and bred a generation of determined, unforgiving Scots. Bonnie is cut from this cloth.
tran_text: 國籍： 蘇格蘭$NL;年齡： 43$NL;$NL;Bonnie來自蘇格蘭的格拉斯哥，那應該足夠把恐懼帶入男人的心中，但是Bonnie是來自1980年的格拉哥斯，在那個年代柴切爾夫人把這個艱困的城鎮變得更加困苦，這養育了一代無情的蘇格蘭人，而Bonnie就來自於此。$NL;$NL; 當你選擇Bonnie做為你的預設角色，如果她是空置的你就可以一直使用。

tran_text: 這是一件 Point Break 物品!

tran_text: 買一個額外的熱能鑽，讓你能一次使用兩個鑽頭。

tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你現在可以攜帶##$multibasic;##台額外的步哨塔。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你現在可以額外再加帶##$multipro;##台步哨塔。

orig_text: The Biker Character Pack is the 10th character pack for PAYDAY 2. Rust has joined the PAYDAY gang! This latest addition is a hard-boiled, teeth gritting SOB, played by the genuine badass Ron Perlman. Basically a ruthless biker to the core that does what needs to be done. No matter who gets killed. The Biker Character Pack comes with the Breaker 12G Shotgun, the melee Chain Whip together with Rust's mask. Finally, we also have the Biker Perk Deck. The perk deck will give you health and armor as the crew keeps popping good guys.
tran_text: Biker 角色包是 PAYDAY 2 的第十個角色包。 Rust 加入了 PAYDAY 幫！這新血是一個硬漢、牙齒咬緊的王八蛋，是由真正的壞蛋 Ron Perlman 所扮演。他是一個殘酷至極的暴走族，需要做的事他必會完成，而且毫不介意誰被殺了。Biker 角色包同時帶來了 Breaker 12G 霰彈槍、近戰 Chain Whip ，以及 Rust 的面具。最後，我們還有暴走族天賦牌組。當你的隊伍一直殺人時，這天賦會給你血量及裝甲值。

orig_text: Next Forced Modifier: +$forced;$BTN_SPREE_TICKET;.  Next Loud Modifier: +$loud;$BTN_SPREE_TICKET;.  Next Stealth modifier: +$stealth;$BTN_SPREE_TICKET;.
tran_text: 下一個必然修改： +$forced;$BTN_SPREE_TICKET; 。 下一個火拼修改： +$loud;$BTN_SPREE_TICKET; 。 下一個潛行修改： +$stealth;$BTN_SPREE_TICKET; 。

orig_text: Nostalgic people prefer to only think about what was good back in the day, easily forgetting the bad days. Like when you're robbing a bank with shoddy weapons and poor armor.
tran_text: 念舊的人們比較喜歡回想那些以前的好時光，而不好的時光他們很容易地就忘記了。就像當初你們帶著劣質的武器和穿著破爛的防彈衣來搶銀行。

orig_text: Dragan says escape plans are for sissies. 'Let's just do it,' he says.
tran_text: Dragan 說逃脫計畫是給那些娘泡用的，「我們直接做吧。」他說。

orig_text: Every day a heister in the safe house will have a challenge for you! Meet with them in the safe house to accept their challenge, and then go out into the world to complete the requirements. Complete the challenge, and they'll give you a few Continental Coins for your troubles.$NL;$NL;Wick managed to get the PAYDAY crew membership to The Continental, so they're giving you coins for every heist you pull off. With enough coins, Charlie and his boys will come in and do a little redecorating for us, and make sure that any work done stays off the books.
tran_text: 每天在安全屋內都有一個劫匪能提供一個挑戰給你！在安全屋找到他們以接受他們的挑戰，然後在其他地方完成挑戰。完成挑戰後，他們將會給你一些歐洲幣作為報酬。$NL;$NL;Wick 將 PAYDAY 幫延伸到歐洲，所以當你完成劫案後他們會給你硬幣。有足夠的硬幣後， Charlie 及他們的會來幫我們重新裝飾，及確保一切保密。

orig_text: This weapon skin contains its own set of weapon modifications and will replace your current configuration.
tran_text: 此皮膚有設計好的配件並將取代你的配件設計。

orig_text: A vault worthy of a major bank. Or of those who repeatedly rob major banks.
tran_text: 一個追上主要銀行大小的金庫，或者是我們常搶的銀行的金庫。
完成任意 $max_progress; 個經典劫案。

orig_text: All bulldozers are equipped with a shield for protection.
tran_text: 所有 bulldozer 都裝上了盾作為防護。

tran_text: 現在購買暴走族劫案 DLC！

It will cost ##$cost;## Continental Coins to upgrade this room.
tran_text: 將會使用 ##$cost;## 個歐洲幣以升級這房間。

orig_text: In the Four Stores job, find a gold bar in a safe.
tran_text: 在四家商店(Four Stores)中，在保險箱中找到金條。

orig_text: When you pick up ammo, you trigger an ammo pickup for ##$multiperk;## of normal pickup to other players in your team.$NL;$NL;Cannot occur more than once every ##$multiperk2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk3;## more health.
tran_text: 當你撿起子彈，你可以幫你隊友撿起 ##$multiperk;## 的彈藥量。$NL;$NL;技能冷卻時間 ##$multiperk2;## 秒。

orig_text: The Gage Chivalry Pack is the 28th DLC for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Torn Banner Studios and OVERKILL! Go medieval on D.C.'s finest with weapons from Gage's latest stolen goods including the Great Sword, the Morning Star, the Buckler Shield and the Bearded Axe that all fit in the melee slot. If ranged combat is more your thing you can use the Heavy Crossbow, the Light Crossbow or the classic English Longbow that all come with explosive and poison customization. And when all else fails trust in the throwable Javelin to save the day, just make sure to hit them right between the eyes. The Gage Chivalry Pack also includes four helmets from Chivalry: Medieval Warfare and four medieval themed patterns and materials as well as four new achievements!
tran_text: Gage騎士包是PAYDAY2第28個DLC並且是OVERKILL與撕裂的旗幟影城的合作項目！用Gage最新偷來的武器給華盛頓來場中世紀旋風，包括巨劍，晨星錘，小圓盾以及倒鉤斧來填滿你的近戰倉庫。如果你更喜歡遠距離作戰你可以使用重弩，輕弩或者傳統的英格蘭長弓均配備有爆炸以及毒箭。彈盡糧絕時投擲標槍來拯救世界，只要記住往雙眼之間瞄準就行。Gage騎士包同時含有四個來自「騎士：中世紀戰爭」(Chivalry: Medieval Warfare)這款遊戲的頭盔以及四材質紋樣和四個新成就！

orig_text: This is a Biker Heist DLC item!
tran_text: 這是 Biker 劫案 DLC 的物品！
取得報酬：隨機武器零件

orig_text: Kill 100 enemies using only assault rifles.
tran_text: 只用突擊步槍擊殺100個敵人。

orig_text: Buy the Scarface Heist Pack today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Scarface 劫案包 DLC！

orig_text: Background data and insider info on the heist from Bain.
tran_text: 從Bain那兒獲得背景資料以及內部情報。

orig_text: Kill 100 enemies with headshots using weapons of your choice.
Increases the maximum health that can be stored by ##$multiperk;##.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk2;## more health.$NL;$NL;Your chance to dodge is increased by ##$multiperk3;##.
tran_text: 能量值上限增加 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;最大生命增加 ##$multiperk2;## 。$NL;$NL;閃避率增加 ##$multiperk3;##。

orig_text: This Halloween, there will be HELL TO PAY! The First Annual PAYDAY Halloween Special! Moahaha! The Halloween event added the Interceptor .45 handgun for free to everyone who joins the PAYDAY Official group on Steam. It also introduced 14 new achievements for those who dared to complete them! We also increased everyone's mask slot inventory so you could hold up to 36 masks at the same time! Four super spooky Halloween masks were made available to get during the event as well.$NL;$NL;Finally, the safe house was made into something taken from a scary movie, only to return next year in one shape or another...
tran_text: 現在是萬聖節,這可麻煩了！ 第一年Payday 2萬聖節特典！ 咩哈哈！ 只要加入Steam上的Payday 2群組,萬聖節事件將免費增加了Interceptor .45 handgun.同樣增加了14個新成就給那些膽敢完成他們的人！ 我們還增加給每個人庫存中更多的面具空位,這樣你們就能同時擁有36個面具了！同樣四個超級驚嚇的萬聖節面具可以在整個活動中得到.$NL;$NL;最後,安全屋被製成某些來看恐怖電影中的東西,  將會在來年再次同樣或不同形式回歸...

orig_text: Visit Steam now to play The Alesso heist, get a new weapon, new weapon mods, masks, materials and patterns! Purchase The Alesso Heist DLC now!
tran_text: 現在遊覽 Steam 以遊玩 Alesso 劫案，得到新武器、武器附掛、面具、材質及圖案！現在購買 Alesso Heists DLC ！

tran_text: 這是一件Sokol 角色包的物品！

orig_text: COST: ##$basic;##$NL;The Enforcer is a violent criminal, usually employed by crime syndicates to execute jobs that no one else can.$NL;$NL;Spending the first point in the Enforcer skill tree unlocks the ability to place the ammo bag deployable. The ammo bag can be used to gain ammo.
tran_text: 價格： ##$basic;##$NL;就是那些穿著重甲就無敵的傢伙。$NL;就是那些拿著霰彈槍，一發一隻的傢伙。$NL;就是那些跑不快，每次都被隊友海放的傢伙。$NL;就是那些拿電鋸，負責開門的傢伙。$NL;就是那些為了輸出，死都不吃急救包的傢伙。$NL;就是那些軍火庫，子彈多到可以反攻大陸的傢伙。$NL;$NL;可以攜帶彈藥包，彈藥包內有彈藥。

orig_text: We can't risk any interference while we cook up a little product. Produce three bags worth of meth on Rats (Day 1) without letting a single fucking cop in the house.
tran_text: 任何一點點被干擾的風險我們都承擔不起，所以在鼠輩(Rats)第一天，做三包冰毒而且過程中別讓任何一個欠幹的條子進到房子裡。

orig_text: It gets so messy when you shoot people in the face. But on a dark suit you barely notice the wounds. John Wick knows this.
tran_text: 射到別人的面會很麻煩。但在黑色的西裝上僅會被當成傷口。 John Wick 知道的。

orig_text: Successfully defend the safehouse in the Safehouse Raid job 3 times. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 在安全屋偷襲成功防守安全屋 3 次。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete day 2 without using a single keycard on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在老哈越獄記(Hoxton Breakout)中，OVERKILL難度以上，不使用任何鑰匙卡完成第二天。
完成挑戰已賺到了: $amount; 個歐洲幣。

orig_text: This is a Western Weapon Pack Item!
tran_text: 這是 Western Weapon Pack 的物品！

orig_text: Happy New Year, heisters! All of us at OVERKILL Software and Starbreeze Studios sincerely hope you had a wonderful holiday, and would like to wish you a happy, healthy and prosperous 2015. But the bells haven't stopped ringing yet. We are set to start your 2015 with a big win. And not a close-fought win on judges' points - this is a three round straight knockout! To start the new year off, we give you the Champ mask along with the OVERKILL boxing gloves. As we previously announced, we will continue working on PAYDAY 2 well into 2016. As long as you guys want to heist, we aim to deliver the best heisting experience available.
tran_text: 劫匪們，新年快樂！所有OVERKILL和Starbreeze Studios勤懇地希望你們有美妙的假期，祝你們有快樂、健康、富裕的2015年。不過鐘聲並沒有停止過。我們準備了以一個大勝利來開始你們的2015年。不要以近距離戰鬥來賺取裁判的分數-這是一個三回合直接的戰鬥！開始新年活動，我們會給予你Champ面具及OVERKILL拳擊手套。正如我們之前的宣佈，我們將會繼續開發PAYDAY 2直至2016年。我們知道你們正煩惱下個能搶的目標是啥，而我們會盡可能的替你找出絕佳的搶劫地點。

orig_text: Precision and effectiveness can often go hand-in-hand with brutal mercy. We, well most of us, don't take pleasure in the necessary downing of our enemies, so why not ease their suffering with a quick kill?
tran_text: 精準跟快速可以配搭起殘酷的憐憫，我們，至少大多數，都不需要透過殺死敵人獲得快樂，為何不快速殺死他們？

orig_text: An expertly placed explosive on the train tracks will give us some control over where the individual wagons will land.
tran_text: 精密放置的炸彈可以讓我們控制每節車廂的掉落位置。

orig_text: A large shipment is en route to the East Coast containing mods to the most popular classics - the American CAR and the Russian AK. The Butcher's AK/CAR Mod Pack is the 19th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Butcher is looking to gain a market share by providing unique mods for two of the most popular weapon families - and with good reason. Simple, robust weapons that can be modded to specialise in whatever role you wish. 22 new weapon mods are added as well as 4 new masks from a prehistoric age. 8 new achievements have also been added to help you unlock the weapon mods with.
tran_text: 大量的經典武器的配件將會被運到東海岸－也就是美國的CAR系列槍與俄羅斯的AK系列槍. Butcher AK/CAR模組包是Payday 2第19個DLC。Butcher正在通過提供兩款熱銷經典武器系列的獨特配件來獲得市場－伴隨其良好的理由。你能隨心所欲改裝這些簡單粗暴的武器。增加了22個新武器模組以及來自遠古時代的4個面具。增加了8個新成就助你解鎖配件。

orig_text: Visit Steam now to play the Point Break heists, get a new weapon, masks, materials and patterns! Purchase the POINT BREAK HEISTS DLC now!
tran_text: 在Steam上購買遊戲來暢玩Point Break Heists，得到一把新武器，面具，材質以及紋樣！立即購買極盜者劫案DLC吧！

難聽的舞池音樂，減少舞池中的人數

tran_text: 如果你接受，你將沒有可以使用的主武器。在主、副武器欄的第一格武器($primary;)會被賣掉並換成基本槍枝($amcar;)。
幕府將軍：全軍破敵 (Total Shogun)

orig_text: Visit Steam now to purchase PAYDAY 2 which will give you the ultimate heist experience. The full game includes much more content like heists, characters, weapons and more! Purchase PAYDAY 2 now!
tran_text: 到Steam上購買PAYDAY 2，一款可以帶來極致搶劫體驗的遊戲。完整遊戲包含更多的內容，例如搶案、角色、武器以及更多！現在就買PAYDAY 2吧！

orig_text: Parabellum meaning "Prepare for War". So carrying the Parabellum Pistol means you are always prepared, no matter what type of obstacle that might appear.
tran_text: Parabellum 代表「戰爭準備」，所以使用 Parabellum 手槍代表你一直都準備好，不論你面前的是甚麼障礙。

orig_text: The AI Teammates will fill the empty player slots in your own lobby as soon as you start the game. By specifying their loadouts in the Crew Management you can decide which weapons, abilities and boosts they have. New players that join your game will replace the AI Teammates in a bottom up order, starting with loadout number 3.$NL;$NL;Characters will be assigned to the AI Teammates according to the selected Character Priority if available.
tran_text: 在開始遊戲時， AI 隊友將會佔用你的大廳中的空位，在隊伍管理選取他們的裝備，你能幫他們選擇武器、能力跟加成。新玩家加入你的遊戲時將由底開始取代你的 AI 隊友，由 3 開始。$NL;$NL;AI 角色會根據角色排序而決定。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can dual wield two weapons. These can be found under the Akimbo tab in the inventory menu.$NL;$NL; Dual wielded weapons have ##$multibasic;## stability penalty.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your stability penalty with Akimbo weapons is set to ##$multipro;## and increases the ammo capacity of your Akimbo weapons to ##$multipro2;##.
tran_text: 基礎: ##$basic;##$NL;你可以一次拿著兩把武器。雙持武器列表可以在物品選單中的「雙槍」列表下找到。$NL;$NL;雙持武器有##$multibasic;##的穩定懲罰。$NL;$NL;精通: ##$pro;##$NL;雙持武器的後座力懲罰提高至 ##$multipro;##，並且增加 ##$multipro2;## 的備用彈藥量。

orig_text: Use it to display your unmatched throwing accuracy. Grenades don't count.
tran_text: 用它來顯示出你無與倫比的投擲準度。但不計算手榴彈。

orig_text: A getaway speedboat will arrive very close to the Moretta, making this the fastest escape point. This escape will also be available if you manage to find the bomb without sounding the alarm.
tran_text: 一艘快艇將會停泊在靠近Moretta的地方，讓你能夠以最快速的方式逃逸。潛行就算不買這個也能有快艇來載你回家。

orig_text: The Hitman is a professional killer from the criminal underworld who excels at close and ranged combat.$NL;$NL;Criminal syndicates will hire a hitman as a last resort to enforce criminal authority, deliver retribution or eliminate competition.
tran_text: Hitman $NL;殺手是黑社會中擅長在近距離和遠程作戰的職業殺手。$NL;$NL;犯罪集團將僱傭殺手作為最後的手段來表達實施犯罪的權威,表達報復或消除競爭。

orig_text: An associate unlocks a window for you to sneak through.
tran_text: 一位助手為你打開了扇窗幫你悄然進入。

orig_text: Jimmy wants you to bring him some more meth. No, lots more.
tran_text: Jimmy 想要你幫他帶一些冰毒回來。不，不只一些。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your melee attacks against non-special enemies do ##$multibasic;## more damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your melee attacks against special enemies do ##$multipro;## more damage.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你對普通警察及敵人的近戰傷害增加##$multibasic;##$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你對特殊警察的近戰傷害增加##$multipro;##
是的，他是個淘金客(Yeah He's a Gold Digger)

tran_text: 使用雙槍為主武器以及消音手槍為副武器的狀態下，以 80% 或以上的準確度完成關卡。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2015-03-05 02:02 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: INFAMY 2.0!$NL;$NL;This is it, $player;, you can now rise to new infamy levels and gain additional infamy points.$NL;$NL;Here is how it works:$NL;$NL;Just like before you spend your infamy points to unlock experience bonuses, masks and patterns. What you need to keep an eye on is that after the five first infamy boxes, some of the boxes only give experience gain increase and some give experience gain increase and a new special mask.$NL;$NL;Also, after infamy level 5, becoming infamous will not have any money requirement. Your initial investment is enough for you to rise in the criminal world only by successfully completing heists.$NL;$NL;Now get out there and make sure everyone will know about the Payday Gang!$NL;$NL;- Bain$NL;
tran_text: 發件人：Bain[bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人： $player$NL;日期：2015年3月5 2時2分 (GMT+1)$NL;標題：惡名2.0！$NL;$NL;成敗在此一舉， $player;，現在你能夠升到新的惡名等級並能獲得更多的惡名點數。$NL;$NL;它是這樣運作：$NL;$NL;這就像你以前使用惡名點數來解鎖經驗值獎勵、面具、圖案。你需要重視的是在本來的五個惡名後，有些是只增加經驗值獎勵，有些是增加經驗值獎勵及新的面具。$NL;$NL;另外在惡名等級五級後，再次惡名轉生並不需要任何金錢，你本來的投資已足夠你在犯罪世界上只靠完全劫案來升級。$NL;$NL;現在離開這裡並確保每個人都認識PAYDAY幫！$NL;$NL;- Bain$NL;

orig_text: The Gage Shotgun Pack DLC is the ninth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds Gage's favorite shotguns to the player's weapon arsenal. Depending on what kind of ammo type you use, the shotgun pellets you fire can have armor penetration or be explosive, stunning your opponents.$NL;$NL;Three shotguns, four new ammo types, weapon mods, four new masks, patterns and materials and 12 shotgun oriented achievements for the player to master.
tran_text: Gage霰彈包是Payday 2第9個DLC並且增加了Gage最愛的霰彈槍到玩家的軍火庫 .取決於你用甚麼類型的子彈,霰彈槍射出的子彈可以穿甲或者爆炸, 震暈你的敵人.$NL;$NL;三把霰彈槍,四種新的彈藥類型, 武器零件, 四個新面具, 圖案和材料還有12個霰彈槍相關的成就讓玩家來征服.

You gain ##$multiperk;## increased concealment.$NL;$NL;When wearing armor, your movement speed is ##$multiperk2;## less affected.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk3;## more experience when you complete days and jobs.
tran_text: 你增加##$multiperk;##隱匿度。$NL;$NL;當穿上護甲時，你的移動懲罰會減少##$multiperk2;##。$NL;$NL;當完成任務時，你會多得到##$multiperk3;##經驗值。

orig_text: This is a Hotline Miami item!

The Death Wish update is the second late-game update to PAYDAY 2. It allows players to explore the new difficulty Death Wish which makes any serious heisters sweat and dream nightmares. It adds two more enemy types called the Elite Bulldozer and the Gensec Elite SWAT's. It also adds new masks for anyone who dares to complete all heists in a specific difficulty. Add to that 35 new achievements and many other fixes and features and you have yourself an update worthy of the best career criminals out there.
tran_text: Death Wish更新是Payday 2的第二個遊戲後期更新。它允許玩家去探索新的難度Death Wish。這使得它成為任何認真的強盜們汗水和希望的夢魘。它增加了兩個所謂的Skulldozer和Gensec精英特警的多個敵人類型。它還增加了新的面具，只要在一個特定的難度完成所有劫案。再加上35個新的成就和許多其他修復和功能，全新的自己，在那裡有當之無愧的頂尖職業罪犯。

orig_text: The Goat Simulator DLC is the 30th pack for PAYDAY 2, and is a collaboration between Coffee Stain Studios and OVERKILL. Vlad has a new mission for the gang, but things quickly get more... complicated once they arrive at the scene. With this update we introduce a brand new two-day heist that is unlike anything we've done before. Together with this comes a new shotgun, four melee weapons, four masks, four patterns, four materials and finally two new tracks from Simon Viklund.
tran_text: 模擬山羊是PAYDAY 2第30個DLC，然後是 Coffee Stain Studios 和 OVERKILL 聯動DLC。Vlad 為團隊帶來了新任務，但當他們到達現場... 事情變得相當的複雜。隨著更新我們介紹一個全新與我們曾經做過的完全不同的兩日劫案。隨之而來的是一把新的霰彈槍，四把近戰武器、四個面具、四種紋樣、四種材質以及來自 Simon Viklund 兩首新音軌。

orig_text: Buy the Gage Shotgun Pack DLC today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Gage 霰彈槍包 DLC！

orig_text: The completely OVERKILL pack which is limited to only 50,000 copies includes 4 very special and modified masks of the original crew members of the PAYDAY gang. These masks are the evolved versions of the classic originals. Even though they are heavily modified, they still hold the charm that the original masks have. This pack also includes the secret special item which will be revealed and unlocked at a later date.
tran_text: Completely OVERKILL Pack，限量50,000份，其中包括4個非常特殊和可改裝的PAYDAY幫的原始成員的面具。這些面具是經典原型的進化版本。即便它們曾被大量修改，他們仍然富有經典面具的魅力。這個DLC還包括日後將被揭示的和解鎖特殊秘密物品。

orig_text: Upgrade room by clicking on it

Knock, Knock. Who's There? THE HEADLESS TITANDOZER FROM HELL! Welcome to the Second Annual PAYDAY Halloween Special! This Halloween, we teamed up with Humble Bundle to give you two new and exclusive Halloween masks for free. The Psycho Knife was added to the game, which also makes a peculiar sound when charged up. We also increased everyone's mask slot inventory so you could hold up to 72 masks at the same time! Four super spooky Halloween masks returned and were available during the event as well. Finally, the safe house was made into something taken from a scary movie with a new guest, only to return next year in one shape or another...
tran_text: 敲,敲.誰在那？ 無頭的TITANDOZER從地獄而來！ 歡迎來到第二年的Payday 2萬聖節特典！ 現在是萬聖節, 我們與Humble Bundle合作免費給你們兩個新的獨有的萬聖節面具. 遊戲中增加了Psycho Knife, 蓄力之後會有獨特的聲效. 我們還增加了每個人面具的庫存空位數,這樣你就可以同時擁有72個面具了！ 四個超級驚嚇的萬聖節面具回來了並且在整個活動時間中都可得到.最後, 安全屋有一位新客人亦是從某些恐怖電影而來的東西, 將會在來年再次同樣或不同形式回歸...

orig_text: The Hardcore Heists is the 33rd pack for PAYDAY 2, and is tailored for both our stealth and action oriented players, combining the best of PAYDAY's core gameplay. In "Murky Station", the gang needs to infiltrate a hidden train yard operated by Murkywater. The players need to get their hands on the EMP bomb without raising the alarm, otherwise they fail. In "Boiling Point", the gang heads to Russia to find a hidden laboratory containing data that could change everything we know about this world. But beware: Russian mercenaries will be doing everything they can to stop you, so get ready to fight for your life. Together with these two new heists comes the new White Streak Pistol, Electrical Brass Knuckles, four masks, four patterns, four materials, ten achievements and finally two new tracks from Simon Viklund.
tran_text: 超狂亨利劫案是 PAYDAY 2 的第三十三個 DLC，而且同時為我們的潛行主導及動作主導的玩家量身定制了劫案，結合了 PAYDAY 中最主要的內容。在「 Murky 火車站 (Murky Station) 」中，大家需要滲入 Murkywater 的隱藏火車庫。玩家需要獲得 EMP 炸彈但不可以引起警鈴。在「沸點 (Boiling Point) 」中，大家前往俄羅斯以尋找隱藏的實驗室，當中包含一些改變全世界的數據。但要小心：俄羅斯僱傭兵將會用盡一切辦法阻止你，所以準備好為自己的生命而戰。除了這兩個劫案還帶來了 White Streak 手槍、Electrical Brass Knuckles 、四個面具、四個圖案、四種材料、十個成就，還有來自 Simon Viklund 的兩個新聲軌。

orig_text: Unlocks and equips the Gas Dispenser.$NL;$NL;To activate the Gas Dispenser you need to look at another allied unit within a ##$multiperk;## meter radius with clear line of sight and press the throwable key to tag them.$NL;$NL;Each enemy you or the tagged unit kills will now heal you for ##$multiperk2;## health and the tagged unit for ##$multiperk3;## health.$NL;$NL;Each enemy you kill will now extend the duration of the effect by ##$multiperk4;## seconds and reduce the cooldown timer by 2 seconds.$NL;$NL;The effect will last for a duration of ##$multiperk5;## seconds and has a cooldown of ##$multiperk6;## seconds.
tran_text: 解鎖並裝備氣體噴罐。$NL;$NL;要啟動氣體噴罐你必須要有一個在 ##$multiperk;## 米半徑視線範圍內的隊友並且使用投擲按鈕去標記隊友。$NL;$NL;任何一個敵人被你或者是你標記的隊友殺死，你獲得 ##$multiperk2;## 血量、被標記隊友獲得 ##$multiperk3;## 血量。$NL;$NL;任何一個敵人被你殺死會延長這個效果 ##$multiperk4;## 秒並且減少冷卻 2秒。這個效果將會維持 ##$multiperk5;## 秒並且擁有 ##$multiperk6;## 秒冷卻。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own the Goat Simulator DLC or PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack on Steam
tran_text: 如果你在Steam上有山羊模擬器的DLC或PAYDAY 2原聲立即解鎖

orig_text: All players receive $ammo;% extra total ammo.
tran_text: 所有玩家都獲得額外 $ammo;% 總彈量。

orig_text: Complete the Slaughterhouse job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above while Captain Winters is still present on the level.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度下完成屠宰場，同時 Captain Winters 仍在場上。

orig_text: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete the heist on OVERKILL difficulty or$NL;above with each crew member using no skills, wearing suits, wielding$NL;Golden AK.762 rifles and Chicago Typewriter submachine guns.
tran_text: 在OVERKILL或以上難度的老哈越獄記(Hoxton Breakout)任務中，$NL;所有成員不使用技能，穿著西裝，並使用Golden AK.762步槍及芝加哥打字機(Chicago Typewriter)衝鋒槍。

orig_text: Scarface is used to living in style, so he's collecting assorted pieces of art to fix his room up. He's got a nice rug, too.
tran_text: Scarface 有生活態度，所以他收集了他媽的藝術以裝潢房間，他同時拿到了不錯的地毯。

orig_text: The house is now like a fortress. There are cameras everywhere - you can't even go to the bathroom without Clover registering it.
tran_text: 這屋子現在活像個堡壘，到處都是攝像頭 － 你甚麼不能未經 Clover 知會而去浴室。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own the Goat Simulator DLC or PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack

BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your weapon stability with silenced weapons is increased by ##$multibasic;##. Your snap to zoom is ##$multibasic2;## faster with silenced weapons.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your weapon accuracy with silenced weapons is increased by ##$multipro;##. You gain a ##$multipro2;## chance to pierce enemy armor with silenced weapons.

orig_text: This is a Gage Shotgun Pack item!
tran_text: 這是 Gage Shotgun Pack 的物品！

orig_text: I Am the One Who Knocks
tran_text: I Am the One Who Knocks(來自Breaking Bad)

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Having at least one hostage makes you regenerate ##$multibasic;## health every ##$multibasic2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Having at least one hostage makes you regenerate ##$multipro;## health every ##$multipro2;## seconds.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;當隊伍擁有最少一名人質（包括變節警察）時，每##$multibasic2;##秒你能回復##$multibasic;##生命值。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;當隊伍擁有最少一名人質（包括變節警察）時，每##$multipro2;##秒你能回復##$multipro;##生命值。

orig_text: A cold execution is certainly cleaner than dying in a firefight.
tran_text: 冷酷的處刑絕對比在火拼中死亡來的乾淨俐落。

orig_text: This driver will make sure that you successfully escape from the heist
tran_text: 駕駛可以保證你從劫案中逃脫。

orig_text: You don't have enough Continental Coins for this upgrade.
tran_text: 你沒有足夠的歐洲幣以升級。

orig_text: You can not gain rewards without an active Crime Spree.
tran_text: 你不能在沒有可用犯罪狂歡下領取獎勵。

orig_text: Sometimes the best way to prove that thieves like us can be just as cultured as art snobs is to take their precious items nice and quite-like, with no bashing of skulls.
tran_text: 有時候證明我們這些盜賊都可以是假內行的藝術家的最好方法是靜靜的拿走他們貴重的物品。

orig_text: You do ##$multiperk;## more damage. Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.$NL;$NL;Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by ##$multiperk2;##.
tran_text: 你的傷害增加##$multiperk;##。不適用於近戰武器傷害$NL;$NL;你與醫療包的互動速度增加##$multiperk2;##。

orig_text: Congratulations!$NL;$amount;x $item; has been added to your inventory.$NL;
tran_text: 恭喜！$NL;$amount; 個 $item; 已經增加到你的物品庫。$NL;

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Increases your reload speed with assault rifles and sniper rifles by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your weapon accuracy while moving with assault rifles and sniper rifles is increased by ##$multipro;##.$NL;$NL;Run and reload - you can reload your weapons while sprinting.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;突擊步槍及狙擊槍裝彈速度增快 ##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;使用突擊步槍及狙擊槍進行移動射擊時的命中率提升 ##$multipro;##。$NL;$NL;衝刺時可更換彈匣。

orig_text: The Dentist has a buyer ready for the samurai armor locked away in the Murky warehouse in Shadow Raid. A big movie director, apparently. Lights, camera, action, guys.
tran_text: Dentist那裏有個買主，似乎是個大導演吧，他想要影之襲擊(Shadow Raid)中鎖在Murkywater倉庫裡的武士盔甲。大伙兒準備好，燈光，攝影機，ACTION！

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Increases your armor recovery rate by ##$multibasic2;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Reduces the visual effect duration of Flashbangs by ##$multipro2;##.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;護甲回復速度增加 ##$multibasic2;## 。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;閃光彈的影響時間減少##$multipro2;## 。

orig_text: Buy the Big Bank DLC today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Big Bank DLC ！

orig_text: Complete the Prison Nightmare job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above, with the Clone Army - Cloakers mutator active. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 難度下完成啟用了複製人部隊－Cloaker 的監獄夢魘。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: Clover has got some proper computers in here now. The security system has finally left the stone age, she says.
tran_text: Clover 現在得到了適用的電腦，她說保安系統終於離開了石器時代。

orig_text: $name; has mods installed. Check the player list for more information.
tran_text: $name; 有安裝模組，查看玩家列表以了解更多資訊。

orig_text: NEW CHALLENGE IN $hours; hours $minutes; minutes $seconds; seconds
tran_text: 在 $hours; 小時 $minutes; 分鐘 $seconds; 秒後就會有新的挑戰

orig_text: Killed Cloakers will instantly drop a tear gas grenade. The tear gas has a duration of $duration; seconds, covers a $diameter; meter diameter area and deals $damage; damage per second to any heister who stands in it.
tran_text: 殺死 Cloakers 會立即掉落催淚彈，催淚氣體維持 $duration; 秒，覆蓋 $diameter; 米直徑範圍及每秒對在內的劫匪造成 $damage; 傷害。

orig_text: Bulldozers are immune to explosive damage.
On day 1 of the Election Day job, use the computer in stealth without ever touching the ground.
tran_text: 在選舉日(Election Day)第一天，在潛行下使用電腦，過程不著地面。

orig_text: Players with reputation lower than this setting will not be able to join the game. You can not set it higher than your current reputation.
tran_text: 當玩家等級比設定低時﹐將不能加入遊戲。你不能設定限制到比自己的等級高。(當設定是0時則無限制)

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Enemies you mark take ##$multibasic;## more damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Enemies you mark take an additional ##$multipro;## damage when further away than ##$multipro2;## meters.$NL;Increase the duration of marked enemies by ##$multipro3;## and you can now mark specials by aiming at them with any weapon.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;被你標記的特殊敵人會受多##$multibasic;##的額外傷害。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你標記的敵人有 ##$multipro2;## 米或以上的距離，再額外多受##$multipro;##的傷害。$NL;增加被標記的時間 ##$multipro3;## ，你可以用任意瞄準器來瞄準以標記敵人。

orig_text: Finish $max_progress; heist with a converted cop.
tran_text: 在擁有變節警察下完成 $max_progress; 個劫案。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You gain ##$multibasic;## weapon accuracy.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You gain ##$multipro;## weapon stability.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;武器精準度增加##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;武器穩定度增加 ##$multipro;## 。

tran_text: 在  $days; 天 $hours; 小時 $minutes; 分鐘 $seconds; 秒後到期

The more ammo players replenish, the longer the duration of the effect.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the base duration of the effect by up to ##$multipro2;## seconds.

orig_text: Thermite paste can burn through iron bars.
tran_text: 鋁熱劑可以將鐵桿燒斷。

orig_text: You stole an additional $loose_cash; in loose items and cash.
tran_text: 你偷盜了額外$loose_cash;的零散贓物與現金。

orig_text: Getting ahold of drugs might be a pain, but it's worth it once it's done. If you manage to not get killed in the process. The Butcher is keen, however, to get all meth available. So don't spill it and stay alive!
tran_text: 保持獲得藥物可能會痛，但當成功後將會值得。如何你打算在過程中不被殺。屠夫( Butcher )是踴躍的，所以，所有的冰毒都要獲得。所以不要灑掉冰毒和保命！

orig_text: You gain ##$multiperk;## increased concealment.$NL;$NL;When wearing armor, your movement speed is ##$multiperk2;## less affected.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk3;## more experience when you complete days and jobs.
tran_text: 你增加##$multiperk;##隱匿度。$NL;$NL;當穿上護甲時，你的移動懲罰會減少##$multiperk2;##。$NL;$NL;當完成任務時，你會多得到##$multiperk3;##經驗值。

orig_text: Police Assaults will have a $duration;% longer duration. This gets reduced by $deduction;% for every hostage and converted cop - up to a maximum of $max_hostages;
tran_text: 警察突擊增加 $duration;% 長度。每一個人質及變節警察減少 $deduction;% － 最多 $max_hostages; 個

orig_text: In his youth, Jiro was never accepted, until he found his way into the yakuza. Yet even here, despite his loyalty and ability, he was never fully embraced and was ultimately betrayed. Following a lengthy prison term, Jiro has come to America to find his long-lost son, Kento.
tran_text: 直到他投身黑社會的世界之前，年輕時的Jiro從未被任何人接受過。但就算成為極道的一份子，無論他的忠誠和能力有多高，他亦未曾被幫會完全信任，最終更被背叛出賣。經歷過長長的牢獄生涯後，Jiro來到千里之外的美國尋找他失散已久的兒子：Kento。

orig_text: You do not have enough Continental Coins to purchase $name;.$NL;$NL;You need $money; Continental Coins.
tran_text: 你沒有足夠的歐洲幣去購買 $name; 。$NL;$NL;你需要 $money; 個歐洲幣。

This skill is only activated by SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons fired in automatic fire mode.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;當你使用全自動模式的衝鋒槍、輕機槍、步槍或特別武器時，敵人的身體額外增加 ##$multibasic;## 爆頭傷害。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;當你使用全自動模式的衝鋒槍、輕機槍、步槍或特別武器時，敵人的身體額外增加 ##$multipro;## 爆頭傷害。

orig_text: This is an E3 2015 Secret Mask item!
tran_text: 這是一件E3 2015神秘面具物品！

orig_text: The Infiltrator is an agent hired by a government or large criminal organization to obtain information about its enemies, or by a corporation to obtain industrial secrets from its competitors.$NL;$NL;The Infiltrator is a close combat specialist who knows how to use the environment in order to get the upper hand.
tran_text: Infiltrator $NL;內鬼是被政府或大型犯罪集團僱傭的特工，或者企業僱傭來從競爭對手竊取商業機密。$NL;$NL;內鬼是個近戰專家，懂得利用環境獲得先手。

orig_text: Whenever a Medic revives another cop, the revived cop gets a $damage;% increase to their base damage output.
tran_text: 每當醫療兵救活其他警察，復活警察獲得基礎傷害的 $damage;% 加成。

orig_text: Sangres is a dangerous man. He spent many years working as an enforcer and assassin for a drug cartel in Monterrey, Mexico. Then one day he decided to defect and crossed the border to the US, looking to make the big bucks. Gage introduced him to the Payday Gang. He's as skilled as he's ruthless and with those revolvers he can really light things up. And yeah... check out that razor-sharp machete.
tran_text: Sangres 是一個很危險的人，他在墨西哥內蒙特雷的製毒場花了很多年當軍人及刺客。然後某一天他決定投敵及跨過邊界到達美國，打算在這裡賺大錢。 Gage 介紹了他進 Payday 幫。他的無情及那些左輪手槍給予他技巧，還有 ... 看看那大彎刀。

orig_text: Very hard. Greatly increased XP and cash.
tran_text: Very hard。中幅度增加了經驗值和現金。

orig_text: Hoxton wants to know everything about how he was ratted out.
tran_text: Hoxton 想知道所有他被出賣的事。

orig_text: Gage Weapon Pack DLC available now!
tran_text: 現在可以購買 Gage 武器包 DLC！

orig_text: The Infamy 2.0 update is the second late-game update to PAYDAY 2. It allows players to explore the new Infamy system and gain rewards such as skill tree bonuses along with masks, materials and patterns.$NL;$NL;With the free Infamy 2.0 update we go a step further by adding 20 more infamy levels and achievements as well as other rewards and unlocks. Will you accept the challenge of becoming the most infamous criminal, or will you fail halfway and fade away like so many other have?
tran_text: The Infamy 2.0更新是PAYDAY 2第二個潛在更新。它容許玩家探索新的惡名系統，類似技能樹獎勵的賺取獎勵，例如面具、材料、圖案。$NL;$NL;這次的惡名2.0更新，我們增加了20個惡名等級及成就成為其他的獎勵和解鎖。你會不會接受變得最惡名昭彰的罪犯的挑戰？還是會像其他人在半途失敗以及褪色？

orig_text: On day 2 of the Big Oil job, complete the heist with the last engine being correct on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在OVERKILL或以上難度的石油大亨(Big Oil)第二天中，$NL;最後一次才帶走正確引擎，並完成任務。

orig_text: Easy difficulty is for new players. $NL;Available heists:$NL;$NL;FIRST WORLD BANK$NL;HEAT STREET$NL;
tran_text: Easy 難度是給新手玩的。$NL;可用劫案：$NL;$NL;世界第一銀行 (FIRST WORLD BANK) $NL;熱火街頭 (HEAT STREET)$NL;

orig_text: Dual wielded weapons have a ##$multiperk5;## stability penalty.$NL;$NL;Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional ##$multiperk;##.$NL;$NL;Ammo capacity for your akimbo weapons are increased by ##$multiperk4;##
tran_text: 雙持武器有 ##$multiperk5;## 穩定懲罰。$NL;$NL;你的護甲回復速率再增加 ##$multiperk;## ，雙槍彈藥量增加 ##$multiperk4;## 。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You take ##$multibasic;## less damage from falling from non-fatal heights.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your fall damage is reduced so that you only take armor damage from falling non-fatal heights. Your custody time is reduced by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎##$basic;##$NL;你從不會摔死的高度墜落，你會受到 ##$multibasic;## 傷害減免。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你的掉落傷害會只變成護甲傷害。你被逮捕的時間會減少##$multipro;##。
加入 Steam 的社群社團

orig_text: If you proceed, your reputation level will be reset to level 0. All your skills and unspent skill points will be removed.$NL;$NL;You will start over with no skills. This is not reversible, and you CAN NOT get back what you sacrifice.$NL;$NL;You get to keep all your guns, mods, masks, patterns and materials. You will also gain one level of Infamy and one Infamy point to spend in the Infamy tree.
tran_text: 如果你要升級，你的名聲值會變為0，你所有的技能點會不見，你的可用現金會歸零。你的海外帳戶會保留。$NL;$NL;你會從沒有可用現金、技能點開始。這是不可逆的選項，被犧牲的東西不能再拿回來。$NL;$NL;你可以保留你的槍、武器零件、面具、圖案和基底。你也會得到一等惡名值和一個惡名點數，點數可用在惡名樹上。
我的身體準備好了 (My Bodhi is Ready)

orig_text: Some levels are not available on Easy difficulty.
tran_text: 在 Easy 難度下有些劫案不可用。

orig_text: A nice, fat, benevolent pig full of money.
tran_text: 一隻可愛、肥、來自 benevolent 銀行充滿錢的豬。

orig_text: Finish Boiling Point on OVERKILL in less than 20 minutes after scanning all 4 bodies. To complete this daily, you have to have played the job from start to finish.
tran_text: 在 Overkill 或以上的難度下於 20 分鐘內掃描四具屍體並完成沸點 (Boiling Point) ，需全程在場。

orig_text: You earned $job_cash; for completing the contract.
tran_text: 你賺取了$stage_cash; 合約報酬以及完成合約的額外報酬$job_cash;。

orig_text: Bullets will run out - knives won't. All you need to do is to thrust the blade into your enemy and you'll stay alive.
tran_text: 子彈會耗盡，但刀不會。你只要將你銳利的刀鋒刺向敵人這樣你就能存活下去。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You fix the drill and saw ##$multibasic;## faster and you also deploy trip mines ##$multibasic2;## faster.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Gives your drill and saw a ##$multipro;## chance to autorestart when it breaks down. You also deploy the sentry gun ##$multipro2;## faster.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你修理電鑽快##$multibasic;##，設置詭雷的所需時間快##$multibasic2;##$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你設置自動炮台（sentry gun）的所需時間快##$multipro2;## 。你有##$multipro;##機會裝設的電鑽具備自動修復機能，該電鑽會於故障一段時間後自行重啟。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2013-08-13 00:02 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Welcome to crime.net$NL;$NL;Greetings, $player;, and welcome to Crime.net.$NL;$NL;If you are reading this, it means you have been cleared for access to the hub of our organization. Congratulations; You have taken your first step into a larger world.$NL;$NL;Let's have a look at the basic functions of Crime.net. Don't worry if it seems complex at first, everything is more or less self-explanatory.$NL;$NL;» CRIME.NET$NL;This is where you find new jobs, hook up with other crews, learn more about your contacts, and, occasionally, gamble away some of your hard earned off-shore funds.$NL;$NL;» HOSTING A CONTRACT$NL;Jobs with a timer are for you to host. Once the timer reaches zero, that contract will disappear and Crime.net will spawn another. A note on hosting: you are in charge of the contract, and you are responsible for your crew. $NL;$NL;If you drop out, the whole crew loses. Try and keep everyone alive, and make sure everyone makes it to the PAYDAY.$NL;$NL;» JOINING A CONTRACT$NL;Jobs that someone else is hosting have an icon with four men on them instead of a timer. The host's name is diplayed in blue, or green if it's a friend. You can join the crew as long as there is at least one empty slot.$NL;$NL;» DIFFICULTY$NL;Difficulty is rated from zero to four skulls. The more skulls, the harder it is. If this is your first time, pick a no-skull job. Trust me. Four skulls is what we call a Death Wish, and you shouldn't even attempt this until you are at least level 50.$NL;$NL;» REWARDS$NL;Successfully completing a contract will earn you cash and experience. Roll over a contract marker to see what the base payout is. Your final payday may be a lot bigger though; there are bonuses for risk, and you may be able to score additional funds during the heist. Remember: anything you can get your hands on is profit.$NL;$NL;The money and EXP is awarded after each day of the contract is completed. $NL;$NL;Once you've completed the entire contract, you'll also get what we call a PAYDAY: you get to draw a card to unlock a random item. This is how you score rare masks, weapon mods and other useful things. $NL;$NL;» CONTRACT LENGTH$NL;Jobs have different length. Start out doing a few 1 one day jobs before you move on to the longer heists. The EXP reward scales to your level, so there's no reason to kill yourself on a job that's too big for you at the start.$NL;$NL;$NL;THE SLIGHTLY MORE COMPLEX STUFF$NL;$NL;» FILTERS$NL;There are several filters available to tweak what Crime.net displays. Examples: Look for friends only, widen your search, look for a particular job. Hopefully self-explanatory.$NL;$NL;» STEALTH$NL;If you see a small ghost icon next to a contract marker, that means it's possible to complete the job without raising the alarm. Doing a job in stealth will net you an EXP bonus, which applies to any contract you take on immediately afterwards. A word of advice: If you're new to this, don't worry about stealth just yet. It  takes a tight crew with some serious skills to pull off a clean stealth job.$NL;$NL;» THE BOOST SYSTEM$NL;If you do the same job repeatedly, the EXP return will start to drop on that particular contract, and it will be boosted on others. The trick of maximising your EXP is to do a wide range of jobs. Boost is displayed with minus signs and a red glow for reduced EXP; and plus signs and an orange glow for increased EXP.$NL;$NL;» CONTRACT BROKER$NL;Once you get some cash together and start to level up, you can visit the contract broker and pick which jobs you want to do. Again, if this is your first time, just run with the offered contracts for now.$NL;$NL;TL;DR:$NL;Use Crime.net to find jobs and make money for that epic PAYDAY.$NL;$NL;This is all you need to know for now. Once you've climbed a few rungs on the criminal ladder, I'll drop you another note and talk you through some of the more complex stuff. Good luck.$NL;$NL;- Bain$NL;
tran_text: 發件人：Bain[bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人：$player;$NL;日期：2013年8月13 00=02 (GMT+1)$NL;標題：歡迎來到Crime.net$NL;$NL;日安，$player;，歡迎來到Crime.net。$NL;$NL;如果你正在閱讀這封郵件, 說明你已確切地加入到我們組織中心。恭喜，你打開了新世界的大門。$NL;$NL;讓我們來看看Crime.net的基礎功能。別擔心第一次看起來很複雜，每樣東西或多或少都有它的說明。$NL;$NL;» CRIME.NET$NL;這是你找到新任務，與其他玩家組隊，了解你的合約人，以及偶爾的，可以用你的離岸帳戶賭上一會兒的地方。$NL;$NL;» 主持一個合約$NL;$NL;合約會在地圖上限時出現。一定時間後，合約會消失，而Crime.net將刷新其他的合約。當主機的忠告：你負責整個合約，同時你為你的隊友負責。$NL;$NL;一旦你放棄，整個團隊將失敗。設法讓每個人存活，確保每個人能進入結算那天。$NL;$NL;» 加入一個合約$NL;其他人建立的主機由4人圖標取代限時。主機的名字顯示為藍色，如果是好友則會是綠色。其中只要有空位，你就可以加入。$NL;$NL;» 難度$NL;難度範圍從0至4個骷髏表示。骷髏越多，難度越高。如果這是你的第一次，選擇一個無骷髏標誌的任務。相信我。我們將4顆骷髏代表的難度稱為Death Wish，在你50級之前不能嘗試這個難度。$NL;$NL;» 獎勵$NL;成功完成一個合約將給你經驗與金錢。滾動合約介紹來查看基礎獎勵。你最後的結算日或許可以獲得得更多，風險越大獎勵越豐厚，並且你可能從劫案中獲得額外金錢。記住：任何你到手的東西都算收益。$NL;$NL;金錢與經驗獎勵將在每日合約完成後獲得。$NL;$NL;一旦你完成整個合約，你將進入我們所說的結算日：你將翻開一張卡片來解鎖隨機道具。這可用來收集稀有面具，武器配件以及其他有用的東西。$NL;$NL;» 合約天數$NL;任務有不同的天數。在你選擇更長的劫案之前，就從單天的劫案開始吧。經驗獎勵與你的等級成比例， 所以沒有必要在你剛開始時把自己放入難度過高的任務裡。$NL;$NL;$NL;細小而復雜的東西$NL;$NL;» 專家級任務$NL;$NL;有些任務劃著"專家"的紅標籤。專家任務比普通任務帶來更多的收益以及經驗。如果你失敗了，你將不能重試。在參加多天任務時請牢記這一點。$NL;$NL;» 過濾器$NL;有多種過濾器可以調整Crime.net的顯示。比如:只想找到好友、擴大你的搜索範圍、尋找特定的任務。希望你看了就能明白。$NL;$NL;» 潛入$NL;如果你在合約旁看到一個小幽靈圖標，那很可能意味著可以​​不觸發警報完成任務。以潛入狀態完成任務將給予你經驗加成，將在下一個任意合約裡立即生效，一句話建議：如果你新來的玩家，先別擔心潛入。完成一個完美潛入需要一個熟悉的團隊並且某些特定技能。$NL;$NL;» 加成系統$NL;如果你反覆做同一個任務，那個任務的經驗獎勵將會降低，然後一直沒做的任務，經驗會受到加成。獲得最大經驗的技巧是做各種各樣的任務。加成顯示減號紅光字體代表減少經驗，加號橙光代表增加經驗。$NL;$NL;» 合約仲介$NL;一旦你獲得現金開始升級，你可以遊覽合約中間選擇你想要的任務。再一次，如果這是你第一次，只需要選擇地圖上提供的任務。$NL;$NL;TL;DR：$NL;使用Crime.net來尋找任務並在特定結算日獲得報酬。$NL;$NL;這是你現在所需要知道的一切。某天你攀爬上了新的犯罪階梯，我會給你另一份提示告訴你別的複雜的東西。祝你好運。$NL;$NL;- Bain

orig_text: Kill 100 enemies with the killing blow being a critical hit.
Attach new elements on the drill.
Yes, Jimmy's at the bar. Where else would he be?
tran_text: 對， Jimmy 在酒吧，他還會在哪裡啊？

orig_text: Between 13-21 March we hosted the Spring Break event where we gave away all the free stuff that was unlocked during the Hype Train event. Just like during the Crimefest event last year, one new thing was released each day. We released the Cook Off and Train Heists and the Side Jobs feature. We introduced Bonnie, the tenth heister of the PAYDAY gang along with her trusty double barreled Shotgun. We paved the path for the SWAT Van Turret enemy and showed you a preview of the Golden Grin Casino. Last but not least, we gave away the second Butcher Mod pack along with two new heists, chased the rat in the Hoxton Revenge Heist and learnt how to drive cars in the Car Shop Heist.
tran_text: 在3月13日至3月21日，我們舉行了Spring Break活動，我們透過Hype Train活動解鎖了不少免費的物品。就像去年的犯罪節，每日發佈一樣新的物品。我們發佈了絕命毒師、火車劫案、支線任務功能。我們介紹了第十個PAYDAY幫的劫匪-Bonnie，與她的可信的雙重槍管霰彈槍。而SWAT終於了解裝甲車能幹嘛，我們也展示了黃金Grin賭場。最後但不是最少，我們發佈了第二個Butcher武器零件包、兩個新劫案，在老哈復仇記中找出那叛徒，以及在車店劫案中學習駕駛車輛。

orig_text: Listen to all the tapes on Hoxton Revenge.
tran_text: 在老哈復仇記 (Hoxton Revenge) 中聽過所有聲帶。

orig_text: The helicopter pilot transporting the water needed for the water-cracking will arrive faster. The creekside water pump will also be upgraded, making it pump water faster.
tran_text: 直升機駕駛會更快運水過來。可以加快水填滿金庫。 溪邊的幫浦會升級，使它抽水的速度變快。

orig_text: In this uncertain economy, the price of gold is rocketing. Zip-line it out of the senator's apartment in Framing Frame (Day 3) without tripping the alarm.
tran_text: 在這充滿不確定性的經濟環境下，金價如同坐上火箭般飆漲，所以在偷天換日(Framing Frame)第三天，用滑索運走參議員家所有的黃金，記住，絕對不能觸發警報。

orig_text: Create a custom playlist with your favorite menu tracks.
tran_text: 創造出你喜歡的選單背景音樂清單。

orig_text: A golden syringe. Since you've sent enough medics to the hospital to solve their staff shortage problems for good.
tran_text: 黃金針筒。因為你送了夠多醫師去醫院以有效解決他們人手短缺的問題。

orig_text: We need to get the jewels out fast, so I need you to bag and secure four bags from the Jewelry Store without the escape car bailing.
tran_text: 我們要快速俐落地把珠寶弄到手，$NL;所以我要你們去珠寶店(Jewelry Store)打包四包珠寶，$NL;然後在開車那傢伙想溜之前，把它們送上車。

orig_text: Known to cause moral chaos and sway even the most devoted lawman.$NL;$NL;BONUSES:$NL;Mastermind and Fugitive skill point requirements for each tier are reduced by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;Experience gained is increased by ##$xpboost;##.$NL;$NL;Note: Bonuses to skill trees do not stack.$NL;$NL;ITEMS:$NL;$NL;
tran_text: 擅於挑起精神混亂，甚至足以動搖最堅貞的執法者。$NL;$NL;獎勵：$NL;黑手與逃犯每階段需要的技能點減少##$multibasic;##。$NL;結算時的經驗增加##$xpboost;##。$NL;$NL;注意：對技能樹的加成不疊加$NL;$NL;物品：$NL;$NL;

orig_text: Find the hobo's knife in the Aftershock heist.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度下，在餘震 (Aftershock) 中找到流氓的小刀。

orig_text: An insider plants the crowbar near the mission's starting point. You can use it to open shipping crates.
tran_text: 一個臥底將撬棍放在任務起始點附近，你可以用它來打開裝運的箱子。

orig_text: You must start a Crime Spree if you wish to gain any rewards from completing missions.
tran_text: 如果你想獲得任何完成任務的獎勵，你必須開始一個犯罪狂歡。

orig_text: Device that electrocutes and interrupts targets on touch
tran_text: 電擊以阻止別人的工具

orig_text: If action movies of the 1980s taught us one thing, it's that bullets don't last forever and eventually so have to get in close to take out your enemy.
tran_text: 如果 1980 年代的功夫電影教了我們一件事，那就是子彈並非永恆，終竟要走近點去打倒敵人。

orig_text: Complete the Bank Heist job after finding the 2 punks in the parking lot and bringing them next to the van, without letting them get away or die on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在停車場找到兩個小混混並帶他們到廂型車附近後完成銀行劫案，在 Overkill 難度或以上不讓他們離開或死亡。

orig_text: Nationality: Israeli$NL;Age: 29$NL;$NL;Rumor has it that Hila underwent extreme training in the Israeli military, and while she keeps denying it publicly, something definitely caught Bain's attention when he asked her and her spouse Ethan to join the gang. Officially, they were brought in to give the gang a much needed public PR boost in light of certain developments regarding the FBI, but as to the real reason... only Bain knows for sure.
tran_text: 國籍：以色列$NL;年齡：29$NL;$NL;據說 Hila 曾經歷以色列軍中嚴格的訓練，雖然她本人已經公開否認，但是當他請求她和配偶 Ethan 一起加入團隊，一定有甚麼事情引起了 Bain 的注意。理論上他們會進入團隊是對有關 FBI 特定的相關研究會有公關的幫忙。但實際上真正的理由 ... 只有 Bain 最清楚。

orig_text: From: Gage [gage@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2014-04-10 17:02 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Smart move.$NL;$NL;Hey $player;, I just wanted to thank you for buying the Gage Mod Courier DLC.$NL;$NL; To read more about the Mod Courier job and check your progress, simply select the Gage icon on Crime.net (a big "G", you can't miss it).$NL;$NL;- Gage$NL;
tran_text: 發件人：Gage[gage@///打碼///]$NL;收件人：$player;$NL;日期：2014年4月10日 17=02 (GMT+1)$NL;標題：明智的選擇。$NL;$NL;嘿$player;， 我想感謝您購買了Gage Mod Courier DLC。$NL;$NL;想要了解更多模組快遞任務以及查看你的進程, 只需要點擊Crime.net上的Gage圖標(一個大"G"，你不可能無視它)。$NL;$NL;- Gage$NL;

orig_text: Unlocks and equips the throwable Smoke Bomb.$NL;$NL;When deployed, the smoke bomb creates a smoke screen that lasts for ##$multiperk;## seconds. While standing inside the smoke screen, you and any of your allies automatically avoid ##$multiperk2;## of all bullets. Any enemies that stand in the smoke will see their accuracy reduced by ##$multiperk4;##.$NL;$NL;After the smoke screen dissipates, the Smoke Bomb is on a cooldown for ##$multiperk3;## seconds, but killing enemies will reduce this cooldown by ##$multiperk5;## second.
tran_text: 解鎖及裝備煙霧彈。$NL;$NL;在投放後，煙霧彈產生出 ##$multiperk;## 秒的煙幕，站在煙幕內時，你跟你的隊友自動避開 ##$multiperk2;## 的子彈，任何敵人站在煙幕內時將降低準確度 ##$multiperk4;## 。$NL;$NL;當煙幕消散時，煙霧彈有 ##$multiperk3;## 的冷卻時間，但殺死敵人將減少 ##$multiperk5;## 秒冷卻時間。

orig_text: Kill at least 50 enemies and get 101% accuracy or above using any shotgun.
tran_text: 使用霰彈槍時，取得101%精準度以上，並擊殺最少50位敵人。
購買及自定義突擊步槍。

orig_text: In the Firestarter job, complete day 3 with you and your crew staying inside the vault while all of the money burns out on the Death Wish difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在Firestarter 第三天中，在DeathWish難度中，$NL;你和你的隊友待在金庫裡等到所有的錢燒完。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Increases your climbing speed by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You gain a ##$multipro;## dodge chance while zip-lining.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;增加##$multibasic;##攀爬的速度。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;在用滑索時，你得到##$multipro;##閃避機率。

orig_text: Used to get through sewer gates.

You gain ##$multiperk;## increased concealment.$NL;$NL;When wearing armor, your movement speed is ##$multiperk2;## less affected.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk3;## more experience when you complete days and jobs.
tran_text: 你增加##$multiperk;##隱匿度。$NL;$NL;當穿上護甲時，你的移動懲罰會減少##$multiperk2;##。$NL;$NL;當完成任務時，你會多得到##$multiperk3;##經驗值。

orig_text: Your chance to dodge is increased by ##$multiperk;## for ballistic vests.$NL;$NL;Your armor is increased by ##$multiperk2;## for ballistic vests.
tran_text: 穿著防彈背心時，你閃避的機率增加 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;防彈背心的裝甲會增加 ##$multiperk2;## 。

orig_text: Raids are often crowded, so speed is of the essence. Combine high velocity with sharp sludges and you'll make a serious impact.
tran_text: 襲擊通常有很多人，所以速度很重要，高速配上尖銳的攻擊能幫忙你完成重度攻擊。

orig_text: Nationality: Croatian$NL;Age: 45$NL;$NL;Dragan may be a former cop, but he's a former Croatian cop, which means his methods make the MPDC look like timid babysitters. He was brought to America and accepted into the PAYDAY gang as a favor to The Butcher. While there were some early suspicions regarding his true loyalties, his ability and commitment are indisputable.
tran_text: 國籍：克羅埃西亞 $NL;年齡：45 $NL;$NL;Dragan大概曾經是個警察，但他是個克羅埃西亞警察，也就是說，他的手法讓華盛頓哥倫比亞特區首都警察看起來像是個膽小的保母，他被帶到美國，雖然Butcher對他過去無庸置疑地有些關於忠誠度、能力和信用的懷疑，但他替Butcher加入了PAYDAY。 $NL;$NL;當你選擇Dragan做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own the PAYDAY 2: A Merry Payday Christmas Soundtrack
You also made it out with $bag_amount; bag(s) with a total value of $bag_cash;.
tran_text: 你也拿回$bag_amount;包總價值$bag_cash;的錢。

orig_text: Even the infamous once started small. Or, in other words, we all suck at first.
tran_text: 惡名的開始很細小。或者，另一種說法是，我們在一開始已卡住。

orig_text: You do ##$multiperk;## more damage. Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.$NL;$NL;Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by ##$multiperk2;##.
tran_text: 你的傷害增加##$multiperk;##。不適用於近戰武器傷害$NL;$NL;你與醫療包的互動速度增加##$multiperk2;##。
安排藝術作品運輸管道

orig_text: THANK YOU FOR PARTICIPATING IN THE COMMUNITY CHALLENGE!
tran_text: 每個完成的階段都能達到全球經驗值獎勵 $bonus;%

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your walk speed is increased by ##$multibasic;## and your crouch speed is increased by ##$multibasic2;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Enemies make ##$multipro;## less noise when shot or meleed to death.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;增加你的移動速度##$multibasic;##你蹲下時的移動速度也增加 ##$multibasic2;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;大幅減少##$multipro;##槍殺或毆斃敵人時發出的聲音。

orig_text: One Down. Tremendously increased XP and cash.
tran_text: One Down 。 異常地增加經驗值及現金。

orig_text: Bonnie is from Glasgow. That should be enough to strike fear into a man's heart, but Bonnie is also from 1980's Glasgow. These years, the Thatcher era, made already tough towns even harder, and bred a generation of determined, unforgiving Scots. Bonnie is cut from this cloth.
tran_text: Bonnie來自格拉斯哥，這已經足以嚇壞一個大男人的心了，但Bonnie可是來自1980年代的格拉斯哥。那些年來，在柴契爾夫人的治理下，讓這座以頑強著稱的城市更加頑強，培育出一個整個世代屬於決心與不輕易饒恕他人的蘇格蘭人。而Bonnie就是在這種環境下成長的。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;When your armor breaks, the first shot on every enemy will cause that enemy to stagger. This effect ends when your armor recovers.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The effect persists for ##$multipro;## seconds after your armor has recovered.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你破甲後第一槍打中任何敵人都能造成驚慌，直到護甲再生後效果消失。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;上述效果增加至你回甲後 ##$multipro;## 秒。

orig_text: Every ##$multiperk;## health missing will reduce the ##$multiperk2;## second cooldown to kill regen by ##$multiperk3;## second.
tran_text: 每失去 ##$multiperk;## 血量會由 ##$multiperk3;## 秒減少 ##$multiperk2;## 秒的冷卻時間去殺人回血。

orig_text: An Additional random place to stow loot.

orig_text: The Big Fat Music Update is a free update that introduces a host of soundtrack-related features, such as custom playlists, heist specific tracks, and custom menu music, as well as several new tracks. Additionally, if you own the PAYDAY: The Heist soundtrack, this music is also available, both during heists and in menu screens. Let's party like it's 2011!
tran_text: The Big Fat Music更新是免費更新，當中介紹了有關主機的音軌功能，例如專門的播放清單。另外，如果你擁有PAYDAY: The Heist soundtrack，音樂同時可用，同時在劫案中及主畫面。就像2011年的開展派對！

orig_text: Bonnie's got her corner sorted the way she likes it now. She's even got her own roulette with an actual croupier.

orig_text: The Gage Weapon Pack #02 is the fourth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Cloaker makes a return to the series to put fear in the heart of every criminal. Gage has the perfect medicine however and brings back the Light Machine Gun and introduces melee combat weapons to fight them. With the Light Machine Guns, players can provide cover for each other by unleashing devastating attacks.$NL;$NL;Three Light Machine Guns and four Knives are added to the players arsenal. Four new masks from Gage's collection have been added, as well as new patterns and materials.
tran_text: Gage武器包#02是Payday 2第4個DLC. Cloaker的回歸將恐懼帶回每一個罪犯的心中. 雖然Gagd拥有靈丹妙藥,不過他還是帶來了輕機槍和介紹了近戰格斗武器用來對抗條子. 用了輕機槍,玩家可以用毀滅性的攻擊為其他玩家提供掩護.$NL;$NL;三把輕機槍和四把刀已經加入了玩家的軍火庫. 還加入了四個來自Gage收藏的面具, 同时還有新的圖字和材料.

orig_text: They don't make 'em like Tony anymore. A fast talker who knows what he wants and how to get it. He's the real deal when the shit hits the fan, a true-born heister. He doesn't back down for anyone and he dishes it out just as hard as he can take it. This guys got balls.
tran_text: 他們不再模仿 Tony ，一個口快的人知道他想要甚麼和如果得到，在大難臨頭時仍能完美處理，一個真正天生的劫匪。他對住誰都不會退縮及承擔壓力，這傢伙有膽量。

orig_text: Defeat Captain Winters while on any job, while the Hydra mutator is active.
tran_text: 在啟用九頭蛇突變下在任何任務打敗 Captain Winters 。

orig_text: The Hotline Miami DLC is the eleventh DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Dennaton Games and OVERKILL. Enjoy an all-new heist, three new submachine guns, a ton of mods and five new melee weapons - all of them inspired from Hotline Miami. Four masks are included while an additional four can be unlocked by owning Hotline Miami on Steam. Six achievements and four patterns and materials have also been added. If you like hurting other people, then this DLC is for you.
tran_text: 熱線邁阿密DLC是PAYDAY 2的第十一個DLC，亦是OVERKILL和Dennaton Games的合作。享受來自Hotline Miami中新的劫案、三把新的衝鋒槍、大量的武器零件、五把新的近戰武器，當中還有四個新面具，當Steam上有Hotline Miami時將會有額外四個。增加了六個成就、四個圖案、材料。如果你喜歡傷害人，這個DLC很適合你。
這是一件實體周邊物品！

The ability has a ##$multipro2;## chance to fix the drill or saw. The ability can only be used once per time the drill or saw is broken.$NL;$NL;Note: Skill does not affect the OVE9000 saw.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你裝設的電鑽增加 ##$multibasic;## 機會在壞掉後自動修復。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你獲得近戰攻擊修復電鑽的能力。每當電鑽故障時你只有一次機會，成功率 ##$multipro2;## 。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2014-10-27 13:37 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Old Hoxton is back.$NL;$NL;Greetings, $player;.$NL;$NL;Well done on helping us free Old Hoxton from his year in prison.$NL;$NL;» OLD HOXTON'S REQUEST$NL;Old Hoxton is back. That means that we suddenly have an Old Hoxton and a New Hoxton. That won't work, not for Old Hoxton anyway. Dallas younger brother might be able to keep the mask, but he ain't keeping the name. As Old Hoxton said in the Hoxton Breakout heist, Dallas younger brother, New Hoxton, has a problem. Being the witty Englishman he is, Old Hoxton did a twist of New Hoxton with the famous quote "Hoxton? More like Houston, because we have a fucking problem". Then it came to him. With both Houston and Dallas being cities in Texas (Houston the largest city, Dallas the largest metro), both of his fellow heisters being brothers and his problems with the younger of the two using his mask - the consensus among the PAYDAY gang was that New Hoxton shall henceforth be called... Houston.$NL;$NL;Or else Old Hoxton would flip a table and beat, and I quote, "the living shit outta that wanker". I think this is a relatively cheap price to pay to calm him down and if anything, partially forgive us for leaving him in there.$NL;$NL;- Bain$NL;
tran_text: 發件人：Bain [bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人：$player;$NL;日期：2014年10月27日 13時37分(GMT +1)$NL;標題：老Hoxton回來了。$NL;$NL;恭喜，$player;。$NL;$NL;從監獄中解救老Hoxton時做得好。$NL;$NL; »老Hoxton的要求$NL;老Hoxton回來了。這代表我們有老Hoxton和新Hoxton。但那可是行不通的，對於老Hoxton來說啦。雖然Dallas的弟弟可以保留面具，但他不能再保留這個名字。因為老Hoxton在老哈越獄記時說過，Dallas的弟弟，新Hoxton？沒有這種東西！。作為風趣的英國人，老Hoxton以一句著名的引用來說服了新Hoxton"Hoxton？Houston更好，因為我們之間有個難以解決的問題。"這是他新名字的來源。Houston和Dallas都是德克薩斯州的城市(Houston是最大的城市，Dallas是最大的鐵路)，而剛好這兩者都是兄弟，但問題是，那個弟弟用了Hoxton的面具-PAYDAY幫有了共識，不是讓新Hoxton改名為Houston......$NL;$NL;就是給老Hoxton開槍打死，我回了他"那個該死的王八。"我覺得這是相對較便宜的代價來令他冷靜，至少能讓他原諒我們把他丟在苦牢裡這件事。$NL;$NL;- Bain$NL;

orig_text: The Yakuza Character Pack is the 27th DLC and 6th character pack for PAYDAY 2. Introducing Jiro, the Japanese heister, his Katana, Micro Uzi Submachine Gun with 6 mods and 2 masks. Orphaned from a young age, Jiro found a way into the Japanese criminal underworld where he quickly climbed the ranks. As Jiro grew older he fell in love with his Boss' daughter and quickly fell in disfavour with the clan. Betrayed and left for dead, Jiro started to serve a lengthy prison sentence leaving his wife and son at the mercy of his former Yakuza clan. After he served his time, Jiro heard news of his wife's death and the disappearance of his son Kento. Filled with rage, he went on a one-man rampage on his old clan. Upon killing his old boss, Jiro learned that his son was in the USA and that he had to get into contact with a man named Bain.
tran_text: 極道角色包是PAYDAY 2第廿七個DLC亦是第六個角色包。為你介紹來自日本的劫匪 Jiro，和他的日本刀、微型 Uzi 衝鋒槍連六個配件及兩個面具。從小就是孤兒的他，Jiro 想辦法進入日本的地下世界並瞬即嶄露頭角。但當 Jiro 長大並與組長千金暗結珠胎後，他很快就嘗到觸犯禁忌的惡果：被背叛然後抹殺，苛活下來的 Jiro 在牢裡服刑，任由他的妻兒被他所屬的幫派所擺佈。當他出獄之後，Jiro 得知他妻子的死訊和兒子 Kento 失蹤。帶著滿腔怒火，他單人匹馬殺上他幫派的大本營。在組長受死之前告訴 Jiro 他的兒子正身在美國，於是他就接觸 Bain 了。

tran_text: 你從火車中偷它出來。這不容易，但它看起來超棒。

orig_text: Russian born Sokol had a bright future as a hockey player - a grinder for the STP Bombers. However, this was a front. Between matches, Sokol was a robber of casinos, and left a trail of emptied vaults from Moscow to Minsk. Eventually, the Russian police closed in. Sokol evaded them but knew his time as an independent heister was drawing to an end. Only one other man had the resources and insight to figure his identity - Bain. Sokol was offered a place in the PAYDAY gang and a ticket to Las Vegas for the heist of a lifetime. The Sokol Character Pack is the 25th DLC and the fifth character pack for PAYDAY 2. Buying this pack makes Sokol, The Russian Mastermind available as a playable character and it also includes the Grinder perk deck, Sokol's mask and the Valkyrie Rifle.
tran_text: 俄羅斯出身的Sokol有一個作為曲棍球球員的大好前途－－隸屬 STP Bombers 球隊的「研磨機（側衛）」。不過，這只是表面形象。在賽事之間，Sokol 亦是名賭場劫匪，從莫斯科到明斯克都遍佈被他洗劫一空的保險庫。想當然爾，俄羅斯警方自然窮追不捨。雖然Sokol避過一劫但他深知作為獨行劫匪的日子將盡。只有一個外人擁有足夠資訊和洞察力可猜出他的身份：Bain。Sokol 獲得了 PAYDAY 幫中佔一席位，以及一張前往拉斯維加斯好進行他生涯頂峰的最大劫案的機票。Sokol 角色包是 PAYDAY 2 第廿五個 DLC 亦是第五個角色包。購買本角色包可以讓你以 Sokol 這名俄國犯罪專家的身份進行遊戲之餘，側衛犯罪風格牌組，Sokol 的面具以及 Valkyrie 步槍亦為你所有。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can interact with ECM jammers to cause a feedback loop. When interacted, the ECM jammer has a ##$multibasic;## chance to incapacitate enemies within ##$multibasic2;## meters radius every ##$multibasic3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ECM feedback lasts ##$multibasic4;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You will instantly interact with a ECM jammer and the ECM feedback duration is increased by ##$multipro;##.$NL;$NL;Your ECM jammer has a ##$multipro2;## chance every ##$multipro3;## minutes to recharge its feedback ability.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你可對電子干擾器按緊互動鍵以啟動回饋。回饋啟動時，電子干擾器有##$multibasic;##的機會使半徑##$multibasic2;##公尺內的敵人暈眩##$multibasic3;##秒。$NL;$NL;干擾器回饋持續##$multibasic4;##秒。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你只需對電子干擾器按一下互動鍵即可啟動回饋，回饋時間延長##$multipro;##。$NL;$NL;你的電子干擾器有##$multipro2;##機會每##$multipro3;##分鐘恢復它的回饋能力。

orig_text: After not taking damage for ##$multiperk;## seconds any damage-over-time you are still waiting to receive will be negated.
tran_text: 當 ##$multiperk;## 秒內沒受到傷害，傷害殘留會消失。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own Gage Assault Pack DLC or PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack
Highway 130 has a long enough straight section for a plane to land on. This is the middle-length escape route, but you will have to clear the nearby trees to accommodate the landing.
tran_text: 130號高速公路夠長讓一架飛機降落。這是中等速度的逃脫方法，但你需要先清除馬路兩側的樹木好讓飛機能夠降落。

orig_text: A painting to celebrate friendship. Friends don't shoot friends in the back.
tran_text: 慶祝友誼的油畫。朋友不會在後面攻擊朋友。

orig_text: You gain ##$multiperk;## increased concealment.$NL;$NL;When wearing armor, your movement speed is ##$multiperk2;## less affected.$NL;$NL;You gain ##$multiperk3;## more experience when you complete days and jobs.
tran_text: 隱匿值增加##$multiperk;##點。$NL;$NL;穿防彈衣造成移動速度減低的效果少##$multiperk2;##。$NL;$NL;完成整個任務後獲得的經驗值增加##$multiperk3;##。

Your safehouse is being raided by the police!$NL;Upgrades are locked until the assault is repelled!
tran_text: 你的安全屋正在被警察偷襲！$NL;除非突襲被趕走，不然升級會被鎖住！

tran_text: 你再增加 ##$multiperk;## 的血量。$NL;$NL;每 ##$multiperk3;## 秒，你就能回復 ##$multiperk2;## 血量。$NL;$NL;牌組完成獎勵：你可以在PAYDAY獲得更高品質物品的機率增加 ##$multiperk4;## 。

orig_text: The Biker Heist Pack is 34th pack for PAYDAY2. Crossing a biker gang isn't always the best idea. But sometimes the allure of hard cash will distort even the most seasoned criminal's judgment. This in turn takes the PAYDAY gang to Rust's old clubhouse, for a suicide mission that leads to the gang finding themselves on a speeding train! In the pack you'll also find the CR 805B SMG, a deadly Throwable Axe, four masks, patterns and materials together with brand new achievements.
tran_text: Biker 劫案包是 PAYDAY 2 的第三十四個 DLC。 誰都知道出賣暴走族絕對沒有好下場。但有時再老練的罪犯都會被金錢所誘惑從而扭曲他的判斷。這次 PAYDAY 幫被帶去 Rust 的舊俱樂部處，最終他們將會發現這個任務將是通往地獄的直通車！在這個包中，除此之外你將同時得到 CR 805B 衝鋒槍、致命的投擲斧、四個面具、圖案及材料，以及相關的全新成就。

orig_text: For you, action is the juice. $NL;Available heists:$NL;$NL;FIRST WORLD BANK$NL;HEAT STREET$NL;GREEN BRIDGE$NL;PANIC ROOM$NL;SLAUGHTERHOUSE$NL;DIAMOND HEIST$NL;COUNTERFEIT$NL;UNDERCOVER$NL;NO MERCY$NL;
tran_text: 對你來說，作戰很輕鬆。 $NL;可用劫案：$NL;$NL;世界第一銀行 (FIRST WORLD BANK)$NL;熱火街頭 (HEAT STREET)$NL;格林大橋 (GREEN BRIDGE)$NL;戰慄空間 (PANIC ROOM)$NL;屠宰場 (SLAUGHTERHOUSE)$NL;鑽石劫掠 (DIAMOND HEIST)$NL;偽鈔風雲 (COUNTERFEIT)$NL;骯髒交易 (UNDERCOVER)$NL;慈愛醫院 (NO MERCY)$NL;

orig_text: Wick has got some big plans and got the biggest space to make it happen.
tran_text: Wick 有了大計劃，而且有了最大的空間以實踐。

orig_text: In the basement John Wick is setting up a shooting range, with Wolf's workshop right next door. At the other end, Sokol and Dragan have their gym and training facilities. Bodhi has set up a workshop for his surfboards, too. And then there's Jacket's corner.$NL;$NL;The basement is also home to the vault, where the gang keeps all that sweet loot.
tran_text: 在地庫， John Wick 設立了一個射擊靶場，前面則是 Wolf 的工作坊。而在另一出口， Sokol 和 Dragan 有他們的健身房及訓練器材。 Bodhi 設置了他的滑浪版工作坊，還有這裡有 Jacket 的一角。$NL;$NL;地庫同時是金庫的所在地，給予地方伙伴保存甜美的贓物。

orig_text: Cooking can be relaxing as hell. Hanging out at the stove and stir up some good stuff that's just gonna be so darn tasty. Just add a bit of hydrochloric acid and get a whiff of that fantastic stew.
tran_text: 在絕命毒師 ( Cook Off ) 中，在OVERKILL或以上的難度煮二十五包冰毒。

orig_text: Instead of fully regenerating armor when out of combat, The Anarchist will continuously regenerate armor throughout the entire combat. Heavier armor regenerates more armor, but during longer intervals.$NL;$NL;When your armor gets depleted you will be immune to health damage for ##$multiperk;## seconds. This cannot occur more often than once every ##$multiperk2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;Note: Skills and perks that increases the armor recovery rate are disabled when using this perk deck.
tran_text: 取代了離開戰鬥才能完整回甲，無政府主義者將會在整個戰鬥中保持回甲。更重型的裝甲回復更多裝甲值，但時間間隔更長。$NL;$NL;當你被破甲時，你將會免疫傷害 ##$multiperk;## 秒，冷卻時間 ##$multiperk2;## 秒。$NL;$NL;注意：技能及天賦的護甲回復速度加成將失效。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2013-08-13 00:02 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Welcome to crime.net$NL;$NL;Greetings, $player;, and welcome to Crime.net.$NL;$NL;If you are reading this, it means you have been cleared for access to the hub of our organization. Congratulations; You have taken your first step into a larger world.$NL;$NL;Let's have a look at the basic functions of Crime.net. Don't worry if it seems complex at first, everything is more or less self-explanatory.$NL;$NL;» CRIME.NET$NL;This is where you find new jobs, hook up with other crews, learn more about your contacts, and, occasionally, gamble away some of your hard earned off-shore funds.$NL;$NL;» HOSTING A CONTRACT$NL;Jobs with a timer are for you to host. Once the timer reaches zero, that contract will disappear and Crime.net will spawn another. A note on hosting: you are in charge of the contract, and you are responsible for your crew. $NL;$NL;If you drop out, the whole crew loses. Try and keep everyone alive, and make sure everyone makes it to the PAYDAY.$NL;$NL;» JOINING A CONTRACT$NL;Jobs that someone else is hosting have an icon with four men on them instead of a timer. The host's name is diplayed in blue, or green if it's a friend. You can join the crew as long as there is at least one empty slot.$NL;$NL;» DIFFICULTY$NL;Difficulty is rated from zero to four skulls. The more skulls, the harder it is. If this is your first time, pick a no-skull job. Trust me. Four skulls is what we call a Death Wish, and you shouldn't even attempt this until you are at least level 50.$NL;$NL;» REWARDS$NL;Successfully completing a contract will earn you cash and experience. Roll over a contract marker to see what the base payout is. Your final payday may be a lot bigger though; there are bonuses for risk, and you may be able to score additional funds during the heist. Remember: anything you can get your hands on is profit.$NL;$NL;The money and EXP is awarded after each day of the contract is completed. $NL;$NL;Once you've completed the entire contract, you'll also get what we call a PAYDAY: you get to draw a card to unlock a random item. This is how you score rare masks, weapon mods and other useful things. $NL;$NL;» CONTRACT LENGTH$NL;Jobs have different length. Start out doing a few 1 one day jobs before you move on to the longer heists. The EXP reward scales to your level, so there's no reason to kill yourself on a job that's too big for you at the start.$NL;$NL;$NL;THE SLIGHTLY MORE COMPLEX STUFF$NL;$NL;» PRO JOBS$NL;Some jobs have a red outline and 'PRO' label. Pro jobs give a bigger pay and more XP than normal jobs. If you fail however, you don't get to retry. Bear this in mind if you are attempting a multi-day heist.$NL;$NL;» STEALTH$NL;If you see a small ghost icon next to a contract marker, that means it's possible to complete the job without raising the alarm. Doing a job in stealth will net you an EXP bonus, which applies to any contract you take on immediately afterwards. A word of advice: If you're new to this, don't worry about stealth just yet. It  takes a tight crew with some serious skills to pull off a clean stealth job.$NL;$NL;» THE BOOST SYSTEM$NL;If you do the same job repeatedly, the EXP return will start to drop on that particular contract, and it will be boosted on others. The trick of maximising your EXP is to do a wide range of jobs. Boost is displayed with minus signs and a red glow for reduced EXP; and plus signs and an orange glow for increased EXP.$NL;$NL;» CONTRACT BROKER$NL;Once you get some cash together and start to level up, you can visit the contract broker and pick which jobs you want to do. Again, if this is your first time, just run with the offered contracts for now.$NL;$NL;TL;DR:$NL;Use Crime.net to find jobs and make money for that epic PAYDAY.$NL;$NL;This is all you need to know for now. Once you've climbed a few rungs on the criminal ladder, I'll drop you another note and talk you through some of the more complex stuff. Good luck.$NL;$NL;- Bain$NL;
tran_text: 發件人： Bain[bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人： $PLAYER;$NL;日期: 2013-08-13 00:02 (GMT+1)$NL;標題： 歡迎來到Crime.net$NL;$NL;日安， $PLAYER;，歡迎來到Crime.net。$NL;$NL;如果你正在閱讀這封郵件, 說明你已確切地加入到我們組織中心。 恭喜，你打開了新世界的大門。$NL;$NL;讓我們來看看Crime.net的基礎功能。別擔心第一次看起來很複雜，每樣東西或多或少都有它的說明。$NL;$NL;» CRIME.NET$NL;這是你找到新任務，與其他玩家組隊，了解你的合約人，以及偶爾的，可以用你的離岸帳戶賭上一會兒的地方。$NL;$NL;» 主持一個合約$NL;$NL;合約會在地圖上限時出現。一定時間後，合約會消失，而Crime.net將刷新其他的合約。當主機的忠告：你負責整個合約，同時你為你的隊友負責。$NL;$NL;一旦你放棄，整個團隊將失敗。設法讓每個人存活，確保每個人能進入結算那天。$NL;$NL;» 加入一個合約$NL;其他人建立的主機由4人圖標取代限時。主機的名字顯示為藍色，如果是好友則會是綠色。其中只要有空位，你就可以加入。$NL;$NL;» 難度$NL;難度範圍從0至4個骷髏表示。骷髏越多，難度越高。如果這是你的第一次，選擇一個無骷髏標誌的任務。相信我。我們將4顆骷髏代表的難度稱為Death Wish，在你50級之前不能嘗試這個難度。$NL;$NL;» 獎勵$NL;成功完成一個合約將給你經驗與金錢。滾動合約介紹來查看基礎獎勵。你最後的結算日或許可以獲得得更多，風險越大獎勵越豐厚，並且你可能從劫案中獲得額外金錢。記住：任何你到手的東西都算收益。$NL;$NL;金錢與經驗獎勵將在每日合約完成後獲得。$NL;$NL;一旦你完成整個合約，你將進入我們所說的結算日：你將翻開一張卡片來解鎖隨機道具。這可用來收集稀有面具，武器配件以及其他有用的東西。$NL;$NL;» 合約天數$NL;任務有不同的天數。在你選擇更長的劫案之前，就從單天的劫案開始吧。經驗獎勵與你的等級成比例， 所以沒有必要在你剛開始時把自己放入難度過高的任務裡。$NL;$NL;$NL;細小而復雜的東西$NL;$NL;» 專家級任務$NL;$NL;有些任務劃著「專家」的紅標籤。專家任務比普通任務帶來更多的收益以及經驗。如果你失敗了，你將不能重試。在參加多天任務時請牢記這一點。$NL;$NL;» 潛入$NL;如果你在合約旁看到一個小幽靈圖標，那很可能意味著可以​​不觸發警報完成任務。以潛入狀態完成任務將給予你經驗加成，將在下一個任意合約裡立即生效，一句話建議：如果你新來的玩家，先別擔心潛入。完成一個完美潛入需要一個熟悉的團隊並且某些特定技能。$NL;$NL;» 加成系統$NL;如果你反覆做同一個任務，那個任務的經驗獎勵將會降低，然後一直沒做的任務，經驗會受到加成。獲得最大經驗的技巧是做各種各樣的任務。加成顯示減號紅光字體代表減少經驗，加號橙光代表增加經驗。$NL;$NL;» 合約中介$NL;一旦你獲得現金開始升級，你可以遊覽合約中間選擇你想要的任務。再一次，如果這是你第一次，只需要選擇地圖上提供的任務。$NL;$NL;TL;DR：$NL;使用Crime.net來尋找任務並在特定結算日獲得報酬。$NL;$NL;這是你現在所需要知道的一切。某天你攀爬上了新的犯罪階梯，我會給你另一份提示告訴你別的複雜的東西。祝你好運。$NL;$NL;- Bain

orig_text: Sometimes it's better to let machines take over a job. Now, that doesn't mean we get to be lazy about it, but if things go right, we get the job done faster.

orig_text: An insider plants three body bags at the desired location, allowing you to easily transport and hide more dead bodies.
tran_text: 內應將三個屍袋放在想要的位置，你可以更輕易運送和隱藏屍體。
查看最終用戶許可協議。

orig_text: The Big Bank Heist DLC is the eighth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds the first heist from the new contact known as the Dentist. If money is the lifeblood of this city, then the Benevolent is its beating heart.$NL;This is the ultimate bank robbery - achieved by stealthy guile or relentless force. Can you make history by planning the perfect heist and unlocking the Big Bank? The Benevolent has never been robbed. Many have tried. The Nestor gang in '40, the Beltway Bunch in '77. All failed. You're going to change that. Together with the Big Bank job, you also get the Falcon Rifle and its weapon mods as well as four all-new masks, materials and patterns. To give you a real challenge, 10 heist specific achievements have been added.
tran_text: 大銀行DLC是Payday 2的第八個DLC並且是新的合約人牙醫的第一個合約。如果說金錢就是華盛頓特區的血液那麼Benevolent銀行就是華盛頓的心臟。$NL;$NL;這將是規​​模最大的一次銀行劫案－用你悄聲無息的狡詐或心狠手辣的力量來完成它。你能通過設計出漂亮的計劃並打開金庫大門來名垂青史嗎？Benevolent銀行從未被成功搶劫過。許多同行都嘗試過了：1940的Nestor幫、1977的Beltway Bunch。他們都失敗了，而你將會改變這個局面。除了大銀行劫案，你也可以獲得Falcon步槍以及它的配件和四個全新的面具、材質和圖案。為了給你一個真正的挑戰，我們添加了10個特別的劫案成就。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Taser shock attacks on you backfire, knocking back the Taser.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Interacting with an enemy Taser while he is electrocuting you will electrocute him, dealing ##$multipro;## damage to his health.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;電擊警察對你電擊時，短時間內隨機自動反擊。$NL;$NL;精通##$pro;##$NL;電擊警察對你電擊時，你可以按互動鍵反過來電他，造成##$multipro;##傷害。

orig_text: Your maximum health is increased by ##$multiperk;##.
All normal enemies are replaced with Medics, and all special units are replaced with Bulldozers.
tran_text: 所有正常敵人被變成醫療兵 (Medics) ，及所有特種部隊被變成 Bulldozer 。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can now place ##$multibasic;## ECM jammers instead of just one.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The ECM jammer duration is increased by an additional ##$multipro;## and the ECM feedback duration lasts ##$multipro2;## longer. Pagers are delayed by the ECM jammer.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;可以攜帶##$multibasic;##個電子干擾器。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;干擾器的有效時間增加##$multipro;##干擾器反饋的有效時間亦增加##$multipro2;##。干擾器新增可延後無線電回覆的功能。（必須在擊倒警衛前設置，效果完結後無線電仍會響起並需要回覆。）

orig_text: Tried and trusted: hire a helicopter to land on the roof and carry you and your loot to safety. High profile, and lots of work to get the bags up on the roof.

orig_text: As summer is upon us, it's time to go live with update 100! It's been quite a journey and of course we want to commemorate this joyous occasion of this amazing update!$NL;In the 100th update, all Steam Community Group members will get access to our brand new HEF Grenade.$NL;It's also time to unleash our new, revamped Skill Trees into the live version. We thank all players that have been active in the Skills BETA, supplying us with feedback and ideas. We've taken it with us as we finalized our new Skills and now it's time to go from the BETA to the live version.$NL;$NL; Have fun and keep those helmets popping!
tran_text: 隨著夏季的來臨，這是合適的時間以推出第一百個更新！這是一個相當的旅程，而且我們希望為這個更新記念這個快樂的時刻！$NL;在第一百個更新，所有 Steam 社交群組會員將會得到權限使用我們新的 HEF 手榴彈。$NL;同時這是釋出我們新、改版的技能樹到正式版本的時候。我們感謝所以參加了技能測試的玩家，提供了回饋及想法。我們考慮後就決定了我們新的技能樹，現在是時候由測試版變正式版了。$NL;$NL;玩得開心及保持頭盔飛舞！

orig_text: The natural dexterity of the Burglar has benefits beyond merely breaking and entering. Being nimble allows the Burglar to pick locks, bag bodies and answer pagers faster. They are also harder to hit in combat. They stay alive by staying out of the way.$NL;$NL;This physical conditioning also gives the Burglar a high tolerance to pain and the ability to shrug off wounds quickly.
tran_text: Burglar $NL;竊賊的自然敏捷所帶來的好處已經不僅僅是撬門入室了。因為敏捷所以允許夜賊更快地開鎖，打包，和回答無線電。他們也很難在戰鬥中受到重創。他們在在外面生存下去的辦法。$NL;$NL;這調理體質也給了夜賊對疼痛的較高耐受性，和迅速擺脫創傷的能力。

The Maniac Perk Deck is the embodiment of crazy and to never accept bad odds in moments of danger. By pushing through and constantly deal damage, your fellow heisters will be granted a temporary shield making all of you feel Jimmy's invulnerable spirit.
tran_text: Maniac $NL;瘋子牌組是瘋狂的化身及從不接受在危險中面對差的機會。透過推動及保持傷害，你的所有劫匪將會獲得暫時性的護罩令你感到 Jimmy 無懈可擊的衝擊。

orig_text: To others, uneven stacks of books, piles of paper and assorted antique knick-nacks lying about in chaotic disarray are nothing but a useless mess, but to Duke, each item contains clues to a wonderful puzzle that must be solved.
tran_text: 對其他人來說，不均勻的書堆、一堆紙張及不同的古董放在混亂的地方只是沒用的雜物。但對 Duke 來說，每一件物品都帶有精彩拼圖的線索。

orig_text: Nationality: English$NL;Age: 32$NL;$NL;Hoxton got his name from being caught with his old gang in the East End of London. After doing time in HMYOI he worked with several crime syndicates in his 20s until he finally joined the PAYDAY gang. After a successful stint of major heists up until 2011, Hoxton was captured by the FBI and sent to prison.$NL;$NL;In 2014, the PAYDAY gang helped him escape. Ever since he got out, he has been convinced someone set him up.
tran_text: 國籍：英國$NL;年齡：32$NL;$NL;Hoxton這名字取自他與老團隊在倫敦東區被捕的地方。 在英格蘭服獄後，20多歲期間一直與數個犯罪集團合作直到最後加入了PAYDAY幫。 2011年在成功幹了一筆大劫案後，Hoxton被FBI抓到並被關進監獄。$NL;$NL;2014年，PAYDAY幫幫助他越獄。儘管現在他出來了，他堅信有人出賣他。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Hoxton做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: The Election Day Heist is the third free heist update to PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to take a new contract from the corrupt politician the Elephant called the Election Day heist. Heisters are to help the Elephant get his man Bob McKendrick into the Mayor's office by locating the voting machines. The heisters then need to hack the machines to swing the vote. Finally, heisters need to make sure no suspicion falls on The Elephant. Along with the new Election Day heist comes a major stealth update. The Chimano Custom pistol is also added for free to anyone who joins the Official PAYDAY 2 Community group on Steam. Last but not least, players can enjoy 10 new achievements to unlock.
tran_text: 選舉日劫案是PAYDAY2第三個自由搶劫的更新。允許劫匪們簽署一份新合約，腐敗的政客--Elephant召募選舉日劫案。劫匪們以找到投票機以幫助找到Elephant將他的自己人Bob McKendrick成功進入市長辦公室。然後劫匪們需要駭入投票機以控制選舉。最後，劫匪們需要確保Elephant身上沒有任何嫌疑。新的選舉日更新帶來了潛入的風氣。只要加入Steam的PAYDAY2群組就能得到免費的Chimano Custom pistol。最後但並非不重要，玩家可以享受解鎖10個新的成就。

orig_text: Though young, Sokol has everything to become a legendary heister. A gifted athlete, Sokol also possesses keen intelligence and understands his role in a team. He is fearless and physical, and uses this to get amongst the enemy, whether that be a team of hockey players or a team of SWAT.
tran_text: 儘管年輕，Sokol擁有成為傳奇劫匪的所有特質。作為一個有天賦的運動員，Sokol 擁有敏銳的智慧之餘亦深明自己在團隊裡的角色定位。他無所畏懼且身體強健，並且擅用這些優勢來擊敗敵人，無論對手是曲棍球員還是SWAT特警都一樣。

tran_text: Dallas 的角落是他用來計劃下一次劫案及保持觀察外界的地方，在這裡可以輕易檢查支線任務及連上 Crime.Net 。

Nationality: Unknown$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;I had my doubts at first, I'll admit, but Jimmy has turned out to have all the skills to excel as a heister of Crime.Net caliber. He has no limits, never turning down a contract and lives every day like it's his last. He is loyal and has proven to be an excellent addition I never thought we needed.
tran_text: 國籍：未知$NL;年齡：未知$NL;$NL;我承認我最初的確有懷疑，但 Jimmy 展現出適合 Crime.net 劫匪的高超技巧。他沒有極限，從不會放棄合約以及竭力活過每一天。他十分忠誠，而且是我從未想到的十分優秀的新人。

orig_text: This is a The Alesso Heist item!

It's time for a diamond robbery - The Diamond Store Heist is the first free heist that is released for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do a classy diamond store heist in downtown Washington D.C. The diamond store is a high fashion jewelry store. There are mostly diamonds in there however and Bain wants them all. Be wary though as there are alarms connected to the display cases. It will be a tough one but the PAYDAY gang loves a good challenge! $NL;$NL;All heisters can enjoy four new masks along with patterns and materials. With this update we introduced the titanium safes as well as Ilija the Sniper.
tran_text: 是時候來一次鑽石搶劫 - 在華盛頓市中心的鑽石店是一個高級時裝珠寶店，玩家要做一次優雅的鑽石店搶劫，而鑽石店搶劫是PAYDAY2的第一個自由搶劫。在那裡有許多鑽石，Bain希望能夠取得所有鑽石。因為展覽櫃有連接警鐘，所以要小心。這將是一次困難的行動，但PAYDAY成員喜歡很棒的挑戰！$NL;$NL;所有強盜們可以享受四個新的面具以及圖案和材質。伴隨這次更新，我們推出了鈦保險箱。$NL;以及Ilija狙擊手。

orig_text: Anti-alias reduces jaggies at the cost of performance.

orig_text: All of your perk deck effects are increased by ##$multiperk;## while you are standing in the smoke screen. While any of your allies are standing in the smoke screen, they gain ##$multiperk2;## dodge chance.$NL;$NL;Deck Completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by ##$multiperk3;##.

orig_text: $NL;$NL;GENERAL CONTROLS:$NL;$NL;Roll over a map point to find out more.$NL;$NL;Left click on a map point to open it in the menu.$NL;$NL;When viewing an item in the menu, left click on the item point list or on the map to place the item.$NL;$NL; Click [RIGHT MOUSE] on a menu item to find it on the map. $NL;$NL;Hold [CTRL] + [LEFT MOUSE] to draw.
