orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You revive crew members ##$multibasic;## faster. Shouting at your teammates will increase their movement and reload speed by ##$multibasic2;## for ##$multibasic3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;There is a ##$multipro;## chance that you can revive crew members at a distance of up to ##$multipro3;## meters by shouting at them. This cannot occur more than once every ##$multipro2;## seconds.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你救起隊友的時間快 ##$multibasic;## 。 呼喝隊友可增加他的移動速度及換彈速度 ##$multibasic2;## ，維持 ##$multibasic3;## 秒。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你能在 ##$multipro3;## 米距離內用叫聲遙距救起隊友，成功率 ##$multipro;## ，隔著牆壁和地板亦可，冷卻時間 ##$multipro2;## 秒。

orig_text: Get additional help from the outside.
Ethan and Hila should not be underestimated. You might think they're just a pair of soft video celebrities, but these guys are highly motivated, they need the cash. And Hila's been in the army.
tran_text: Ethan and Hila是不容小看的。也許你會認為他們只是一對拍片名人，但實際上金錢給他們的動力超乎想像。而且Hila還在軍中待過。

orig_text: Damaging an enemy heals ##$multiperk;## life points every ##$multiperk2;## seconds for ##$multiperk3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;This effect stacks but cannot occur more than once every ##$multiperk4;## seconds and only while wearing the Two-piece Suit or Lightweight Ballistic Vest.
tran_text: 傷害一個敵人時，每 ##$multiperk2;## 秒回復 ##$multiperk;## 點血量，持續 ##$multiperk3;## 秒。$NL;$NL;這個效果可以疊加但是冷卻 ##$multiperk4;## 秒及只有在穿西裝或輕型防彈背心下有效。

orig_text: In October the OVERKILL crew celebrated that PAYDAY turned 3 years old by throwing Crimefest, a 12 day long celebration between October 16-27. There were no less than 7 in-game updates made - all for free - as well as news about upcoming content. We also hosted the 2 hour Crimefest live stream with the Creatures in the Monster Energy DreamHack Studio in Stockholm. Old Hoxton, John Wick and the Hoxton Breakout heist were all released during the event. Last but not least, we finally opened the doors to our merchandise store at store.overkillsoftware.com.
tran_text: 在十月,Overkill將會舉行犯罪盛宴來慶祝Payday 2的三歲生日，這個活動會在10月16-27號舉行，為時七天。活動期間至少會有七次更新 - 全部免費 - 包括一些最新內容。我們會和 Creatures一起在斯德哥爾摩的 Monster Energy DreamHack Studio 舉辦兩個小時的犯罪盛宴的直播。Old Hoxton、John Wick還有老哈越獄記(Hoxton Breakout)都將會在這個活動中發行。最後，我們終於打開了官方實體店，玩家只需要去store.overkillsoftware.com就可以見到了。

orig_text: All players gain $absorption; base damage absorption.
tran_text: 所有玩家只吸收 $absorption; 基礎傷害。

orig_text: $name; tried to cheat by throwing too many grenades.
tran_text: $name;試著違法丟出超額的投擲物。

orig_text: You have a new safe house! Would you like to go there now?
tran_text: 你有了新的安全屋！你想不想現在就出發去？

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You are ##$multibasic;## more likely to knock down an enemy with a melee strike.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You take ##$multipro;## less damage from all melee attacks because of training.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你的近戰攻擊將敵人打倒在地的機率增加##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;敵人對你近戰攻擊所受的傷害減輕##$multipro;##

orig_text: You gain ##$multibasic;## increased concealment. When wearing armor, your movement speed is ##$multibasic2;## less affected.
tran_text: 你的隱匿值上升 ##$multibasic;## 。當你穿著護甲時，移動速度受影響減少 ##$multibasic2;## 。

orig_text: The Gage Weapon Pack #01 is the third DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. Frag Grenades make their first entry into the PAYDAY series and are bound to spice things up. With the new Grenade Case asset, players can share grenades with each other in the heists.$NL;$NL;Three new weapons are added and players can now toggle between Single- and Auto-fire with all full auto weapons. Four new animal masks have been added, as well as new patterns and materials.
tran_text: Gage武器包#01 是Payday2的第三個DLC。讓手榴彈第一次進入Payday系列並且讓遊戲更有樂趣。通過新的手榴彈箱裝備，玩家可以在劫案中分享手榴彈使用。$NL;$NL;添加了三把新武器並且現在玩家可以自己切換所有全自動武器的單發和連發模式。增加了四個新的動物面具，還有新圖案和新材料。

orig_text: Buy the codes for the bank shutters
tran_text: 購買密碼以使用於銀行的百葉窗

orig_text: You gain ##$multiperk;## more health.$NL;$NL;For every ##$multiperk3;## points of health gained during the injector effect while at maximum health, the recharge time of the injector is reduced by ##$multiperk4;## second.$NL;$NL;Deck Completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by ##$multiperk5;##.
tran_text: 血量增加 ##$multiperk;## 。$NL;$NL;當滿血時，注射器效果中獲得的每 ##$multiperk3;## 點血量，都減少注射器重新充能時間 ##$multiperk4;## 秒。$NL;$NL;牌組完成獎勵：你可以在PAYDAY獲得更高品質物品的機率增加 ##$multiperk5;##。

orig_text: While the Waking Nightmare mutator is active, complete any of the White Xmas, Santa's Workshop, or Stealing Xmas jobs. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 當開啟了覺醒的夢靨時，完成白色聖誕劫或聖誕工坊或聖誕大盜。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: Solve the riddle found on day 8 of the Locke & Load Event website.
tran_text: 在 Locke & Load 第八天網頁中解開迷語。

orig_text: Clover really wants that sandwich. No, not any sandwich - that one.
tran_text: Clover真的想要一份三明治..不，不是隨便一份 － 是這一個。

orig_text: From: Bain [bain@///REDACTED///]$NL;To: $player;$NL;Date: 2014-03-20 17:59 (GMT+1)$NL;Subject: Skill changes$NL;$NL;I've made some changes to the skills. See below.$NL;$NL;General$NL;» You and your crew can now answer four pagers in total, no skills required. You're all smooth talkers now.$NL;» Everyone can now bag bodies and can carry one empty body bag in their inventory.$NL;$NL;Specific$NL;Spotter (Mastermind)$NL;» The spotter skill replaces Smooth Talker and allows you to unlock a Spotter Asset. During stealth the spotter will highlight guards for you and your crew.$NL;$NL;Camera Loop (Ghost)$NL;» Camera Loop replaces Lucky Charm. Interacting with any camera (including Titan cameras) at close range will cause it to temporarily see a pre-recorded loop for the next 10 seconds so you can sneak past.$NL;» Acing the skill adds another 10 seconds.$NL;$NL;Cleaner (Ghost)$NL;» Basic skill unlocks the Body Bags Asset, which contains 3 extra body bags that can be shared with your crew.$NL;» Acing the skill lets you carry one extra empty body bag in your inventory.$NL;$NL;- Bain
tran_text: 發件人：Bain[bain@///打碼///]$NL;收件人：$player;$NL;日期：2014年3月20日 17時59分(GMT +1)$NL;標題：技能改變$NL;$NL;我修改了一下技能。看看下面。$NL;$NL;一般$NL;»你和你的隊友現在能總計回覆四個無線電，不需要技能。你們現在是說話最穩重的人。$NL;»每人現在都能包走屍體，而且能在物品欄帶備空的屍體包。$NL;$NL;特定$NL;觀察者(黑手)$NL;»觀察者技能取代了Smooth Talker和容許你解鎖觀察者有利條件。在潛行時，觀察者會為你們標示警衛。$NL;$NL;干擾攝像頭(幽靈)$NL;»干擾攝像頭取代了Lucky Charm。近距離與任何攝像頭接觸(包括泰坦攝像頭)導致他在未來10秒暫時看到預先錄製的片段，所以你可以偷偷摸摸地走過。$NL;»精通此技能可額外增加10秒。$NL;$NL;清潔工(幽靈)$NL;»基礎能解鎖屍體袋有利條件，帶有3個額外屍體袋，容許與你的隊友共用。$NL;»精通此技能容許你在物品欄帶有額外一個屍體袋。$NL;$NL;- Bain
這是 傳說 的物品！

orig_text: Kill 25 tasers using weapons of your choice.

BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;When three or more enemies within ##$multibasic;## meters are targeting you, you receive a ##$multibasic2;## damage bonus that lasts for ##$multibasic3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;When three or more enemies within ##$multipro;## meters are targeting you, you also receive a ##$multipro2;## damage reduction that lasts for ##$multipro3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;當你被三名或以上的敵人在 ##$multibasic;## 公尺內圍攻時，你增加 ##$multibasic2;## 殺傷力，維持 ##$multibasic3;## 秒。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;當你被三名或以上的敵人在  ##$multipro;## 公尺內圍攻時，你受傷減免 ##$multipro2;## 維持 ##$multipro3;## 秒。$NL;$NL;注意： 不適用於近戰傷害、投擲物、榴彈發射器或火箭炮。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can now select a less noisy version of the sentry guns, making them much less likely to be targeted by enemies.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You can now toggle AP rounds on your sentry guns, lowering the rate of fire by ##$multipro;##, but increasing damage by ##$multipro2;## and allowing it to pierce through enemies and shields.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你的步哨塔現在可以選擇低音模式，減少被當成目標的機率。同時開放步哨塔作為副裝備的能力$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你的步哨塔現在可以切換成穿甲彈，減少 ##$multipro;## 開火速率，但是增加 ##$multipro2;## 傷害及穿透敵人與盾牌的能力。

orig_text: Jacket has found something that you might like, but to get it, you will have to jump through a couple of hoops.
tran_text: Jacket 找到你可能喜歡的東西，但要拿到它，你需要完成某些挑戰。

orig_text: Bodhi hunts the waves as much as the next challenge. Building surfboards helps him meditate and prepare for the ordeals of the Ozaki 8.
tran_text: Bodhi 的下一個挑戰是不停追浪。生產衝浪板幫助他沉思及準備 Ozaki 8 的試煉。

orig_text: The heavy approach: Steal a bus, then drive it at full speed through a weak spot in the back wall, creating a bridge to the adjacent car lot where the escape van is waiting. Simple but effective.
tran_text: 這是個很猛的計畫：先偷一輛巴士再把巴士飆到最快來撞破牆，恰恰好在你與接應車停的停車場形成一道橋梁。很簡單，但也很驚人。

orig_text: The Infamy update is the first late-game update to PAYDAY 2. It allows players to explore the new Infamy tree and gain rewards such as skill tree bonuses along with masks, materials and patterns.$NL;$NL;Becoming Infamous is for the players that dare to go beyond level 100 and give up everything to become the most wanted criminals on Crime.net. Law enforcers will flee in horror when they see you and friends will jealously watch as you climb the ladder of crime in order to unlock awesome new loot.
tran_text: The Infamy更新是PAYDAY 2的第一個潛在更新。它容許玩家去探索新的惡名樹，類似技能樹獎勵的賺取獎勵，例如面具、材料、圖案。$NL;$NL;當玩家膽敢到達等級100而又放棄一切來變成於Crime.net中被通緝的罪犯，就能變得惡名昭彰。當執法單位見到你和你的朋友眼紅地看住你爬過犯罪的階梯，解鎖雄壯、新的贓物時，他們會驚嚇得逃走。

orig_text: $name; tried to cheat by throwing too many bags.
Your team AI will now use armor piercing rounds. This enables them to shoot through shields and armor.
tran_text: 你隊伍 AI 現在能用穿甲彈，這容量他們射穿盾兵及護甲。

orig_text: AOB has higher performance but lower visual quality. SSAO has higher visual quality.
tran_text: AOB 有較好的表現但較差的影像質素。 SSAO 則有較好的影像質素。

orig_text: You are ##$multiperk;## less likely to be targeted when you are close to your crew members.
tran_text: 你和你的成員在一起時，你會被當成目標的機率減少 ##$multiperk;## 。

orig_text: Buy frag grenades to share with your crew
tran_text: 買手榴彈箱以分享給你的隊友

orig_text: HOST A GAME OR FIND GAMES TO JOIN.
tran_text: 主持遊戲或搜索遊戲加入。

orig_text: Visit Steam now to play the Golden Grin Casino, get a new weapon, new weapon mods, masks, materials and patterns! Purchase the GOLDEN GRIN CASINO DLC now!
tran_text: 現在遊覽 Steam 以遊玩金牙大賭場，得到新武器、武器附掛、面具、材質及圖案！現在購買 GOLDEN GRIN CASINO DLC！

orig_text: HOST A LAN GAME OR FIND LAN GAMES TO JOIN.
tran_text: 主持區域網絡遊戲或搜索區域網絡遊戲加入。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;For every hit with a pistol you gain a ##$multibasic4;## damage boost that lasts for ##$multibasic2;## seconds. Stacks up to ##$multibasic3;## times.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the damage boost duration to ##$multipro2;## seconds.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;用手槍射中敵人後你的傷害增加##$multibasic4;## ，持續##$multibasic2;##秒，可以疊加##$multibasic3;##次。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;持續時間增加到##$multipro2;## 秒。

orig_text: OVERKILL's The Walking Dead: The Lucille Baseball Bat DLC is the first collaboration between OVERKILL's The Walking Dead and PAYDAY 2. It was announced and implemented together with the reveal of What's Next. It introduces the Lucille Baseball Bat for heiesters to hit those really good homeruns with. The bat is known from The Walking Dead universe where it is the beloved weapon of Negan, the leader of the Saviors. The Lucille Baseball bat is free to anyone who joins the PAYDAY 2 Official Community Group on Steam.
tran_text: OVERKILL的The Walking Dead: The Lucille Baseball Bat DLC是PAYDAY 2中第一個合成。這預告及貫徹一起未來的展示。這為劫匪介紹了Lucille Baseball Bat去打擊是如何美好。球棍是來自中的The Walking Dead universe中的生還者領袖Negan最心愛的武器。任何人只要加入Steam上的官方PAYDAY 2群組就能獲得Lucille棒球球棒。

orig_text: If you proceed, your reputation level will be reset to level 0. All your skills and unspent skill points will be removed. The cash on your offshore account however will remain.$NL;$NL;You will start over with no skills. This is not reversible, and you CAN NOT get back what you sacrifice.$NL;$NL;You get to keep all your guns, mods, masks, patterns and materials. You will also gain one level of Infamy and one Infamy point to spend in the Infamy tree.
tran_text: 如果你進行了，你的聲望等級會重設回零，所有技能及技能點都會被去除，現金及海外資金則不變。$NL;$NL;你會由無技能開始，這是不可逆轉的行為，而且你不能拿回你犧牲了的東西。$NL;$NL;你可能保留所有你的槍、武器零件、圖案及材質。同時你亦提升了一級惡名，獲得一點惡名點數於惡名樹使用。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Getting ##$multibasic;## headshots in less than ##$multibasic2;## seconds will refund ##$multibasic3;## bullet to your used weapon. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The amount of headshots required is reduced to ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;在 ##$multibasic2;## 秒內，連續 ##$multibasic;## 個爆頭將退還 ##$multibasic3;## 發子彈到你所使用的武器。只有單發射擊的衝鋒槍、突擊步槍與狙擊槍能觸發此效果。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;爆頭需求減少至 ##$multipro;## 。

orig_text: When a Bulldozer's face plate is destroyed, the Bulldozer enters a berserker rage, receiving a $damage;% increase to their base damage output.
tran_text: 當 Bulldozer 的面睪被破壞， Bulldozer 進入狂戰士模式，基礎傷害獲得 $damage;% 加成。
壟斷畫作(Painting Yourself Into a Corner)

orig_text: In the Ukrainian job, complete the heist within 35 seconds.
tran_text: 在烏克蘭人的委託(Ukraine Job)，在35秒內完成劫案。

orig_text: Complete the Hoxton Breakout job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above, with the Clone Army - Bulldozers mutator active. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 難度下完成啟用了複製人部隊－ Bulldozer 的老哈越獄記。要完成這項挑戰，需全程在場。

orig_text: The security barrier for the skylight won't close due to Micho conveniently jamming the mechanism.
tran_text: Micho會幫我們阻止天窗柵欄關閉。

orig_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;Allegedly, he once wiped out the entire Russian Mafia in Miami all on his own. His background in the military and his unflinching attitude towards over-the-top violence has made him an excellent hitman - or "messenger" as some like to call it. For unknown reasons he is completely mute and chooses to communicate only with the help of a tape recorder - playing back bits and pieces of language learning tapes, PAs and documentary narrations instead of speaking.
tran_text: 國籍：美國$NL;年齡：未知$NL;$NL;傳聞他隻身一人消滅整個邁阿密的俄國黑手黨。他的軍事背景和他對於極至暴力的堅定態度造就他成為一名殺手－或是有人稱他為"傳訊者"。因為不明原因，他隻字不語，只用錄音機對話－播放語言學習帶子、廣播和紀錄片的片段代替說話$NL;$NL;當你選擇Jacket做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: Jacket has found something that you might like, but to get it, you will have to jump through a couple of hoops.
tran_text: Jacket 找到你可能喜歡的東西，但要拿到它，你需要完成某些挑戰。

orig_text: This is Sangres' cozy den, his cave, his castle. It's perfect. And there's tequila.
tran_text: 這是 Sangres 舒適的書房、洞穴、城堡，這很完美，還有龍舌蘭酒。
好音樂可以增加舞池人數

orig_text: The side jobs feature is a way to earn rewards by successfully completing specific challenges. There are three types of side jobs: the dailies, weeklies and the monthlies. These side jobs will be updated on regular intervals which means that you will be able to get access to new dailies, weeklies and monthlies as well as be able to complete previously uncompleted ones. As soon as a side job has been completed, a cheering sound can be heard notifying you of this. You can only complete them once, until they are updated$NL;$NL;Once you did what was required of you, the side job will turn yellow. This means you can now claim your reward. To claim it go to the daily, weekly or monthly that is marked yellow and click on each item that is displayed in the reward box to claim it.$NL;$NL;Dailies award you with a random mod for the weapon of your choice and cash. These are replaced every 24 hours.$NL;Weeklies award you with a specified mask and cash. These are replaced every 7 days.$NL;Monthly side jobs awards you with a Stat Boost or Team Boost weapon mod. These are replaced every month.
tran_text: 支線任務是個通過完成特定挑戰從而獲得獎勵的途徑。有兩種類型的支線任務：每日以及每週。支線任務將會周期性的更新，意味著當你刷新了支線任務同時能在期限內繼續完成上一個進行了一半的任務。每日或每週支線任務一但完成，一個歡呼的聲效將提醒你已完成。你只能完成它們一次，直到他們更新。$NL;$NL;一旦你完成要求你的任務，日常或周常會變黃色。這意味著你可以獲得你的報酬。為了獲得報酬去每週每日任務裡標記黃色的部分並點擊每個在報酬欄裡展示的內容。$NL;$NL;日常任務獎勵你可選範圍內隨機一個配件以及現金。每24小時刷新$NL;每週任務獎勵你特定面具以及現金。每7天刷新。

orig_text: Nationality: Cuban$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;They don't make 'em like Tony anymore. A fast talker who knows what he wants and how to get it. He's the real deal when the shit hits the fan, a true-born heister. He doesn't back down for anyone and he dishes it out just as hard as he can take it. This guy's got balls.
tran_text: 國籍： 古巴$NL;年齡： 未知$NL;$NL;他們不再模仿 Tony ，一個口快的人知道他想要甚麼和如果得到，在大難臨頭時仍能完美處理，一個真正天生的劫匪。他對住誰都不會退縮及承擔壓力，這傢伙有膽量。
用手榴彈殺死 $max_progress; 個敵人。

orig_text: The Bomb Heists DLC is the 15th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds the first two heists from the new contact known as the Butcher. It's bombs away as you help the Butcher succeed with the heists Dockyard and Forest as a part of the Bomb job. With the Bomb Heists being released, we're excited to share what Lion Game Lion have been working on as their first DLC for PAYDAY 2. Everyone at OVERKILL and Lion Game Lion look forward to hear what the community thinks after you've played the new content! Together with the Bomb heists, you also get one new pistol, four new masks with four materials and patterns. 11 new achievements have also been added to give you that extra challenge.
tran_text: The Bomb Heists DLC是PAYDAY 2的第十五個DLC，為新的合約人-Butcher加入了二個新的劫案。你幫忙Butcher在造船廠及森林中取走炸彈。同時這個DLC是由Lion Game Lion為PAYDAY 2製造的第一個DLC。所有OVERKILL和Lion Game Lion的成員都期望在社群聽到你們的回應！在炸彈劫案中，你還獲得一把新的手槍、四個新的面具與四個材料及圖案。我們亦加入了11個新的成就作為你們的新挑戰。

orig_text: Do you wish to reset all control options to their default state?
tran_text: 你確定要重置所有控制選項為預設嗎？

orig_text: The PAYDAY gang's crime spree couldn't last forever without someone taking action. Commissioner Garrett has been assigned by Mayor McKendrick to deal with them once and for all. His first move is to assist the police officers on the ground with one of his own trusted subordinates, Captain Winters, who will improve their morale and vitality. The gang have not been idle during these new developments and have placed an insider in the FBI to gain access to what they actually know about them. They now have access to it all; their profiles with weapon and crime statistics together with Commissioner Garrett's investigation and the FBI's internal communications! Bain also updated the Crime.net database and the gang now has a new and slick way to access their gear and specializations. All of this content is completely free!
tran_text: PAYDAY 團伙的犯罪行徑不可能永遠沒人採取行動。 Garrett 警監被 McKendrick 市長委任用以根除他們。他的第一部是指派他的親信下屬 Captain Winters 協助警務人員的外勤工作，增強警員士氣與戰力。團伙也沒在這些新舉措下無動於衷而是在聯邦調查局裡安置了內應獲得進入許可。現在他們能看到所有；結合Garrett 警監調查與聯邦調查局的內部通訊得知他們的武器配置犯罪統計！貝恩同時更新了Crime.net數據，這樣團伙可以以嶄新靈活的方式來查看裝備和技能。所有這些內容都是免費的！

orig_text: Ammunition can, unfortunately, be scarce at times, so it's important to be able to take down the enemy effectively.
tran_text: 子彈可以，很不幸地，有時會害怕，所以快點解決敵人很重要。

orig_text: View a list of your friends and send invites to your game.

orig_text: Every time you or your crew perfoms a kill you will gain ##$multiperk;## health and ##$multiperk2;## armor. This cannot occur more than ##$multiperk3;## times every ##$multiperk4;## seconds.
tran_text: 每次你或你的隊友殺到敵人時，你將會回復 ##$multiperk;## 的血量及 ##$multiperk2;## 的裝甲。這不會在每 ##$multiperk4;## 秒中發生多於 ##$multiperk3;## 次。

orig_text: There's a line one must never cross. And it's not hurting pigs - it's hurting dogs. They're man's best friend and unlike humans they are loyal and obedient. So it's not more than fair that we will hunt you down for even looking at a loveable little dachshund or schnauzer in the wrong way.
tran_text: 這裡有一條永遠不會相交，而且不是傷害豬 - 而是傷害狗。它們是人最好的朋友而且不像人，它們是忠誠且聽話的。所以我們傷害你並不公平，甚至以錯誤的方法看著可愛的臘腸狗和雪納瑞。

orig_text: On day 1 of the Rats job, cook and secure 7 bags worth of meth without blowing up the lab on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在難度OVERKILL或以上的鼠輩(Rats)任務中，以不炸掉實驗室為前提，做出並帶走七包冰毒。

tran_text: 用 Rivertown Glen 酒瓶 (Rivertown Glen Bottle) 擊殺 $max_progress; 個敵人。

orig_text: The Continental is a mysterious institution, a hotel but also a safe haven for professional assassins and others who move in the shadows. Sometimes the Continental has need of services, services that require special talents. This is where the Payday Gang comes into the picture.
tran_text: 歐洲集團是一個神秘的組織，除了是一間旅館外還是專業刺客及犯罪分子的避風港，有時候他們需要一些需要特殊能力的服務，所以 Payday 幫就入來了。

tran_text: Sangres 被安置在這裡，他拿到啤酒、一張長椅以及巨大的墨西哥旗－你還有甚麼需要？

orig_text: A Crime Spree is an endless series of randomly selected heists, executed in succession. With each heist you complete, your Rank and Reward will increase! Each 20th or 26th rank you will need to choose a modifier and each 50th rank there is an increase to enemy health and damage, that will make the next heists harder to complete.$NL;$NL;Heisters need to be at least level 60 or Infamy 1 and be able to pay the Continental Coin fee to go on a Crime Spree.$NL;$NL;##If you invite your crew, make sure they started their own Crime Spree before joining in order to gain Ranks and Rewards as well.##
tran_text: 犯罪狂歡是一系列隨機選出的劫案，連續進行。當你犯罪狂歡中一直完成劫案，每一劫案都會提升你的獎勵等級，同時難度亦以數值變化的方式提升至越來越難。$NL;有技巧的劫匪，在犯罪狂歡能獲得大量經驗值、現金以至掉落物品。在一次的犯罪狂歡中沒有限制你玩多少個劫案。$NL;需要；$NL;-聲望等級最少有 60 。$NL;-必須有足夠的歐洲幣。

orig_text: "You know, we should go for a hamburger run after we deal with the thing in the slaughter house. No time to stick around for anything unnessesary"
tran_text: 你知道的，我們在完成屠宰場後該去吃漢堡飽，沒有時間去理會沒用的其他東西

orig_text: Pulled pork sandwiches got popular again after that gringo serial-killer talked about them in that TV show a few years ago. Don't believe me? Go back and check how many places sold 'em before then. And now I'm hungry. Maybe we stop and get a pig on the next job.
tran_text: 手撕豬肉三明治在外國連環殺人犯在電視展示後又再盛行了，你不信？那就回去看看賣了多少塊，現在我餓了，或許我們可以停下來在下一場工作拿隻豬。
電鋸直接鋸穿你 (Saw Right Through You)

orig_text: Find Almir's toast on White Xmas.
tran_text: 在白色聖誕劫 (White Xmas) 中找到 Almir's toast 。

orig_text: Nationality: Mexican$NL;Age: 33$NL;$NL;Sangres is a dangerous man. He spent many years working as an enforcer and assassin for a drug cartel in Monterrey, Mexico. Then one day he decided to defect and crossed the border to the US, looking to make the big bucks. Gage introduced him to the Payday Gang. He's as skilled as he's ruthless and with those revolvers he can really light things up. And yeah... check out that razor-sharp machete.
tran_text: 國籍： 墨西哥$NL;年齡： 33$NL;$NL;Sangres 是個危險的人，他多年來都在蒙特雷的毒品廠中當暴徒及刺客，之後有一天他決定了投降及透過邊界進入美國，希望能賺大錢。 Gage 介紹了他來 Payday 幫，他的無情加上左輪能燒開一切，還有... 看看那鋒利的彎腰。

tran_text: 這是 Butcher Mod Pack 的物品！

orig_text: A TV is essential for any den of a mute crazy person.

orig_text: Fancy bathrooms, a luxurious lounge and a swanky kitchen that's looking better than ever. Guests will be impressed.
tran_text: 花佾的俗室，華麗的大廳及合潮流的廚房，它們看起來很完美，客人會對它們印象很深刻。

orig_text: Clover knows what's in that secret vault. She wants it. Get it for her.
tran_text: Clover 知道秘密倉庫內有甚麼。她想要，去拿給她。

orig_text: Complete a Crime Spree of rank 100 or above, with all heisters using the AMCAR rifle, Chimano 88 pistol, and no skills. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the heist from start to end.

orig_text: This is a Loot Bag item!
tran_text: 這是 Loot Bag 的物品！

orig_text: The press will be watching the Hoxton trial, so there will be eyes on his breakout. Do it with style. No skills, sharp suits, Golden AK.762's and Chicago Typewriters. Oh, and OVERKILL style too.
tran_text: Hoxton的審判是媒體的焦點，他要落跑一定會吸引眾人的目光，所以要做得霸氣一點，所有人不要耍花招(技能)，穿西裝打領帶，然後拿著黃金AK.762還有芝加哥打字機(Chicago Typewriters)上吧！$NL;喔！對了！還要有OVERKILL的作風。

orig_text: In the Nightclub job, zip-tie the DJ and bring him to the escape zone by the escape van.
tran_text: 在夜總會狂歡(Nightclub)中，用束帶綁住DJ並將他帶到逃脫區。

orig_text: You do ##$multiperk;## more damage. Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.$NL;$NL;Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by ##$multiperk2;##.

orig_text: Start your own Crime Spree to gain ranks and rewards.
tran_text: 開始你的犯罪狂歡以賺取等級及獎勵。

orig_text: Something wicked this way comes. The John Wick Character Pack is the first free character pack for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as John Wick, the Hitman of the PAYDAY gang. Other than John himself, it includes the Hitman perk deck, three shades, the URSA Tanto knife and the Chimano Compact pistol. This character pack was a part of update 40 and is completely free for our players.
tran_text: 人見人怕的殺手來了！John Wick角色包是PAYDAY 2首次推出的角色包。它容許劫匪扮演John Wick，PAYDAY幫內的殺手。除了John自己，這還包括殺手犯罪風格，三副墨鏡、URSA短刀及Chimano Compact手槍。這個角色包已包含在40號更新當中，而且完全免費。

orig_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 32$NL;$NL;A little bit of David to the internet's proverbial Goliath, Ethan is proof that you can never really know what goes on inside Bain's head. As a skilled social media broadcaster, Ethan and his spouse Hila drew the legal ire of some individuals with their documentary work and were forced to spend a minor fortune defending themselves, leaving them financially vulnerable. His skills in public relations and engagement attracted the interest of Bain, who convinced him and his wife to join Payday with promises of restitution, fortune, and glory.
tran_text: 國籍：美國$NL;年齡：32$NL;$NL;大衛有一個經典的聖經故事打倒歌利亞，Ethan 證明了你們真的不能理解 Bain ， Ethan 和配偶 Hila 合法地表達了對某些人的片段的憤怒後被逼花了一筆錢來保護自己，使他們在經濟上出問題了。他在社交處理的技巧引起了 Bain 的興趣並相信可以透過加入 Payday 奪回曾經的名聲、富裕及光榮的人生。
需要 $cost; 歐洲幣以解鎖

orig_text: The Golden Grin Casino Heist DLC is the 24th DLC of PAYDAY 2 and is the last mission issued by The Dentist as part of his deal with the PAYDAY crew. Preplan the heist the way you want to: customize the biggest, most baddass drill yet to play to your crew's strengths and weaknesses when going loud. Or walk in incognito among gamblers and guards while they all dream of a PAYDAY that never's gonna come as you sneak in to take it all from under their noses. The Golden Grin Casino DLC comes not only with a legendary heist but also with 4 masks, 4 patterns, 4 materials, 5 achievements and the foldable, hard punching and high capacity Cavity 9mm Rifle.
tran_text: 金牙大賭場劫案是 PAYDAY 2 第廿四個 DLC，亦是 Dentist 給予 PAYDAY 幫的最後一個任務。依照你的攻略方式來好好運用這次的事前策劃：從有史以來最巨大最邪惡的熱能鑽機的零件配套，到火拼時關乎到隊伍生死的支援資源皆可自訂。你亦可以以無辜之姿混入賭客與守衛之中，在他們發著一夜致富的美夢之時以他們意想不到的手法盜走一切財富。金牙大賭場劫案 DLC 為你帶來的除了這一場傳奇劫案外，還有四個新面具、四個花紋、四個材質、五個新成就，以及一把可摺疊，威力強大且彈藥充足的 Cavity 9mm 半自動步槍。
啥？我根本沒來過！(I Wasn't Even There！)

orig_text: The bar is now much more well stocked, and Jimmy is working hard at emptying it as fast as Aldstone can fill it up.
tran_text: 酒吧有更多存貨了， Jimmy 飲酒速度很辛苦才追得上 Aldstone 裝酒速度。

orig_text: Continental Coins, and the "Hero's Companion" trophy in the safehouse.
tran_text: 歐洲幣以及在安全屋中「英雄夥伴」獎盃。

orig_text: Art can really pay, and I have a guy who will pay for it. Steal all of the sold paintings in Framing Frame (Day 1). He's antsy, though, so do not be seen.
tran_text: 畫作真的很值錢，並且我認識個人肯花大價錢買下它們。偷天換日(Framing Frame)第一天偷盜所有待售畫作。不過他有點焦慮，所以偷竊的時候別被抓到。

orig_text: A new weapon, Continental Coins, and a the "Friends in Close-Quarters" trophy in the safehouse.
tran_text: 新的武器、歐洲幣以及在安全屋中「近戰好朋友」獎盃。

orig_text: Unlocks and equips the Stoic Hip Flask.$NL;$NL;Damage taken is now reduced by ##$multiperk;##. The remaining damage will be applied directly.$NL;$NL;The ##$multiperk;## reduced damage will be applied over-time (##$multiperk2;## seconds) instead.$NL;$NL;You can use the throwable key to activate the Stoic Hip Flask and immediately negate any pending damage. The flask has a ##$multiperk3;## second cooldown but time remaining will be lessened by 1 second per enemy killed.
tran_text: 解鎖及裝備 Stoic 酒壺。$NL;$NL;傷害減免 ##$multiperk;## ，剩下傷害直接承受。$NL;$NL;減免的 ##$multiperk;## 傷害會在接下來的 ##$multiperk2;## 秒轉變成傷害殘留承受。$NL;$NL;你可以使用投擲物以啟用 Stoic 酒壺的效果，以無視接下來即將承受的傷害。酒壺有 ##$multiperk3;## 秒冷卻時間但每殺死一名敵人就會減少 1 秒。

orig_text: Buy the Butcher AK/CAR Mod Pack DLC today!
tran_text: 現在購買 Butcher AK/CAR Mod 包 DLC！

orig_text: Hockey is fast. Russian hockey is faster.
tran_text: 曲棍球很快，俄羅斯的曲棍球更快。

orig_text: In this free update, we have added four smaller heists to the game: Two of those focus on loud-based heists and the other two on stealth-based heists. The philosophy when designing these heists was to teach new players about the basic mechanics of the game, making the entry to PAYDAY 2 a smoother experience, and get players well prepared for more challenging heists as they level up.
tran_text: 在這次的免費更新，我們加入了四個小型劫案：其中兩個集中在突入劫案，而另外兩個則是潛入。設計這些劫案的目的是教導新玩家一些基礎的遊戲機制，讓加入 PAYDAY 2 時有更貼心的經驗，及讓玩家升級來準備更有挑戰性的劫案。

orig_text: Killing an enemy at medium range recovers ##$multiperk;## armor.$NL;$NL;This cannot occur more than once every ##$multiperk2;## second.$NL;$NL;You gain an additional ##$multiperk3;## more armor.
tran_text: 中距離擊殺一個敵人回復 ##$multiperk;## 護甲。$NL;$NL;冷卻時間 ##$multiperk2;## 秒。

tran_text: 使用手刺擊殺 $max_progress; 個敵人。

orig_text: Unlocks if you own the PAYDAY 2 Soundtrack

Complete the Birth of Sky or the Beneath the Mountain job with all members of your team using the Two-Piece Suit and the Armorer perk deck, while also using no skills, on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. To complete this daily, you have to have played the job from start to finish.
tran_text: 在OVERKILL或以上的難度的誕於天際 (Birth of Sky) 或山脊之下 (Beneath the Mountain) ，場上全員穿兩件式西裝，使用軍械士 (Armorer) 牌組及無技能的情況下通關。需全程在場。

Ranged weapons' knock back chance is increased the higher the total damage of the weapon is. Melee weapons' knock back chance is ##$multipro2;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你和隊友的防彈衣的回復間隔時間快 ##$multibasic2;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;用近戰武器或槍攻擊盾兵(Shield)時，依武器傷害提高翻盾機率，近戰武器翻盾機率為 ##$multipro2;## 。

orig_text: Nationality: Unknown$NL;Age: Unknown$NL;$NL;Bodhi is known as one of the greatest legends in the world of crime, but few know the man behind the mask. As the founding father of the Ex-Presidents gang, Bodhi's renowned in the criminal underworld for his extreme athleticism and daring heists. His recent feats of strength in Mumbai and Austria got Bain's attention, granting him an invitation to the PAYDAY gang.
tran_text: 國籍：未知$NL;年齡：未知$NL;$NL;Bodhi 是犯罪界的傳奇之一，但鮮有人知面具下的容貌。前總統團的創始人，鮑迪因為他善於極限運動以及膽大妄為在地下組織間馳名，他最近在孟買和奧地利的壯舉獲得了 Bain 的關注，邀請他加入PAYDAY團。

orig_text: The Gage Sniper Pack DLC is the sixth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds powerful sniper rifles to the player's weapon arsenal. The bullets from a sniper rifle have armor penetration which means they can go through objects like walls. One bullet can even pierce several enemies.$NL;$NL;Three sniper rifles, weapon mods, four new masks, patterns and materials as well as free updates like the golden AK.762 rifle, 17 achievements and the ability to move and re-name weapons and masks in the player inventory.
tran_text: Gage狙擊包是Payday 2第6個DLC同時增加了強力的狙擊步槍於玩家的軍火庫中. 狙擊步槍的子彈可以穿甲,意味着你可以穿過物體射擊到敵人比如一牆. 一發子彈甚至能穿透幾個敵人. $NL;$NL;三把狙擊步槍, 武器零件, 四個新面具,圖案和材料 同时還有免費的升級例如黄金AK.762步槍, 17個成就而且你還能在你的庫存中重命名和移動你的武器和面具.

orig_text: The Payday community did it again! Parallel with everything else that's going on here at OVERKILL we've been trying get as many bug fixes and improvements in as possible as well, this time around we did a huge spring cleaning and fixed tons of bugs, alot of them found by our dedicated players. On top of that we had this whole new XP system that we wanted to implement.$NL;We asked the community for help to test everything in a beta and help we received. Over 2000 players helped us test the beta and now it's ready to go live.$NL;$NL;To all our players, we salute you!
tran_text: Payday社群又做到了！與一切平行外，OVERKILL修正了很多漏洞，及盡可能的優化，這次我們進行了一次巨大的春節清潔活動，並修正了大量的漏洞，大部份是由我們專用的玩家發現。最後，我們想實行新的經驗值系統。$NL;我們在社群邀請了玩家為我們在beta測試及收集數據。超過2000名玩家幫助了我們測試beta，現在就轉至正式。$NL;$NL;現在對所有的玩家致敬！

tran_text: 在運鈔車：十字路口 (Transport: Crossroads)，只用近戰裝備&非爆炸投擲物通關，需全程在場。

orig_text: Don't tip your hand to the Professor during Big Oil (Day 2). Make sure the last engine you haul out is the correct one, and do it OVERKILL.
tran_text: 在石油大亨(Big Oil)第二天，$NL;不要一下子就對那個教授攤牌，最後再把正確的引擎帶走，$NL;記得要做得OVERKILL一點。

orig_text: Variety is the spice of life, huh? The Elephant is refurbishing his pad. He wants one of every piece of loot from the Murkywater warehouse in Shadow Raid.
tran_text: 多采多姿的生活，哼？Elephant正在翻新他的豪宅。他想要所有在Murkywater倉庫、不同種類的物品作為裝飾。

orig_text: On day 3 of the Rat job, get away with 7 bags without defusing any bombs.
tran_text: 在鼠輩(Rats)的第三天，帶走七包贓物且不拆除任何炸彈。

orig_text: $name; cheated by throwing too many bags.
Join a game based on your preferences that can be changed under options.
tran_text: 根據你的設定的優先權加入一場遊戲。

orig_text: The Armored Transport DLC is the second DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and lets players do every heisters dream - robbing armored transports, full of valuables, right in the middle of Washington D.C.$NL;$NL;Up to four friends co-operate on the heists, and as the crew progresses they have a chance to unlock an even more rewarding job - doing a classic train robbery. New weapons, weapon modifications, masks, patterns and materials have been added to let players continue to build and customize their own guns and gear.
tran_text: 裝甲運輸是Payday 2第二個DLC，滿足了玩家的劫匪夢－搶劫正停在華盛頓中部，滿載錢財的武裝押運車。$NL;$NL;組上四個好友合作搶劫，同時團隊進程中有機會解鎖一個獎勵更高的任務－上演一場傳說中的火車劫案。增加了新的武器、武器配件、面具、紋樣以及材質讓玩家繼續愉快的改造定義自己的槍械與外貌。

orig_text: It's Sizzling Hot! The BBQ Weapon Pack is our 18th DLC for PAYDAY 2. Amp up your play style with the Flamethrower Mk.1 so you can spew out flames like only a dragon could. If spewing out flames doesn't tickle your fancy, how about the semi-auto Piglet Grenade Launcher to quickly dispatch groups of enemies, and while we're at it, you can load that baby with either the default Frag rounds or the new Incendiary rounds in case you want to burn something far away. How about some good old throwable Molotov cocktails? And for our BBQ lovers we're adding 4 new melee weapons such as the Fork, Tenderizer, Spatula and Poker. Oh yeah, the pack also includes the Steakout 12G Shotgun, Dragon's Breath shotgun rounds modification, four masks and five achievements. Just to make it even more crisp.
tran_text: 熱得滋滋響！ BBQ武器包是Payday 2的第18個DLC。使用火焰噴射器Mk.1 來像火龍一樣噴出火球。如果能噴火還不夠酷。那不如使用半自動Piglet 榴彈發射器來解體你的敵人。與此同時，這個「大寶貝」裡也能裝填默認的榴彈。如果你想要燒傷遠處的敵人。試試新的燃燒榴彈、老式的莫洛托夫燃燒彈又如何？燒烤愛好者一定會喜歡我們新加入的4種近戰武器：馬的法克叉、打肉錘、抹刀和撥火桿。對了，此DLC還包含Steakout 12G 霰彈槍，龍之氣息燃燒霰彈，四個面具和五個成就。

orig_text: The Point Break Heists is the 29th DLC for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Alcon Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures and Lionsgate. Creating these two heist has been a dream come true for OVERKILL, as Point Break was a huge inspiration when making the PAYDAY games. In "Beneath the Mountain", the PAYDAY gang goes head-to-head with the mercenary army known as Murkywater, infiltrating their very own command center. It would not be a Point Break heist if things didn't go to the extreme. In "Birth of Sky", the gang is set to rob a cargo plane, 20,000ft above the ground. Getting the money will be one thing - getting off the plane, that's something else.
tran_text: Point Break heists 是 PAYDAY 2 第 29 個 DLC 同時也是與愛爾康娛樂，華納兄弟影業，獅門娛樂的聯動。製作這兩個劫案是 OVERKILL 的夢想而今成真，因為飆風特攻給 Payday 系列遊戲帶來大量靈感。在「山脊之下」， PAYDAY 團將直面黑水軍，入侵他們的指揮中心。絕對刺激對得起 Point Break 的名頭。在「誕於天際」，團隊將搶劫貨機，20,000英尺。拿下錢是一回事 － 拿下飛機，那是另回事。

orig_text: The Jimmy Character Pack is the 8th character pack for PAYDAY 2.  This allows heisters to play as the eccentric Jimmy. He has no limits, never turning down a contract and lives every day like it's his last. He is loyal and has proven to be an excellent addition. Other than Jimmy himself, this pack includes the Maniac perk deck, Jimmy's masks, the Specialist knives and the Heather SMG, which introduces the ability to dual-wield SMGs in PAYDAY 2.
tran_text: Jimmy 角色包是第8個PAYDAY 2的角色包，它容許劫匪使用古怪的 Jimmy 。我承認我最初的確有懷疑，但 Jimmy 展現出適合 Crime.net 劫匪的高超技巧。他沒有極限，從不會放棄合約以及竭力活過每一天。他十分忠誠，而且是我從未想到的十分優秀的新人。除了 Jimmy ，這包還包括了瘋子天賦牌組， Specialist knives 和 Heather SMG ，這是PAYDAY 2中第一把的雙持衝鋒槍。

orig_text: The Gage Historical Pack DLC is the 12th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an array of historical weapons to the PAYDAY gang.$NL;$NL;One sniper rifle, one pistol, one submachine gun, one light machine gun, four new melee weapons, the bayonet feature and a host of weapon mods so you can nostalgia hard. Four old, dusty masks have also been added with patterns and materials to personalize them further. 5 new achievements have made their way to see if you are a real man or a fleeing coward.
tran_text: Gage歷史包是Payday2第12個DLC並且增加了一組有歷史性的武器给Payday幫。$NL;$NL;一把狙擊步槍、一把手槍、一把衝鋒槍、一把輕機槍、四把新的近戰武器、刺刀和許多武器零件，因此你可以好好的懷舊一下。同時增加了四個古老而灰塵滿布的面具，新的圖案和材料使你能更好的凸顯個性。5個新成就讓你看看自己是真男人還是個逃跑的懦夫。

orig_text: The Meltdown Heist is our 11th free heist and we're back to where we were one year ago. However this time it's not Gage who wants something, it's Vlad. Driven by greed and madness, this crazy bastard is sending you in for another run at the Murkywater Warehouse. In broad daylight, guns blazing. Bring your heaviest weapons and your thickest armor, Murkywater soldiers and Washington's finest are waiting.$NL;$NL;In this update we also have a new mask that will bring a new era of green thinking together with four new challenging achievements!
tran_text: 爐心熔解是我們的第十一個劫案。我們要回到一年前去過的地方。但這次的雇主不是Gage，是Vlad。這個瘋子將把你們再一次送到Murkywater倉庫。在大太陽下進行火拼。拿起你最大把的槍和最厚的護甲，準備和Murkywater的傭兵以及Washington警察來場前所未有的戰爭。$NL;$NL;在這次的更新中我們新增一個具有環保概念的面具和四個成就。

orig_text: All players receive $throwables;% extra throwable weapons. (Minimum: 1)
tran_text: 所有玩家都能獲得額外 $throwables;% 投擲物。 ( 最少： 1)

orig_text: Perfecting the creation of a surfboard has brought Bodhi to the state of mind he needs to be. He is now ready for the challenges that lies ahead.
tran_text: 完美的衝浪板設計帶領 Bodhi 到準備好心理的狀態。他現在準備好了接受未來的挑戰。

orig_text: Clover is trying to set up a security system to protect the house from raids and infiltration. She will put the "safe" in Safe House.
tran_text: Clover 在嘗試設置起保安系統以防止被突襲或潛入。她在安全屋內增加「安全」。

orig_text: Houston is in charge of the escape van and tuning the gang's cars. He can switch out the color of the escape van whenever the gang needs it.
tran_text: Houston 主理逃脫車輛及調節伙伴的車。當伙伴想的時間，他可以改變逃脫車的顏色。

orig_text: A tidy and neat office, with everything in its place. Hoxton did this, would you believe it. Aldstone taught him well.
tran_text: 一個很整齊的辦公室，所有東西都在應在的位置。 Hoxton 做的，你信不信。 Aldstone 教得他很好。

orig_text: Sangres has a more comfortable room now, with better quality kit and more beer.
tran_text: Sangres 現在有更舒服的房間，有更好的工具及更多啤酒。

orig_text: Research papers, paintings, artefacts of ancient, mysterious origin (and of course, value) have begun arriving. It's everything Duke needs to lose himself in mythology, history and his search for that next big thing to steal.
tran_text: 調查報告、油畫、古老文物及神秘起源 (當然還有價值) 都送來了。這樣就能讓 Duke 沉醉在神話、歷史內，還有研究下一個要偷的好東西。

orig_text: Piano, check. Tiger skin, check. Welcome to Scarfaces place. Can you smell the money now? Or the coke?
tran_text: 鋼琴，再看，老虎皮，再看，歡迎來到 Scarfaces 的地方，你嗅到金錢了？或是古柯鹼？

orig_text: You will not gain ranks or rewards until the host's Crime Spree rank is greater than or equal to your own.
tran_text: 除非主機犯罪狂歡等級大於或等於你的，否則你不會賺到任何等級及獎勵。

orig_text: Whenever a Bulldozer spawns, there is a chance that it will be a slow-moving minigun-wielding Bulldozer.
tran_text: 每一個 Bulldozer 出生都有機會轉變成慢速配戴機槍的 Bulldozer 。

orig_text: Enemies can not be staggered from damage.
tran_text: 敵人不會再因傷害而驚慌。

orig_text: $count; less pager(s) can be answered per heist.
tran_text: 每個劫案無線電回覆量減少 $count; 。

orig_text: Do you want to reroll your currently available missions?$NL;$NL;This will cost you $cost; Continental Coins.
tran_text: 你想重洗現有可用任務？$NL;$NL;這需要 $cost; 個歐洲幣。

orig_text: You can not reroll your available missions, you need $cost; Continental Coins to do this.
tran_text: 你不能重洗任務，你需要 $cost; 個歐洲幣以重洗。
Ethan 和 Hila 影片的小轉角

tran_text: 護甲無損時，你或隊友每擊殺 ##$multiperk2;## 名敵人、儲存 ##$multiperk;## 能量值。$NL;$NL;護甲耗盡、開始回甲時，消耗全數能量值轉換為等值血量。$NL;$NL;護甲種類影響能量最大值。（西裝的能量值上限較多）

orig_text: Unlocks and equips the Kingpin Injector. Changing to another perk deck will make the Injector unavailable again. The Injector replaces your current throwable, is equipped in your throwable slot and can be switched out if desired.$NL;$NL;While in game you can use the throwable key to activate the injector. Activating the injector will heal you with ##$multiperk;## of all damage taken for ##$multiperk2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;You can still take damage during the effect. The Injector can only be used once every ##$multiperk3;## seconds.
tran_text: 解鎖腎上腺素注射器，轉成其他天賦牌組會令注射器再次不能使用，注射器佔用投擲物欄位，如果想的話可以被轉走。$NL;$NL;在遊戲時，按下使用投擲物的鍵可以使用注射器，使用注射器可以在 ##$multiperk2;## 秒中治療 ##$multiperk;## 傷害。$NL;$NL;在這效果下，你仍可能受傷，每 ##$multiperk3;## 秒只能用一次注射器。

Unlocks an armor bag equipment for you to use. The armor bag can be used to change your armor during a heist.$NL;$NL;Increases your ammo pickup to ##$multiperk;## of the normal rate.

orig_text: Becoming Infamous will cost $200,000,000 which will be deducted from your offshore account. If you proceed, your reputation level will be reset to level 0. All your skills and unspent skill points will be removed, and all your spending cash will be burned. The cash on your offshore account however will remain.$NL;$NL;You will start over with no skills and your spending cash will be reset. This is not reversible, and you CAN NOT get back what you sacrifice.$NL;$NL;You get to keep all your guns, mods, masks, patterns and materials. You will also gain one level of Infamy and one Infamy point to spend in the Infamy tree.
tran_text: 升級惡名需要海外帳戶$200,000,000。如果你要升級，你的名聲值會變為0，你所有的技能點會不見，你的可用現金會歸零。你的海外帳戶會保留。$NL;$NL;你會從沒有可用現金、技能點開始。這是不可逆的選項，被犧牲的東西不能再拿回來。$NL;$NL;你可以保留你的槍、武器零件、面具、圖案和基底。你也會得到一等惡名值和一個惡名點數，點數可用在惡名樹上。

orig_text: You need $cash; from your offshore account to become infamous.
tran_text: 你需要海外帳戶$cash;來升級惡名值。

tran_text: 現在遊覽 Steam 以購買 h3h3 角色包！

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You can intimidate a non-special enemy into a hostage. Less well trained enemies are easier to intimidate.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The power and range of your intimidation is increased by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你可以呼喝警察及警衛進行壓制。成功的話他們會舉手投降，再呼喝就可讓他們反綁自己。被壓制的警察可以當成人質來交換被逮捕的隊友。受傷的敵人較易壓制。黑幫及特殊敵人無法壓制。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你的呼叫距離及壓制力增加 ##$multipro;##。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;When charging your melee weapon you will counterattack enemies that try to strike you, knocking them down. The knockdown does not deal any damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You gain the ability to counter attack cloakers and their kicks.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;當你用近戰武器蓄力時，你可以反擊企圖攻擊你的敵人，將他們打倒地上，但反擊不造成任何傷害。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你可以反擊Cloakers。

orig_text: Defines how wide the players field of view is.

First, thanks for taking on the courier assignment. Not much of a runner myself these days. This is how it works: There are packages scattered across D.C. I hire a lot of people to courier these things, but no one gets to transport a package the whole way. Not very safe to do that. Your job is to pick up any packages you spot and bring them back to me. If you bring enough packages, I'll give you free stuff.$NL;$NL;There are 5 types of packages, color coded by value: Green Mantis, Yellow Bull, Red Spider, Blue Eagle, and Purple Snake. Green is basic stuff, purple is highly desirable goods. You get the idea.$NL;$NL;When you spot a package, just approach it and pick it up. You get them at the end of each day. The entire team gets the package count, so there's no need to ninja loot from your team mates. Once you earn enough packages of a specific color, the rewards will be automatically added to your inventory, free of charge. You get one each of all mods in the reward package. Check the package pages for details.$NL;$NL;After completing a package, feel free to start collecting again: You'll keep earning more rewards as long as you bring home packages. Happy hunting.$NL;$NL;- Gage.
tran_text: 首先，感謝參與速遞任務。你也看到了現在我是個瘸子。這工作是這樣的：華盛頓散落著許多包裹。我僱用了不少人運送這些東西，但沒人能夠送完全程。那樣做並太不安全。你的任務是撿起你能看到的所有包裹並帶回給我。一旦你帶回足夠的包裹，我會給你點免費的東西。$NL;$NL;有5種類型的包裹，顏色代表價值。綠螳螂、黃公牛、紅蜘蛛、藍老鷹、紫蟒蛇。 綠色是些基礎的東西，紫色是些稀有的東西。你大致了解了吧。$NL;$NL;當你看到個包裹，只需要靠近並撿起它。你可以一整天尋找它們。全隊撿起的包裹也會一起統計，所以沒必要與你的隊友相互爭搶。當你攢齊某種顏色的包裹，獎勵將會自動進入你的庫存，免費的。你將會從每個獎勵包裹中獲得其中一個配件。點擊包裹頁面查看詳情。$NL;$NL;收集完一個包裹後，請隨意繼續收集：只要你一直帶回包裹，你會持續獲得獎勵，歡迎加入狩獵。$NL;$NL;- Gage

tran_text: 所有員工區的門將會被Micho解鎖。

orig_text: Easy access to the cages in the vault.
tran_text: 更容易打開金庫裡面的籠子。

orig_text: An insider hides a keycard for you. The keycard opens most security doors, but can only be used once.
tran_text: 內應為你藏了一張鑰匙卡。鑰匙卡可以打開保安室的門，但只能使用一次。

orig_text: An inside man can arrange for additional locations where you can secure loot.
tran_text: 內應可以喬出額外的投包點。

orig_text: Stealth only: We'll contract a Bag Man to fetch bags thrown through here.
tran_text: 潛行限定：我們會找到接應人拿回被丟在這的贓物。

orig_text: Our Inside Man has taken care of a limited number of mobsters in the area. Now you only need to take care of the rest.
tran_text: 我們的內應解決了這片區域部分黑幫。現在你只需要幹掉剩下的。

orig_text: Inject malware into the time lock code. Cuts duration by 60 seconds.
tran_text: 在時間鎖內灌入惡意程式。減少倒數時間60秒。

orig_text: A sentry gun concealed inside a gift box.
tran_text: 裝在禮品盒的步哨機槍。

orig_text: Our in-house sniper will take care of a few chosen enemies throughout the entire mission.
tran_text: 我們在屋內的狙擊手將在整個任務裡解決一部分敵人。

orig_text: The Spotter will highlight guards and special enemies for you and your crew.
tran_text: 觀察者會幫你和成員標注警衛和特殊警察。

orig_text: An associate leaves a door open for you to sneak through
tran_text: 一位助手為你打開了扇門幫你悄然進入。

orig_text: A zip-line that gives you quick access to the roof.
tran_text: 滑索使你更快到達屋頂。

orig_text: A zip-line that gives you quick access to the other side of the area.
tran_text: 滑索使你更快到達地圖的另一邊。

orig_text: Crack the vault door with this heavy duty thermal drill
tran_text: 使用這個重型火力鑽機破開金庫門。

orig_text: Access all cameras from a device jacked into the network by an associate.
tran_text: 通過一個由助手協助入侵內部網絡的設備調用所有攝影機。

orig_text: Upgrade various elements of the drill.
tran_text: 升級鑽機老母的各項屬性

orig_text: An insider drops off equipment and items on location before the heist starts.
tran_text: 內應在劫案開始前在指定位置投放設備與物品。

orig_text: Choose your way of entering the casino.
Select where you want to start
A helicopter will land smack-dab in the middle of the ridge clearing. This is the fastest escape route, you will just have to wait for the helicopter to arrive.
tran_text: 一架直升機將會不偏不倚的停靠在中央石頭旁。這是最快的逃脫方法，只不過你需要等待直升機的到來。
按下 [CTRL] + [滑鼠左鍵] 來畫圖

orig_text: Flawless planning allows your escape to coincide with an alien abduction.
tran_text: 完美無瑕的計劃可以讓你的逃跑與外星人綁架一樣完美。

orig_text: A classic technique. Use C4 to blow a hole into an adjacent building and lose the cops, then zipline the loot over to a dump truck parked across the street ready to haul.
tran_text: 一套經典的技師手法。用C4炸出一個大洞以使我們移動到指定地點，接著再用滑索把贓物運過去然後逃脫...似乎有種似曾相識的感覺...？

orig_text: Tell the getaway driver to stick around and pick you up when you got what you came for.
tran_text: 告訴撤離司機緊跟在附近在你想撤離時帶走你。
滑索到鄰近建築物屋頂
在遊戲大廳中無法改變

orig_text: Heist already started.$NL;No alterations can be made to the preplan!
tran_text: 劫案已開始。$NL;事前計劃無法改變！

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You gain ##$multibasic2;## weapon accuracy with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode. $NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You gain a ##$multipro2;## accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.

Turn light streaks on or off.

A typical grinder is a hard working individual, able take control of difficult situations and turn them around.$NL;$NL; The grinder relies heavily on always being in the front and dishing out punishment, being able to survive due to the fact that he does damage to enemies regardless of how much damage he has sustained.
tran_text: Grinder $NL;通常來說，側衛是非常努力的角色，擁有扭轉乾坤的能力。側衛總是衝在第一線，並且教對手做人。他不管自己承受多大的傷害，都會讓敵人明白人生和理想。

orig_text: The Ex-Presidents are one of the most daring heisting crews out there. Great risk takers and brothers in arms. Their lack of fear for their own mortality brought them together and made them as successful as  they are.$NL;$NL;An Ex-President follows no rules and only adheres to the Ozaki 8, a set of trials to honor nature.
tran_text: Ex-President $NL;前總統是最膽大妄為的搶劫團伙之一。無所畏懼形同比肩。「戰勝死亡的恐懼」這個理念讓他們走在了一起$NL;$NL;前總統成員不遵循規則只認尾崎八試煉，一條向大自然表達敬畏之心的軌蹟之路。

orig_text: The Anarchist refuses to acknowledge the arbitrary laws imposed by traditional authority. Kings, queens and presidents hold no sway over the Anarchist mind. Fly free and make your own rules is the motto. This refusal to abide by established truths enables the Anarchist to go where others cannot, employing unconventional tactics to slip through the cracks and reach seemingly impossible objectives.
tran_text: Anarchist $NL;無政府主義者是一些不信任警察作為指揮的身份的人，而且這些人可以自我控制。反抗的破壞和暴力能簡單達到更好目的的方法，無政府主義者從不逃避戰鬥而且常常抵抗打擊。無政府主義者的真正內容是無政府主義的打擊並不只為金錢 - 但同時破壞是有趣的。

orig_text: Biker gangs are feared all over the world, and the biggest clubs are common household names. To be a biker you need to be tough and loyal, and know that the rules of the club are absolute. Bikers are known to be ruthless and violent people, and they are never afraid to challenge anyone that dare to cross them.$NL;$NL;When wearing your patch and riding your bike, you proclaim to everyone that you belong to the 1%. The 1% that refuse to follow the rules of society and proudly carry the title of Outlaw. For a  biker, all that matters are your fellow club members and your ride.
tran_text: Biker $NL;暴走族被全世界所懼怕，世上最大的俱樂部亦是家喻戶曉的名字。要成為暴走族，你需要堅韌及忠誠，而且要絕對服從規矩。暴走族一向被認為是殘酷無情及暴力的人，而且他們從未懼怕挑戰膽敢越過他們的人。$NL;$NL;當戴上眼罩及騎上摩托車，你向所有人表明了你屬於那 1% 。那 1% 反對跟隨社會的規則及為違規的稱號感到自豪。作為暴走族，一切都是關於你及你的俱樂部人員。

orig_text: The Sicario is a must in every drug cartel. Someone who takes care of all types of problems in a most lethal way. The Sicario never ducks out of a fight, they get the job done - without hesitation or fear.
tran_text: Sicario $NL;毒裁者一定會在每一個毒品商中出現，以致命的方法處理所有問題，毒裁者從未避開戰鬥，在沒有恐懼的情況下，完成工作。

orig_text: The Armorer was formerly a profession within the military. The armorer's job is to maintain, repair and improve armors.$NL;$NL;Any self-respecting crime syndicate needs someone who can make sure the soldiers have the necessary protection to do their jobs.
tran_text: Armorer $NL;該軍械士的前身是軍內一個職業。該軍械士的工作是維護，處理和改進裝甲。$NL;$NL;任何自我尊重的犯罪集團需要有人可以保證戰士有必要的保護，以做好本職工作。

orig_text: The Rogue is a stealthy criminal, capable of sneaky tricks and deadly force. Versatile and deceptive, the Rogue is hired to do anything from pickpocketing, to burglaries and con jobs.$NL;$NL;The trademark of a Rogue is his versatility - what he lacks in strength he makes up for in skill.
tran_text: Rogue $NL;盜匪是一種隱形的犯罪，擁有能夠偷偷摸摸的技巧和致命武力，多面性和欺騙性， 盜匪被雇來做任何扒竊的事情，用來盜竊和欺詐的職位。$NL;$NL;一個盜匪的標誌是他的多面性-他的技能彌補了他缺乏的力量。
賺得已轉換的天賦點數：
購買及自定義支援裝備。

orig_text: Support is for those who like to support their gang. Gives you the weapons BRONCO .44, COMPACT-5 and REINBECK. You get more ammo so you last longer in gunfights. To make sure you are always the last one standing - the Doctor Bag.
tran_text: 支援是為了想支持隊伍的人而設的，給你 BRONCO .44 、 COMPACT-5 及 REINBECK 。你有更多彈藥所以能開火更久，確保你能站到最後－醫療包。

orig_text: Kelli 'Sydney' King challenged the PAYDAY gang heads on in an attempt to get noticed and... well, she definitely succeeded. Although she's still young and has a lot to learn, Sydney has showed an iron-will and is determined to leave her mark on our world - something I greatly respect. And they say kids today have no ambitions?
tran_text: Kelli 'Sydney' King 嘗試透過挑戰 PAYDAY 幫的頭目以引起注意 ... 嗯，她的確成功了。雖然她仍很年幼及有很多東西要學，但她顯示了鋼鐵意志及堅決要在世上留下她的印記－我很尊敬的東西。還有他們說小孩沒有野心？

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Special enemies marked by you take ##$multibasic;## more damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Unlocks the Spotter asset in the Job Overview menu.$NL;$NL;During stealth, the Spotter will highlight guards and special enemies for you and your crew.$NL;$NL;If stealth is not an option, the Spotter will highlight special enemies for you and your crew.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;被你標記的特殊敵人會受多 ##$multibasic;## 的額外傷害。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;可購買特殊任務支援「觀察員」。他會在任務中站在高處監視環境。潛行階段時，他會標記出地圖上的守衛。$NL;$NL;火拼階段時，他會標記出所有特殊敵人。

orig_text: In the Rats job, find the weapon case and the two keys.
tran_text: 在鼠輩 (Rats) 中，找到武器箱及兩條鑰匙。

orig_text: Energy is the realm of big business. So are weapons. Make sure you find what you're looking for.
tran_text: 能源是一門大生意，軍火亦然，確保你找到了你在找的東西。

orig_text: In the Big Oil job, find the weapon case and the two keys.
tran_text: 在石油大亨 (Big Oil) 中，找到武器箱及兩條鑰匙。

orig_text: The fine art of mixing weapons and politics. Time to cash in - get the parts.
tran_text: 混合武器和政治精美的藝術，是入錢的時間－拿到部件。

orig_text: In the Framing Frame job, find the weapon case and the two keys.
tran_text: 在偷天換日 (Framing Frame) 中，找到武器箱及兩條鑰匙。

orig_text: Lots of guns for you to grab. Just make sure you find the parts - don't burn them.
tran_text: 有很多槍可被你拿，只是確保你找到部件－不要燒掉它們。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Adds ##$multibasic;## more first aid kits to your inventory.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Adds ##$multipro;## more first aid kits to your inventory.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你攜帶的急救包增加##$multibasic;##個。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你攜帶的急救包再增加##$multipro;##個。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Decreases your First Aid Kit and Doctor Bag deploy time by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Crew members that use your First Aid Kits or Doctor Bags take ##$multipro;## less damage for ##$multipro2;## seconds.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;設置急救包及醫療包所需時間減少 ##$multibasic;## 。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;隊友使用你的急救包或醫療包後，##$multipro2;##秒內受傷減少##$multipro;##

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Decreases your first aid kit deploy time by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Crew members that use your first aid kits take ##$multipro;## less damage for ##$multipro2;## seconds.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;設置急救包所需時間快##$multibasic;##$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;隊友使用你的急救包後，##$multipro2;##秒內受傷減少##$multipro;##

orig_text: Technician is for those who like gadgets that go BOOM. Gives you the weapons STRYK, AK and GL40. Spending all that time playing with your toolkit is paying off. To top it all off you get the gadget of gadgets - the Sentry Gun. (DLC)
tran_text: 技師是為了喜歡用小機件爆炸的人而設的，給你 STRYK 、 AK 及 GL40 。永遠用你的小工具來玩，要去到最高點就要用工具的工具－步哨槍。 (DLC)

orig_text: In the upcoming WOLF PACK DLC, you can acquire Wolf's personal stash of guns, gear and heists!$NL;$NL;Purchase the WOLF PACK DLC to host two epic new heists, free for all to join. Also included: the Technician skill tree, which includes three awesome new weapons, a crew bonus, new player upgrades, the deployable Sentry Gun equipment, and a raised level cap.
tran_text: 在未來的 WOLF PACK DLC ，你可以得到 Wolf 的個人槍、配件、劫案藏品！$NL;$NL;購買 WOLF PACK DLC 以主持兩個傳奇新劫案，所有人都能加入。同時包括：技師技能樹，有三把新武器、隊伍獎勵、新的玩家升級、可放置式步哨槍及提升了的聲望上限。

orig_text: Your weapon stability with all weapons is increased by ##$multibasic;##.
tran_text: 你的所有武器穩定性增加 ##$multibasic;## 。

orig_text: Your cost of weapon and mask crafting is reduced by ##$multibasic;##.
tran_text: 你的武器及面具合成費用減少 ##$multibasic;## 。

orig_text: Your cost of weapon and mask crafting is reduced by ##$multibasic;##.
tran_text: 你的武器及面具合成費用減少 ##$multibasic;## 。

orig_text: BASIC:##$basic;##$NL;Increases the concealment of melee weapons by ##$multibasic2;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the concealment of all ballistic vests by ##$multipro2;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;近戰武器的隱匿值增加##$multibasic2;##。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;防彈背心的隱匿值增加##$multipro2;##。

orig_text: Set whether or not you want to play with the team AI.
tran_text: 設定你的隊伍中會否有電腦AI。

orig_text: Turn Depth of Field on or off.
Decreases your sensitivity relative to how far your weapon zooms in while using steelsights
tran_text: 減低你的相對敏感度以改變使用狙準鏡時武器的放大倍率

orig_text: Fixes render lag (can be perceived as mouse/controller lag). Can have minor impact on performance.
tran_text: 修復渲染延遲（鼠標/手柄延遲）。會對性能造成輕微影響。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Reduces your camera shake by ##$multibasic;## when you are damaged by enemy fire.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your bleedout health is increased by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你中彈時造成的鏡頭搖晃效果減少##$multibasic;##$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;倒地時的生命值增加##$multipro;##

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Increases your supply of cable ties by ##$multibasic2;##. You can cable tie hostages ##$multibasic3;## faster. $NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You and your crew gain ##$multipro;## damage absorption for each hostage you have. This effect stacks with up to a maximum of ##$multipro2;## hostages.$NL;$NL;Note: This skill does not stack with other players Forced Friendship skill.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;增加 ##$multibasic2;## 條綁帶。綁人速度快 ##$multibasic3;## 。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;當你每擁有一個人質，你和你的隊友就獲得  ##$multipro;## 傷害吸收效果，此效果最多能堆疊到  ##$multipro2;## 個人質。$NL;$NL;注意：此技能不會和隊友的 技能堆疊。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Increases your stamina by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases stamina for you and your crew by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;你跑步的耐力增加 ##$multibasic;##。$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;你和隊友的耐力增加 ##$multipro;##。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Adds ##$multibasic;## more trip mine to your inventory.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Decreases your trip mine deploy time by ##$multipro;##.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;可以多攜帶##$multibasic;##枚詭雷。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;設置詭雷的所需時間快##$multipro;##。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;The radius of your trip mine explosions are increased by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;Your trip mine deals ##$multipro;## more damage.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;詭雷爆炸範圍增加 ##$multibasic;## 。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你的詭雷傷害增加 ##$multipro;## 。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive a ##$multibasic;## damage bonus.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive ##$multipro;## less damage from enemies.
tran_text: 基礎： ##$basic;##$NL;當你被三名敵人圍攻時，你增加##$multibasic;##殺傷力$NL;$NL;精通： ##$pro;##$NL;當你被三名敵人圍攻時，你受傷減少##$multipro;##

orig_text: Explore which upgrades are available for each specialty.
tran_text: 查看不同專業的可用升級。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;You take ##$multibasic;## less damage for ##$multibasic2;## seconds after being revived.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;You receive ##$multipro;## more health when revived.
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你所受傷害減少##$multibasic;##，在你被救起的##$multibasic2;##秒。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;你被救起後再恢復總生命值##$multipro;##。

orig_text: Turn custom Alienware masks on and off.
tran_text: 開關自定義 Alienware 面具。

orig_text: Choose which monitor to use in fullscreen.$NL;Requires a game restart.
tran_text: 選擇要用於全螢幕的顯示器。$NL;需要重啟遊戲。

orig_text: CHECK OUT THE NEW WOLF PACK DLC ON STEAM!
tran_text: 遊覽 STEAM 以查看新的 WOLF PACK DLC ！

orig_text: Come talk to us at OVERKILL and the other heisters in the best forum on earth.
tran_text: 來地球上最棒的論壇與OVERKILL的成員以及其他劫匪們一起思考、討論。

orig_text: You have to wait before you can create a new vote.
tran_text: 你必須等待一段時間後才能發起另一次投票

orig_text: A player is waiting to join the game.$NL;They will spawn on your location once you accept them.
tran_text: 一位玩家正在等待加入遊戲中。$NL;當你同意讓他們進入後他們將在你的位置出生。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below ##$multibasic3;##, you will do up to ##$multibasic2;## more melee and saw damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below ##$multipro3;##, you will do up to ##$multipro2;## more damage with ranged weapons as well.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not apply to throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.$NL;$NL;Entering berserker state negates third party regeneration effects
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你的近戰傷害（包括電鋸）隨血量減少而增加。最大值為當生命值低過##$multibasic3;##時近戰提高##$multibasic2;##倍傷害。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;當生命值低過##$multipro3;##時，你的槍械提高##$multipro2;##倍傷害。$NL;$NL;注意：本技能對投擲物、榴彈砲、火箭炮無效。$NL;$NL;進入狂戰士效果將令其他回復效果失效。

orig_text: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below ##$multibasic;##, you will do up to ##$multibasic2;## more melee and saw damage.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;When your health is below ##$multipro;##, you will do up to ##$multipro2;## more damage with ranged weapons.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not apply to throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.$NL;$NL;Entering berserker state negates regeneration effects
tran_text: 基礎：##$basic;##$NL;你的近戰傷害（包括電鋸）隨血量減少而增加。最大值為當生命值低過##$multibasic;##時近戰提高##$multibasic2;##倍傷害。$NL;$NL;精通：##$pro;##$NL;當生命值低過##$multipro;##時，你的槍械提高##$multipro2;##倍傷害。$NL;$NL;注意：本技能對榴彈砲無效。

orig_text: Cloakers have a special effect when they kick someone.
tran_text: Cloaker 踢到人時會有特殊效果。

orig_text: When a cloaker charges and kicks someone they will apply a secondary effect.
tran_text: 當 Cloaker 充能及踢到人時會使用第二效果。
當被殺死時，所以敵人都會爆炸。

orig_text: Killing an enemy will cause them to explode, dealing the same amount of damage as the hit that killed them.
tran_text: 殺死敵人會令敵人爆炸，爆炸傷害值等同他們被殺時所受到的傷害。

orig_text: Players will take more damage than normal from being hit by enemies.
tran_text: 玩家被敵人攻擊時會受到更多傷害。

orig_text: You can damage other players with any weapon.
tran_text: 你能用任何武器傷害其他玩家。

orig_text: Killing an enemy will split them into 2 weaker enemies.
tran_text: 殺死一個敵人會令他們分裂成兩個較弱的敵人。

orig_text: Killing an enemy will split them into 2 weaker enemies in place until they can no longer be split into weaker enemies.
tran_text: 殺死一個敵人會分裂他們到兩個較弱的敵人直接他們不能再分裂。

orig_text: All normal enemies during assault waves are replaced with Medics, and all special units are replaced with Bulldozers.
tran_text: 突擊時，所有正常敵人被變成醫療兵 (Medics) ，及所有特種部隊被變成 Bulldozer 。
霰彈槍擊殺會拐走敵人。

orig_text: Bain has finally unveiled his true self as The Mother-Bain, and your shotguns will abduct enemies so that you can return them to the mothership. Do not disappoint The Mother-Bain.
tran_text: Bain 終於揭開了他真正的身份就是 母艦 － Bain ，及你們的霰彈槍會拐敵人回到母艦。不要讓 母艦 － Bain 失望。

orig_text: Define which special unit that will be spawned instead of all other enemies.
tran_text: 決定用哪些特種部隊來代替其他敵人。

orig_text: The Headless Titan-dozer has escaped Wolf's nightmares!
tran_text: 無頭泰坦 Dozer 已經從 Wolf 的惡夢中逃出來！

orig_text: The Headless Titan-dozer has escaped from Wolf's nightmares and become reality! All regular bulldozers will now be terrifying Headless Titan-dozers!
tran_text: 無頭泰坦 Dozer 已經從 Wolf 的惡夢中逃到現實了！現在所有普通 Bulldozer 都會變成可怕的無頭泰坦 Dozer！

orig_text: You are about to reset one or all of your skill trees.$NL;$NL;Selecting RESET TREE will remove the skill points in the selected skill tree and return them to you.$NL;$NL;Selecting RESET ALL TREES will remove the skill points from all skill trees and return them to you.
Welcome to Crime.Net. Before you go for the big PAYDAYs, learn the basics here.
tran_text: 歡迎來到 Crime.Net 。在你進入龐大的 PAYDAY 世界前，在這裡學習基礎。

orig_text: Nationality: Russian$NL;Age: 25$NL;$NL;Though young, Sokol has everything to become a legendary heister. A gifted athlete, Sokol also possesses keen intelligence and understands his role in a team. He is fearless and physical, and uses this to get amongst the enemy, whether that be a team of hockey players or a team of SWAT.
tran_text: 國籍：俄羅斯$NL;年齡：25$NL;$NL;儘儘管年輕，Sokol擁有成為傳奇劫匪的所有潛質。作為一個有天賦的運動員，Sokol 擁有敏銳的智慧之餘亦深明自己在團隊裡的角色定位。他無所畏懼且身體強健，並且擅用這些優勢來擊敗敵人，無論對手是冰球球員還是SWAT特警都一樣。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Sokol做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: $xp; Experience reward for you and your crew
tran_text: 你和你的團隊獲得 $xp; 的經驗加成

orig_text: $xp; Experience & $cash;money reward for you and your crew
tran_text: 你和你的團隊獲得$xp; 的經驗以及$cash; 的金錢加成

orig_text: $dlc; is required to apply this weapon skin
tran_text: 需要 $dlc; 以使用此皮膚

orig_text: Maximize the perk deck: $perk_deck_name;$NL;It costs $point_cost; perk points to make $perk_tier; out of $max_tier; cards unlocked.$NL;Currently $current_tier; out of $max_tier; unlocked.
tran_text: 最大化天賦牌組：$perk_deck_name;$NL;使用 $point_cost; 點天賦點數解鎖 $max_tier; 張之中的 $perk_tier; 張卡 $NL;現時在 $max_tier; 張之中解鎖了 $current_tier; 張。

orig_text: Requires following skills to be unlocked:$NL;
tran_text: 需用相對應的技能以解鎖此技能：$NL;
基礎： $basic; 點 / 精通： $aced; 點

orig_text: Nationality: Australian$NL;Age: 24$NL;$NL;Kelli 'Sydney' King made a rather spectacular entrance to our lives when she interrupted an on-going heist being executed by the PAYDAY gang. Using a mixed array of guns and explosives she just barely managed to steal away a bag full of cash. I was impressed by this crazy and fearless act, and so were the others, even if they didn't want to admit it. Regardless, I had no doubts in my mind when I asked her to join us - with great risks comes great rewards.
tran_text: 國籍：澳大利亞$NL;年齡：24$NL;$NL;Kelli 'Sydney' King 創造了一個頗為壯觀的入口以進入我們的生活，她阻止了我們一場正在進行的劫案。她剛剛才準備用隨便的槍械和爆炸物去搶走一包完整的現金。我對於這種瘋狂而且無懼的行為十分印象深刻，所以即使別人不想接納她。不論如何我邀請她加入時都沒有起疑心 - 高風險帶來高回報。

orig_text: The deadly Push Daggers, your pair of true friends when in need.
tran_text: 非常致命的手刺刀，真正在你需要時與你絕配的好朋友。

orig_text: Complete the "Prepare for War" Side Job.
tran_text: 完成「 戰爭準備 」支線任務。
一把完美保存下來的魯格手槍。

orig_text: A well oiled MP40 Submachine Gun, skillfully resorted.
tran_text: 經過專業潤滑的 MP40 衝鋒槍，許多專業技術者都渴望要一把。

orig_text: The Galant Rifle is a trusted service rifle of the US armed forces. The crown jewel in any respectable collection.
tran_text: Galant 步槍是美國軍隊信靠的步槍。是貴族級的收藏。

orig_text: You wouldn't think so, but you can kill a dozer with these things.
tran_text: 你不是這樣想，但你可以用那東西殺死 dozer 。

orig_text: Knock out $max_progress; Bulldozers using the OVERKILL boxing gloves.
tran_text: 使用殺戮拳擊手手套 (OVERKILL boxing gloves) 殺死 $max_progress; 個 Bulldozers 。

orig_text: This bronze medallion was made in the 19th century. It depicts a Fleur De Lis and Peridot crystal, with writing in ancient cuneiform along the edge. It has been buried in a lead-lined box for over 100 years.
tran_text: 這銅勳章是在19世紀製造的。他上面刻畫了百合花飾以及橄欖石，上面寫上很古早以前的楔形文字。他藏在鉛盒內將近一百年。

orig_text: This is a homage to the discreet power of the ECM jammer. Not that you needed one, that time at the Car Shop.
tran_text: 這是對電子干擾器 (ECM jammer) 干擾能力的尊敬。在車店 (Car Shop) 中你連一個都不需要。

orig_text: Secure $max_progress; bags of Yayo on the Scarface Mansion job.
tran_text: 在疤面公館 (Scarface Mansion) 中獲得 $max_progress; 包古柯鹼。

orig_text: This computer is a really old, slow piece of shit.
tran_text: 這電腦真的太舊了，慢得要死了。

orig_text: A first aid locker. Because we care about the medical profession.
tran_text: 一個急救箱。因為我們關注醫療人員。

orig_text: Complete the Nightclub heist using only tripmines to kill enemies.
tran_text: 在夜總會狂歡 (Nightclub) 中只使用詭雷來殺敵人。
滾出我的地盤！ (Get off my Lawn!)

orig_text: Successfully defend your safe house against a police raid on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度成功從警察的突襲中保護好你的安全屋。

orig_text: Finish the Diamond Store heist with all bags, and destroying the SWAT Turret, on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度，拿到所有贓物及摧毀 SWAT 炮塔 (SWAT Turret) 下完成鑽石店 (Diamond Store) 劫案。

orig_text: Finish the Night Club heist in stealth on DEATH WISH difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在 DEATH WISH 的難度中，以潛行的方式完成夜總會 (Night Club) 劫案。

orig_text: With every bullet we shoot, we should remember there is only one, true Bullet.
tran_text: 每當我們射出一發子彈，我們都應該記住，只有一個真正的彈丸。

orig_text: Find the hidden Robot Trophy on Shadow Raid and First World Bank.
tran_text: 在影之襲擊跟世界第一銀行中尋找機器人獎盃。

orig_text: Find the hidden Marine Trophy on Go Bank and Four Stores.
tran_text: 在全武銀行跟四家商店中尋找海軍獎盃。

orig_text: Find the hidden Cultist Trophy in Hoxton Breakout Day 1 and Diamond Store.
tran_text: 在老哈越獄記第一天跟鑽石店中尋找邪教徒獎盃。

orig_text: Complete any heist with an active mutator.
tran_text: 在激活一個變異時完全任何一個劫案。

orig_text: A scale model of a Falcogini. Yes, you once stole a real one. Drive in style.
tran_text: 一個按比例的 Falcogini 模型。對，你曾經偷過真的，有風派地駕它。

orig_text: Finish the Car Shop job on any difficulty.
tran_text: 在任何難度下完成車店。

orig_text: A little souvenir that you picked up when raiding the FBI offices.
tran_text: 當你偷襲 FBI 辦公室時順手拾走的小小記念品。

orig_text: Complete The Yacht Heist in stealth with all team members at maximum detection.
tran_text: 在全隊偵測值最高的情況下潛行完成遊艇劫案 (The Yacht Heist) 。

orig_text: It feels as though that painting is looking at you...
tran_text: 感覺到那油畫在看住你 ...

orig_text: Ernesto Sosa didn't like it when you destroyed his car. Or when you killed him.
tran_text: 當你破壞 Ernesto Sosa 的車或殺死他時，他就不喜歡它。

orig_text: Complete the Scarface Mansion job on the Mayhem difficulty or above in loud, with four players all using the Maniac perk deck and no skills. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the job from start to finish.
tran_text: 在 Mayhem 難度或以上，四個玩家都用瘋子天賦牌組無技能下以突入的方式完成疤面公館 (Scarface Mansion) ，為了完成這挑戰，你需要從劫案的一開始玩到結束。

orig_text: The cops aren't issued cable ties so they're forced to use these strange contraptions instead. You picked these ones up on Green Bridge.
tran_text: 條子沒遇過綁帶所以才被逼用那些奇怪的手銬，你在格林大橋試試吧。

orig_text: Find at least four out of the six pairs of handcuffs in the Green Bridge heist.
tran_text: 在格林大橋 (Green Bridge) 中，找到最少六對被銬住了的手。

orig_text: It's the kind of grin you flash when you've stolen the big loot with absolutely perfect skill.
tran_text: 這是當你有絕對完美技巧而偷到超大贓物時所露出的咧嘴笑。

orig_text: Yes, you took it. But do you really really need it?
tran_text: 對，你拿了它。但你真的需要它？

orig_text: On day 3 of the Firestarter job, find the rare poster of the OVERKILL hockey team.
tran_text: 在縱火者 (Firestarter) 劫案的第三天中，找到 OVERKILL 曲棍球隊稀有的海報。

orig_text: You are just the perfect host.
Successfully complete $max_progress; heists while playing as the host.
tran_text: 以主持遊戲來完成 $max_progress; 次劫案。

orig_text: A sniper rifle. Some people really underestimate the possibilities of it.
tran_text: 一把狙擊槍。許多人真的低估了它的可能性。

orig_text: Unlock all four of the RAID Character masks.
tran_text: 解鎖全部四個 RAID 角色面具。

orig_text: Finish the Meltdown job within 7 minutes, on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度，在 7 分鐘之內完成爐心熔解 (Meltdown) 劫案。

orig_text: For dummies and others who want to get into the meth cooking business.
tran_text: 為了傀儡及其他人想進入製冰行業。

orig_text: Complete the Big Bank heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above, with no crew member using any skills.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度，全隊沒技能下完成大銀行 (Big Bank) 劫案。

orig_text: You really wanted this armor. More than anything else.
tran_text: 你真的很想要這裝甲，多於任何其他東西。

orig_text: Nine for mortal men. And a tenth for the mad heister that dooms them to die.
tran_text: 壽定凡人持九戒，狂匪坐擁至尊戒；魔戒至尊奪眾命，劫薪之日暗影伏。

orig_text: You don't have to be the fastest runner to win the race. Not if you're willing to shoot the other guy in the kneecaps.
tran_text: 只要你射中其他人的膝蓋，你不需要是最快的選手都能勝出競賽。

orig_text: Find the hidden tortoise in the Heat Street heist.
tran_text: 在熱火街頭 (Heat Street) 劫案中找到隱藏的烏龜。
這不再新鮮 ... (It's not even fresh...)

orig_text: This jar contains evidence of the destructive work of a good SMG.
tran_text: 這罐包含了一把好的衝鋒槍破壞力的證據。

orig_text: Kill 25 enemies in 25 seconds using only SMGs.
tran_text: 只使用衝鋒槍在 25 秒內殺死 25個敵人。

orig_text: A statue to honor the ultimate heister.
tran_text: 一個代表終極劫匪榮譽的雕像。

orig_text: Complete all contracts on the One Down difficulty.
tran_text: 完成 One Down 難度下所有的劫案。

orig_text: Destroy the pumpkin on the Prison Nightmare job.
tran_text: 在監獄夢魘 (Prison Nightmare) 中破壞南瓜。

orig_text: Finish the Armored Transport: Train heist with all bags, on OVERKILL difficulty or above.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 或以上的難度，拿到所有贓款下完成運鈔車：火車 (Armored Transport: Train) 劫案。

orig_text: Finish the Ukrainian job on Death Wish difficulty or above, with no crew members equipping ECM jammers.
tran_text: 在 Death Wish 難度下，沒有隊員攜帶 ECM 干擾器 (ECM jammer) 時完成烏克蘭人的委託 (Ukrainian job) 。
但這是牙！ (But it's the tooth!)

orig_text: Finish the Bomb: Forest heist on Death Wish difficulty or above. To complete this challenge, you have to have played the job from start to finish.
tran_text: 在 Death Wish 或以上的難度完成炸彈劫案：森林 (Bomb: Forest) 劫案。為了完成這挑戰，你需要從劫案的一開始玩到結束。

orig_text: A statue of a great and infamous cop killer.
tran_text: 一個厲害及臭名昭著的警察殺手雕像。

orig_text: You did this. You could do it a hundred times in a row, too.
tran_text: 你做到它的。你能夠連續做到它過百次以上。

orig_text: Complete the Watchdogs heist using only sniper rifles, with an accuracy of 100% or above.
tran_text: 只使用狙擊槍時，有 100% 或以上命中率下完成看門狗 (Watchdogs) 劫案。

orig_text: You also made it out with $bonus_bags; bag(s).
However, you had to pay $civ_killed_cash; in cleaner costs for killing innocent civilians.
tran_text: 然而你必須為了被殺的無辜平民花費 $civ_killed_cash;清潔費。

orig_text: You also made it out with $vehicle_amount; vehicle(s) with a total value of $vehicle_cash;.
tran_text: 你們額外帶走了 $vehicle_amount; 輛車，總價值為 $vehicle_cash;.

orig_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 61$NL;$NL;To disrupt the OVERKILL MC operations, I needed a man on the inside, and that man was Tom "Rust" Bishop. With the help of the Elephant, we offered Rust a chance to make a real PAYDAY, and Rust was quick to oblige. He killed off his former motorcycle brothers to testament his new loyalty to me and that sealed the deal. With Rust on our side, we can now proceed to my next plan.
tran_text: 國籍： 美國$NL;年齡： 61$NL;$NL;去破壞 OVERKILL MC 的運作，我需要內部的人，而且那人是 Tom "Rust" Bishop 。有 Elephant 的幫助下，我們提供了 Rust 一個機會去得到真正的收獲日，而且 Rust 很快就能幫忙。他殺死了他的前摩托車兄弟去表示他對我們的忠誠以及封閉交易。有 Rust 在我們這面，我們現在可以推進到我們的下一個計劃。
